GP12garup2_u:4: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayamudīrayet // GarP_2,1.Mang //
GP12garup2_u:10: tena naḥ sandihānānāṃ sandehaṃ chettumarhasi // GarP_2,1.3 //
GP12garup2_u:16: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ mahābhāgāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ bhavatāṃ punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:17: sandeho nopapadyeta lokārthaṃ kila pṛcchatām // GarP_2,1.6 //
GP12garup2_u:20: namaḥ kṛṣṇāya munaye ya enaṃ samupāśritāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:23: babhūva so 'tha babhrāma teṣu nāma harergṛṇan // GarP_2,1.9 //
GP12garup2_u:26: na rajo na tamaścaiva sattvaṃ tābhyāṃ ca miśritam /
GP12garup2_u:27: yatra pravartate naiva sattvameva pravartate // GarP_2,1.11 //
GP12garup2_u:28: na yatra māyā nāśaśca na cai rāgādayo malāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:37: dadarśa śrīhariṃ tatra śrīpatiṃ sātvatāṃ patim // GarP_2,1.16 //
GP12garup2_u:41: kirīṭinaṃ kuṇḍalinaṃ śriyā vakṣasi lakṣitam // GarP_2,1.18 //
GP12garup2_u:54: bhūrlokātsatyaparyantaṃ puraṃ yāmyaṃ vinā prabho // GarP_2,1.24 //
GP12garup2_u:57: ataḥ sukṛtināṃ loko na bhūto na bhaviṣyati // GarP_2,1.26 //
GP12garup2_u:58: gāyanti devāḥ kila gītakāni dhanyāstu ye bhāratabhūmibhāge /
GP12garup2_u:59: svargāpavargasya phalārjanāya bhavanti bhūyaḥ puruṣāḥ suratvāt //
GP12garup2_u:61: adhastāccālitā darbhāḥ pādau yāmyāṃ vyavasthitau // GarP_2,1.28 //
GP12garup2_u:63: kimarthaṃ dīyate dānaṃ godānamapi keśava // GarP_2,1.29 //
GP12garup2_u:65: tilālohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca karpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā // GarP_2,1.30 //
GP12garup2_u:67: kathaṃ hi mriyate janturmṛto vai kutra gacchati // GarP_2,1.31 //
GP12garup2_u:68: ativāhaśarīraṃ ca kathaṃ hi śrayate tadā /
GP12garup2_u:69: śavaṃ skandhe vahetputro agnidātā ca pautrakaḥ // GarP_2,1.32 //
GP12garup2_u:71: vasundharā kimarthaṃ ca kutaḥ strīśabdakīrtanam // GarP_2,1.33 //
GP12garup2_u:75: vastraṃ naraśca nārī ca vidadhyādadharottaram // GarP_2,1.35 //
GP12garup2_u:76: annādyaṃ gṛhamāgatya na bhoktavyaṃ janaiḥ saha /
GP12garup2_u:77: navakāṃścaiva piṇḍāṃśca kimarthaṃ dadate sutāḥ // GarP_2,1.36 //
GP12garup2_u:78: kimarthaṃ catvare dugdhaṃ yātre pakve ca mṛnmaye /
GP12garup2_u:79: kāṣṭhatrayaṃ gaṇābaddhaṃ kṛtvā rātrau catuṣpathe // GarP_2,1.37 //
GP12garup2_u:81: dāhodakaṃ kimarthaṃ ca kimarthaṃ ca janaiḥ saha // GarP_2,1.38 //
GP12garup2_u:83: kathaṃ deyaṃ pitṛbhyaśca vāhasyāvāhanaṃ katham // GarP_2,1.39 //
GP12garup2_u:87: dvitīye 'hni kutaḥ snānaṃ caturthe sāgnike dvije // GarP_2,1.41 //
GP12garup2_u:88: daśame kiṃ malasnānaṃ kāryaṃ sarvajanaiḥ saha /
GP12garup2_u:91: daśame 'hani yatpiṇḍaṃ taddadyā dāmiṣeṇa tu // GarP_2,1.43 //
GP12garup2_u:95: śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśaitāni abdaṃ yāvatkuto ghaṭaḥ // GarP_2,1.45 //
GP12garup2_u:97: dinedine ca dātavyaṃ ghaṭānnaṃ pretatṛptaye // GarP_2,1.46 //
GP12garup2_u:98: prāpte kāle vai mriyate anityā mānavāḥ prabho // GarP_2,1.47 //
GP12garup2_u:99: chidraṃ tu naiva paśyāmi kuto jīvaḥ sa nirgataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:101: tejo vadasva me nātha vāyurākāśameva ca // GarP_2,1.48 //
GP12garup2_u:103: vāyavaścaiva pañcaite kathaṃ gacchanti cātyayam // GarP_2,1.49 //
GP12garup2_u:105: tṛṣṇā kāmo hyahaṅkāraḥ kuto yānti janārdanā // GarP_2,1.50 //
GP12garup2_u:107: naṣṭe dehe kuto yānti dānāni vividhāni ca // GarP_2,1.51 //
GP12garup2_u:108: sapiṇḍanaṃ kimarthaṃ ca pūrṇe saṃvatsare 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:109: pretasya melanaṃ keṣāṃ kiṃvidhaṃ tatra kārayet // GarP_2,1.52 //
GP12garup2_u:111: ye dagdhā ye tvadagdhāśca patitā ye narā bhuvi // GarP_2,1.53 //
GP12garup2_u:112: yāni cānyāni bhūtāni teṣāmante bhavecca kim /
GP12garup2_u:113: pāpino ye durācārā ye cānye gatabuddhayaḥ // GarP_2,1.54 //
GP12garup2_u:117: śūdrasya brāhmaṇī bhāryā saṃgṛhītā yadā bhavet // GarP_2,1.56 //
GP12garup2_u:119: anyacca śṛṇu viśvātmanmayā kautukinā rayāt // GarP_2,1.57 //
GP12garup2_u:121: tatrājani janāndṛṣṭvā duḥ kheṣveva nimajjataḥ // GarP_2,1.58 //
GP12garup2_u:122: svānte me durdharā pīḍā tatpīḍāto garīyasī /
GP12garup2_u:125: evaṃ na nirbhayaṃ sthānamanyadīśa bhavatpadāt // GarP_2,1.60 //
GP12garup2_u:127: tatrāpi bhārate varṣe bahuduḥ khasya bhāginaḥ // GarP_2,1.61 //
GP12garup2_u:130: khañjāḥ kāṇāśca badhirā mūkāḥ kuṣṭhāśca lomaśāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:133: dṛṣṭvā prasumanāḥ prāptaḥ ko mṛtyuścitratā katham // GarP_2,1.64 //
GP12garup2_u:135: vidhinābdakriyā yasya na sa durgatimāpnuyāt // GarP_2,1.65 //
GP12garup2_u:138: mriyamāṇasya kiṃ kṛtyaṃ kiṃ dānaṃ vāsavānuja /
GP12garup2_u:140: sadyo vilambato vā kiṃ dehamanyaṃ prapadyate /
GP12garup2_u:143: prasādaṃ kuru me mohaṃ chettumarhasyaśeṣataḥ // GarP_2,1.69 //
GP12garup2_u:144: sarvamantemayā pṛṣṭaṃ brūhi lokahitāya vai // GarP_2,1.70 //
GP12garup2_u:145: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśākhye dharmakāṇḍe
GP12garup2_u:149: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā bhadra mānuṣāṇāṃ hitāya vai /
GP12garup2_u:154: bhaktastvaṃ hi mahābhāga vainateyaṃ bravīmi te // GarP_2,2.3 //
GP12garup2_u:155: aputrasya gatirnāstu svargo naiva ca naiva ca /
GP12garup2_u:156: yena kenāpyupāyena kāryaṃ janma sutasya hi // GarP_2,2.4 //
GP12garup2_u:158: skandhaḥ putreṇa kartavyo hyagnidātā ca pautrakaḥ // GarP_2,2.5 //
GP12garup2_u:159: tiladarbhaiśca bhūmyāṃ vai kuṭī ṛtumatī bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:160: pañca ratnāni vaktre tu yena jīvaḥ prarohati // GarP_2,2.6 //
GP12garup2_u:161: yadā puṣpaṃ pranaṣṭaṃ hi kva tadā garbhadhāraṇam /
GP12garup2_u:162: ādarācca tato bhūmau yena garbhaṃ pradhāryate // GarP_2,2.7 //
GP12garup2_u:164: tasyāmevāturo muktaḥ sarvaṃ dahati kilbiṣam // GarP_2,2.8 //
GP12garup2_u:167: sarvatra vasudhāpūtā yatra lepo na vidyate /
GP12garup2_u:168: yatra lepaḥ sthitastatra punarlepena śudhyati // GarP_2,2.10 //
GP12garup2_u:170: alepaṃ hyāturaṃ muktaṃ viśantyete viyonayaḥ // GarP_2,2.11 //
GP12garup2_u:172: maṇḍalena vinā bhūmyāmāturo mucyate na hi // GarP_2,2.12 //
GP12garup2_u:176: yonyantaraṃ na gacchetsa krīḍate vāyunā saha // GarP_2,2.14 //
GP12garup2_u:178: tasyaiva vāyubhūtasya na śrāddhaṃ nodakakriyā // GarP_2,2.15 //
GP12garup2_u:180: asurā dānavā daityā vidravanti tilaistathā // GarP_2,2.16 //
GP12garup2_u:182: dahantu te me pāpāni śarīreṇa kṛtāni vai // GarP_2,2.17 //
GP12garup2_u:183: eka eva tilo datto hemadroṇatilaiḥ samaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:184: tarpaṇe dānahomeṣu datto bhavati cākṣayaḥ // GarP_2,2.18 //
GP12garup2_u:189: tena te pitarastṛptā apasavye kṛte sati /
GP12garup2_u:190: darbhamūle sthito brahmā madhye devo janārdanaḥ // GarP_2,2.21 //
GP12garup2_u:191: darbhāgre śaṅkaraṃ vidyāttrayo devāḥ kuśe smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:192: viprā mantrāḥ kaśā vahnistulasī ca khageśvara // GarP_2,2.22 //
GP12garup2_u:193: naite nirmālyatāṃ yānti kriyamāṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:194: tulasī brāhmaṇā gāvo viṣṇurekādaśī khaga // GarP_2,2.23 //
GP12garup2_u:202: darbhaistu kṣipyate yo 'sau darbhaistu pariveṣṭitaḥ // GarP_2,2.27 //
GP12garup2_u:203: viṣṇuloke sa vai yāti mantrahīno 'pi mānavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:204: tūlīṃ kṛtvā kṛtau pādau saṃsthitau kṣitipṛṣṭhataḥ // GarP_2,2.28 //
GP12garup2_u:207: yane dattena dānena sarvaṃ pāpaṃ vyapohati /
GP12garup2_u:208: lavaṇaṃ tadrasaṃ divyaṃ sarvakāmapradaṃ nṛṇām // GarP_2,2.30 //
GP12garup2_u:210: pitṝṇāṃ ca priyaṃ bhavyaṃ tasmātsvargapradaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,2.31 //
GP12garup2_u:212: etatsalavaṇaṃ dānaṃ tena śaṃsanti yoginaḥ // GarP_2,2.32 //
GP12garup2_u:214: āturasya yadā prāṇā na yānti vasudhātale // GarP_2,2.33 //
GP12garup2_u:215: lavaṇaṃ tu tadā deyaṃ dvārasyodvāṭanaṃ divaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:216: anyacca śṛṇu pakṣīndra mṛtyo rūpaṃ prapañcataḥ // GarP_2,2.34 //
GP12garup2_u:221: sāttvikā rājasāścaiva tāmasā ye ca kecana /
GP12garup2_u:222: bhāvāḥ kālātmakāḥ sarve pravartante hi jantuṣu // GarP_2,2.37 //
GP12garup2_u:224: agniḥ khaṃ pṛthivī mitra oṣadhyo vasavastathā // GarP_2,2.38 //
GP12garup2_u:226: sarve kālena sṛjyante saṃkṣipyante yathā punaḥ // GarP_2,2.39 //
GP12garup2_u:232: tataḥ kṣaṇena caitanye vikale jaḍatāṃ gate // GarP_2,2.42 //
GP12garup2_u:234: bībhatsaṃ tu tadā rūpaṃ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairbhavet // GarP_2,2.43 //
GP12garup2_u:238: bhūya eva hite tāta mṛtyukāladaśāmimām // GarP_2,2.45 //
GP12garup2_u:243: yairnānṛtāni coktāni prītibhedaḥ kṛto na ca /
GP12garup2_u:244: āstikaḥ śraddadhānaśca sa sukhaṃ mṛtyumṛcchati // GarP_2,2.48 //
GP12garup2_u:246: yathoktakārī saumyaśca sa sukhaṃ mṛtyumṛcchati // GarP_2,2.49 //
GP12garup2_u:248: kūṭasākṣī mṛṣāvādī ye ca viśvāsaghātakāḥ // GarP_2,2.50 //
GP12garup2_u:249: te mohaṃ mṛtyumṛcchanti tathā ye vedanindakāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:252: prāpte tvīdṛkpathe ghore jāyate tasya vepathuḥ // GarP_2,2.52 //
GP12garup2_u:258: uktaṃ mṛtyoḥ svarūpaṃ tu prasaṅgādanyadapyatha // GarP_2,2.55 //
GP12garup2_u:260: karmaṇāṃ prāktanānāṃ tu tadasattvenaṃ bhadetaḥ // GarP_2,2.56 //
GP12garup2_u:274: hemahārī tu kunakhī duścarmā gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_2,2.63 //
GP12garup2_u:280: araṇye nirjane deśe jāyate brahmarākṣasaḥ // GarP_2,2.66 //
GP12garup2_u:282: patraṃ ca śākhino hṛtvā gandhāṃśchucchundarī pumān // GarP_2,2.67 //
GP12garup2_u:285: madhudaṃśaḥ phalaṃ gṛdhro gāṃ godhāgniṃ bakastathā /
GP12garup2_u:287: kāṃsyahārī tu haṃsaḥ syātparasvasya ca hārakaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:292: nyāsāpahārī kāṇaḥ syāstrījīvaḥ khañjako bhavet // GarP_2,2.72 //
GP12garup2_u:294: vātagulmī viprayoṣidgāmī vā jambuko bhavet // GarP_2,2.73 //
GP12garup2_u:300: syādvātha vṛṣalaḥ so 'yaṃ catvare vai viṇmūtrakṛt // GarP_2,2.76 //
GP12garup2_u:304: kṛmiḥ paryuṣitādaḥ syānmatsarī bhramaro bhavet // GarP_2,2.78 //
GP12garup2_u:308: annaṃ paryuṣitaṃ vipre pradadatkubjatāṃ vrajet // GarP_2,2.80 //
GP12garup2_u:312: cātako jalahartā syājjanmāndhaḥ puṃstakaṃ haran // GarP_2,2.82 //
GP12garup2_u:318: hareḥ kathāṃ na śṛṇvanti ye na sādhujanastavam // GarP_2,2.85 //
GP12garup2_u:320: parasyānanasaṃsthaṃ yo grāsaṃ hari mandadhīḥ // GarP_2,2.86 //
GP12garup2_u:322: dambhenācarate dharmaṃ gajacarmā bhavettu saḥ // GarP_2,2.87 //
GP12garup2_u:324: liṅgapīḍī śivasvaṃ ca śivanirmālyameva ca // GarP_2,2.88 //
GP12garup2_u:329: dravyaprakārā hi yathā tathaiva prāṇijātayaḥ // GarP_2,2.90 //
GP12garup2_u:330: evaṃ vicitrairnijakarmabhirnṛṇāṃ sukhasya duḥ khasya ca janmanāmapi /
GP12garup2_u:333: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe pratakā(kha)ṇḍe
GP12garup2_u:340: narakāṇāṃ svarūpaṃ me vada yeṣu vikarmiṇaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:341: pātyante duḥ khabhūyiṣṭhāsteṣāṃ bhedāṃśca kīrtaya // GarP_2,3.2 //
GP12garup2_u:344: śakyaṃ vistarato naiva vaktuṃ prādhānyato bruve // GarP_2,3.3 //
GP12garup2_u:345: rauravaṃ nāma narakaṃ mukhyaṃ tadvainibodha me /
GP12garup2_u:346: raurave kūṭasākṣī tu yāti yaścānṛtī naraḥ // GarP_2,3.4 //
GP12garup2_u:347: yojanānāṃ sahasre dve rauravo hi pramāṇataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:348: jānumātrapramāṇaṃ tu tatra gartaṃ sudustaram // GarP_2,3.5 //
GP12garup2_u:353: padepade ca pādo 'sya sphuṭyate śīryate punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:358: mahārauravasaṃjñaṃ tu śṛṇuṣva narakaṃ khaga // GarP_2,3.10 //
GP12garup2_u:363: tasyāṃ baddhakarābhyāṃ ca padbhyāṃ caiva yamānugaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:364: mucyate pāpakṛnmadhye luṇṭhamānaḥ sa gacchati // GarP_2,3.13 //
GP12garup2_u:370: varṣāyutāyutaiḥ pāpaṃ yaiḥ kṛtaṃ duṣṭabuddhibhiḥ // GarP_2,3.16 //
GP12garup2_u:386: na caiṣāṃ jīvitabhraṃśo jāyate pakṣisattama // GarP_2,3.24 //
GP12garup2_u:387: chinnāni teṣāṃ śataśaḥ khaṇḍānyaikyaṃ vrajanti hi /
GP12garup2_u:390: aprātaṣṭhaṃ ca narakaṃ śṛṇuṣva gadato mama // GarP_2,3.26 //
GP12garup2_u:392: tānyeva tatra cakrāṇi ghaṭīyantrāṇi cānyataḥ // GarP_2,3.27 //
GP12garup2_u:396: ghaṭīyantreṣu badvā ye baddhā toyavaṭī yathā // GarP_2,3.29 //
GP12garup2_u:400: asipatravanaṃ nāma narakaṃ śṛṇu cāparam // GarP_2,3.31 //
GP12garup2_u:410: mātarbhrātastāta iti krandamānāḥ suduḥ khitāḥ // GarP_2,3.36 //
GP12garup2_u:412: teṣāṃ gatānāṃ tatrāpi ati śītiḥ samīraṇaḥ // GarP_2,3.37 //
GP12garup2_u:414: chinnāḥ patanti te bhūmau jvalatpāvakasaṃcaye // GarP_2,3.38 //
GP12garup2_u:416: sārameyāśca te śīghraṃ śātayanti śarīrataḥ // GarP_2,3.39 //
GP12garup2_u:419: ataḥ paraṃ bhīmataraṃ taptakuṃbhaṃ nibodha me /
GP12garup2_u:422: eṣu duṣkṛtakarmāṇo yāmyaiḥ kṣiptā hyadhomukhāḥ // GarP_2,3.42 //
GP12garup2_u:430: eṣa te vistareṇoktastaptakumbho mayā khaga // GarP_2,3.46 //
GP12garup2_u:436: karmaṇāṃ tāratamyena teṣuteṣu patanti hi // GarP_2,3.49 //
GP12garup2_u:437: tathā hi narako rodhaḥ śūkarastāla eva ca /
GP12garup2_u:440: adhaḥ śirāḥ pūyavaho rudhirāndhaśca viḍrabhujaḥ // GarP_2,3.51 //
GP12garup2_u:445: tāmasā narakāḥ sarve yamasya viṣaye sthitāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:446: yeṣu duṣkṛtakarmāṇaḥ patanti hi pṛthakpṛthak // GarP_2,3.54 //
GP12garup2_u:448: rogho goghno bhrūṇahā ca agnidātā naraḥ patet // GarP_2,3.55 //
GP12garup2_u:450: tāle patetkṣattrahantā hatvā vaiśyaṃ ca durgatiḥ // GarP_2,3.56 //
GP12garup2_u:454: mādhvī vikrayakartāṃ ca yastu bhaktaṃ parityajet // GarP_2,3.58 //
GP12garup2_u:455: mahājvālī duhitaraṃ snuṣāṃ gacchati yastu vai /
GP12garup2_u:456: vedo vikrīyate yaiśca vedaṃ dūṣayate tu yaḥ // GarP_2,3.59 //
GP12garup2_u:458: agamyāgāmī ca naro narakaṃ śabalaṃ vrajet // GarP_2,3.60 //
GP12garup2_u:459: vimohe patate śūre maryādāṃ yo bhinatti vai /
GP12garup2_u:460: duriṣṭaṃ kurute yastu kṛmibhakṣaṃ prapadyate // GarP_2,3.61 //
GP12garup2_u:466: kṣīraṃ surāṃ ca māsaṃ lākṣāṃ gandhaṃ rasaṃ tilān // GarP_2,3.64 //
GP12garup2_u:469: pakṣiṇaśca mṛgāṃśchā gānso 'pyevaṃ narakaṃ vrajet // GarP_2,3.65 //
GP12garup2_u:470: ājāviko māhiṣikastathā cakrī dhvajī ca yaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:473: surāpo māṃsabhakṣī ca tathā ca paśughātakaḥ // GarP_2,3.67 //
GP12garup2_u:476: patanti niraye ghore viḍbhuje nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:479: agnijvālāṃ mṛgavyādho bhojyate yatra vāyasaiḥ // GarP_2,3.70 //
GP12garup2_u:481: skandante yadi vā svapne yatino brahmacāriṇaḥ // GarP_2,3.71 //
GP12garup2_u:483: te sarve narakaṃ yānti nirayaṃ cāpyabhojanam // GarP_2,3.72 //
GP12garup2_u:485: karmāṇi ye tu kurvanti sarve nirayavāsinaḥ // GarP_2,3.73 //
GP12garup2_u:487: sudāruṇaḥ suśītātmā tasyā dhastāmasaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,3.74 //
GP12garup2_u:489: duḥ khotkarṣaśca sarveṣu karmasvapi nimittataḥ // GarP_2,3.75 //
GP12garup2_u:497: ekaṃ dinaṃ varṣaśatapramāṇaṃ narake bhavet // GarP_2,3.79 //
GP12garup2_u:502: ete caikaśaphāḥ ṣaṭ ca śṛṇu pañcanakhānataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:503: anyāsu bahupāpāsu duḥ khadāsu ca yo niṣu // GarP_2,3.82 //
GP12garup2_u:504: mānuṣyaṃ prāpyate kubjo kutsito vāmano 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:507: avaśiṣṭena pāpena puṇyena ca samanvitaḥ // GarP_2,3.84 //
GP12garup2_u:511: yathā puṇyakṛto yānti tanme nigadataḥ śṛṇu // GarP_2,3.86 //
GP12garup2_u:512: te yamena vinirdiṣṭāṃ yoniṃ puṇyagatiṃ narāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:517: jāyante nīrujāṃ gehe sa dvṛttipīrapālakāḥ // GarP_2,3.89 //
GP12garup2_u:520: jātasya mṛtyuloke vai prāṇino maraṇaṃ dhruvam /
GP12garup2_u:522: pṛthivyāṃ līyate pṛthvī āpaścaiva tathāpsu ca /
GP12garup2_u:523: tejastejasi līyate samīre ca samīraṇaḥ // GarP_2,3.92 //
GP12garup2_u:525: tatra kāmastathā krodhaḥ kāye pañcendriyāṇi ca // GarP_2,3.93 //
GP12garup2_u:526: ete tārkṣya samākhyātā dehe tiṣṭhanti taskarāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:527: kāmaḥ krodho hyahaṅkāro manastatraiva nāyakaḥ // GarP_2,3.94 //
GP12garup2_u:530: praviśetsa nave dehe pṛhe daradhe guhī yathā /
GP12garup2_u:531: śarīre ye samāsīnāḥ sarve vai sapta dhātavaḥ // GarP_2,3.96 //
GP12garup2_u:532: ṣāṭkauśiko hyayaṃ kāyaḥ sarve vātāśca dehinām /
GP12garup2_u:533: mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ tadyogādye cānye vyādhayastathā // GarP_2,3.97 //
GP12garup2_u:534: pittaṃ śleṣmā tathā majjā māṃsaṃ vai meda eva ca /
GP12garup2_u:535: asthi śukraṃ tathā snāyurdehena saha dahyati // GarP_2,3.98 //
GP12garup2_u:537: kathayāmi punasteṣāṃ śarīraṃ ca yathā bhavet // GarP_2,3.99 //
GP12garup2_u:545: ātmānaṃ ye na jānanti te narāḥ paśavaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_2,3.103 //
GP12garup2_u:550: athayāmi kramaprāptaṃ praṣṭu vā vartate spṛhā // GarP_2,3.106 //
GP12garup2_u:551: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dharmakāṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde narakatatpraveśanirgamanādivarṇanaṃ nāma tṛtīyo
GP12garup2_u:556: tasya pāpasya śuddhyarthaṃ vidheyā niṣkṛtirnaraiḥ // GarP_2,4.1 //
GP12garup2_u:559: tadardhaṃ vā tadardhaṃ vā tadardhārdhamathāpi vā /
GP12garup2_u:560: yathāśaktyā tataḥ kuryāddaśa dānāni vai śṛṇu // GarP_2,4.3 //
GP12garup2_u:562: rajataṃ lavaṇaṃ caiva dānāni daśa vai viduḥ // GarP_2,4.4 //
GP12garup2_u:563: prāyaścitte tvāgatā ye tebhyo dadyānnaro daśa /
GP12garup2_u:565: nadīṃ vaitaraṇīṃ tartuṃ dadyādvaitaraṇīṃ ca gām /
GP12garup2_u:566: kṛṣṇastanī sakṛṣṇāṅgī sā vai vaitaraṇī smṛtā // GarP_2,4.6 //
GP12garup2_u:567: tilā lohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca karpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:568: saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāva ekaikaṃ pāvanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,4.7 //
GP12garup2_u:570: ātureṇa tu deyāni padarūpāṇi me śṛṇu // GarP_2,4.8 //
GP12garup2_u:572: āsanaṃ bhājanaṃ padaṃ cāṣṭavidhaṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,4.9 //
GP12garup2_u:573: tilāpātraṃ sarpiḥ pātraṃ śayyā sopaskarā tathā /
GP12garup2_u:574: etatsarvaṃ pradātavyaṃ yadiṣṭaṃ cātmano 'pi tat // GarP_2,4.10 //
GP12garup2_u:575: aśvo rathaśca mahīṣī vyañjanaṃ vastrameva ca /
GP12garup2_u:578: prāyāścittaṃ kṛtaṃ yena daśa dānānyapi kṣitau // GarP_2,4.12 //
GP12garup2_u:580: tilapātraṃ sarpiḥ pātraṃ śayyādānaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_2,4.13 //
GP12garup2_u:584: āturasya yadā prāṇā na yānti vasudhātale // GarP_2,4.15 //
GP12garup2_u:585: lavaṇaṃ ca tadā deyaṃ dvārasyodvāṭanaṃ divaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:586: yānikāni ca dānāni svayaṃ dattāni mānavaiḥ // GarP_2,4.16 //
GP12garup2_u:588: prāyaścittaṃ kṛtaṃ yena sāṅgaṃ khaga sa vai pumān // GarP_2,4.17 //
GP12garup2_u:590: amṛtaṃ tu gavāṃ kṣīraṃ yataḥ patagasattam // GarP_2,4.18 //
GP12garup2_u:592: dānānyaṣṭau tu dattvā vai gandharvanilaye vaset // GarP_2,4.19 //
GP12garup2_u:593: ālayastatra raudre hi dahyate yena mānavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:594: chatradānena succhāyā jāyate pathi tuṣṭidā // GarP_2,4.20 //
GP12garup2_u:598: pradeśe nirjale dātā sukhī syādvai kamaṇḍaloḥ // GarP_2,4.22 //
GP12garup2_u:601: tilapātraṃ tu viprāya dattaṃ patraratha dhruvam /
GP12garup2_u:609: yo 'śvaṃ dadāti viprāya svargaloke ca tiṣṭhati /
GP12garup2_u:610: yāvanti romāṇi haye bhavanti hi khageśvara // GarP_2,4.28 //
GP12garup2_u:613: rathaṃ dvijātaye dattvā rājasūyaphalaṃ labht // GarP_2,4.30 //
GP12garup2_u:614: dugdhādhikāṃ ca mahiṣīṃ navameghavarṇāṃ santuṣṭatarṇakavalīṃ jaghanābhirāmām /
GP12garup2_u:615: dattvā suvarṇatilakāṃ dvijapuṅgavāya lokodayaṃ sa jayatīti kimatra citram // GarP_2,4.31
GP12garup2_u:619: na hīyate tasya vaṃśaḥ svargaṃ prāpnotyanuttamam // GarP_2,4.33 //
GP12garup2_u:625: so 'pi tṛptimavāpnoti vināpyannena vai tadā // GarP_2,4.36 //
GP12garup2_u:630: padepade kratusamaṃ bhavettasya na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,4.38 //
GP12garup2_u:632: mṛtyau na so 'pi saṃsāre bhūyaḥ paryaṭati dvija // GarP_2,4.39 //
GP12garup2_u:635: gataprāṇaṃ tato jñātvā snātvā putrādirāśu tam /
GP12garup2_u:638: tato mṛtasya sthāne vai ekoddiṣṭaṃ samācaret // GarP_2,4.42 //
GP12garup2_u:640: āṃsanaṃ prākṣaṇa ca syānna syādetaccatuṣṭayam // GarP_2,4.43 //
GP12garup2_u:647: piṇḍasya cālanaṃ proktaṃ naiva proktamidaṃ trikam /
GP12garup2_u:649: eṣu ṣaṭsu vidhiḥ proktaḥ śrāddheṣu malineṣu te /
GP12garup2_u:650: ṣaḍeva maraṇasthāne dvāri cātvarike tathā // GarP_2,4.48 //
GP12garup2_u:652: mṛtisthāne śavo nāma bhūmistuṣyati devatā // GarP_2,4.49 //
GP12garup2_u:656: citāyāṃ sādhaka iti sañcitau preta ucyate // GarP_2,4.51 //
GP12garup2_u:658: gāthāṃ yamasya sūktaṃ vāpyadhīyānā vrajanti hi // GarP_2,4.52 //
GP12garup2_u:660: vaivasvato na tṛpyeta surayā tviva durmatiḥ // GarP_2,4.53 //
GP12garup2_u:661: imāṃ gāthamapeteti sūktaṃ vā pathi saṃpaṭhet /
GP12garup2_u:664: tataḥ śanairbhūtale vai dakṣiṇāśirasaṃ śavam // GarP_2,4.55 //
GP12garup2_u:667: śūdrānītaiḥ kṛtaṃ karma sarvaṃ bhavati niṣphalam /
GP12garup2_u:670: pratevastraṃ dvidhā kṛtvārdhena taṃ chādayettataḥ // GarP_2,4.58 //
GP12garup2_u:672: tataḥ pūrvoktavidhinā piṇḍaṃ pretakare nyaset // GarP_2,4.59 //
GP12garup2_u:674: dāhamṛtyorantarāle vidhiḥ piṇḍasya taṃ śṛṇu // GarP_2,4.60 //
GP12garup2_u:676: anyathā copaghātācca rākṣasādyā bhavanti hi // GarP_2,4.61 //
GP12garup2_u:680: śrautena tu vidhānena hyāhitāgniṃ dahedvudhaḥ // GarP_2,4.63 //
GP12garup2_u:687: asau svargāya lokāya svāhetyuktvā tu nāmataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:689: roditavyaṃ tato gāḍhamevaṃ tasya sukhaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:694: tato jālasamīpe tu gatvā prakṣālya cāṃśukam // GarP_2,4.70 //
GP12garup2_u:696: udakaṃ tu kariṣyāmaḥ sacailaṃ puruṣāstataḥ // GarP_2,4.71 //
GP12garup2_u:698: putrādyā vṛddhapūrvāste ekavastrāḥ śikhāṃ vinā // GarP_2,4.72 //
GP12garup2_u:702: tatastaṭe samāgatya śikhāṃ baddhvā ṛjūn kuśān // GarP_2,4.74 //
GP12garup2_u:704: ādāyāñjalinā yāmyāṃ duḥ khī paitṛkatīrthataḥ // GarP_2,4.75 //
GP12garup2_u:706: bhūmāvaśmani vā sarve kṣipeyurvāgyatāḥ khaga // GarP_2,4.76 //
GP12garup2_u:710: tyajanti gotriṇaḥ sarve dināni nava kāśyapa // GarP_2,4.78 //
GP12garup2_u:714: śleṣmāśru bāndhavairmuktaṃ preto bhuṅkte yato 'vaśaḥ // GarP_2,4.80 //
GP12garup2_u:715: ato na roditavyaṃ hi kriyāḥ kāryāḥ svaśaktitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:720: pañcadhā saṃbhṛtaḥ kāyo yadi pañcatvamāgataḥ // GarP_2,4.83 //
GP12garup2_u:723: phenaprakhyaḥ kathaṃ nāśaṃ martyaloko na yāsyati /
GP12garup2_u:726: vidaśya rnibapatrāṇi niyatā dvāri veśmanaḥ // GarP_2,4.86 //
GP12garup2_u:730: śrautena tu vidhānena āhitāgniṃ dehadvadhaḥ // GarP_2,4.88 //
GP12garup2_u:734: citibhraṣṭā tu yā mohātsā prājāpatyamācaret // GarP_2,4.90 //
GP12garup2_u:735: tisraḥ koṭyordhakoṭī ya yāni lomāni mānuṣe /
GP12garup2_u:738: tadvaduddhṛtya sā nārī tenaiva saha modate // GarP_2,4.92 //
GP12garup2_u:741: brahmaghno vā kṛghno vā mittrighno vā bhavetpatiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:742: punātyavidhavā nārī tamādāya mṛtā tu yā // GarP_2,4.94 //
GP12garup2_u:745: yāvaccāgnau mṛte patyau strī nātmānaṃ pradāhayet /
GP12garup2_u:746: tāvanna mucyate sā hi strīśarīrātkathañcana // GarP_2,4.96 //
GP12garup2_u:747: mātṛkaṃ paitṛkaṃ caiva yatra caiva pradīyate /
GP12garup2_u:749: ārtārte mudite hṛṣṭā proṣite malinā kṛśā /
GP12garup2_u:750: mṛte mriyeta yā patyau sā strī jñeyā pativratā // GarP_2,4.98 //
GP12garup2_u:751: pṛthak citāṃ samāruhya na priyā gantumarhati /
GP12garup2_u:755: dahanasya vidhiḥ proktaḥ sāmānyena mayā khaga /
GP12garup2_u:759: kathaṃ dāhaḥ prakartavyastanme vada jagatpate // GarP_2,4.102 //
GP12garup2_u:761: asthīni cenna labhyante proṣitasya narasya ca /
GP12garup2_u:762: teṣāñca hi gatisthānaṃ vidhānaṃ kathayāmyaham // GarP_2,4.103 //
GP12garup2_u:763: śṛṇu tārkṣya paraṃ gopyaṃ patyurdurmaraṇeṣu yat /
GP12garup2_u:775: tattu durmaraṇaṃ jñeyaṃ yacca jātaṃ vidhaiṃ vinā /
GP12garup2_u:776: tena pāpena narakān bhuktvā pretatvabhāginaḥ // GarP_2,4.110 //
GP12garup2_u:778: na vidhānaṃ mṛtādyañca na kuryā daurdhvadaihikam // GarP_2,4.111 //
GP12garup2_u:786: nārāyaṇabaliṃ samyak tīrthe sarvaṃ prakpayet // GarP_2,4.115 //
GP12garup2_u:788: pūrvantu tarpaṇaṃ kāryaṃ vipraiḥ paurāṇavaidikaiḥ // GarP_2,4.116 //
GP12garup2_u:796: bhaktyā tatra prakurvīta śrāddhānyekādaśaiva tu // GarP_2,4.120 //
GP12garup2_u:799: haviṣyānnaṃ śubhaṃ mudrāṃ chatroṣṇīṣe ca dāpayet /
GP12garup2_u:805: śaṅkhe khaḍge 'tha vā tāmre tarpaṇañca pṛthakpṛthak /
GP12garup2_u:808: brahmā viṣṇuśca rudraśca yamaḥ pretaśca pañcamaḥ // GarP_2,4.126 //
GP12garup2_u:813: śaṅkhe vā tāmrapātre vā alābhe mṛnmaye pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:818: evaṃ viṣṇubaliṃ dattvā yathāśaktyā vidhānataḥ // GarP_2,4.131 //
GP12garup2_u:819: samuddharati tatkṣipraṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇa nāgadaṃśānmṛto yastu viśeṣastantu me śṛṇu // suvarṇabhāraniṣpannaṃ nāgaṃ kṛtvā tathaiva gām /
GP12garup2_u:823: palāśasya ca vṛntānāṃ vibhāgaṃ śṛṇu kāśyapa /
GP12garup2_u:826: vinyasya tāni vṛntāni aṅgeṣveṣu pṛthak pṛthak // GarP_2,4.136 //
GP12garup2_u:833: nārikelaṃ śiraḥ sthāneṃ tumbaṃ dadyācca tāluke /
GP12garup2_u:837: pāradaṃ retasaḥ sthāne purīṣe pittalaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:838: manaḥ śilā tathā gātre tilapakvantu sandhiṣu // GarP_2,4.142 //
GP12garup2_u:839: yavapiṣṭaṃ yathā māṃse madhu śoṇitameva ca /
GP12garup2_u:840: keśeṣu ca jaṭājūṭaṃ tvacāyāñca mṛgatvacam // GarP_2,4.143 //
GP12garup2_u:844: ghṛtaṃ nābhyāṃ pradeyaṃ syātkau pīne ca trapusmṛtam // GarP_2,4.145 //
GP12garup2_u:848: ṛddhivṛddhī bhujau dvau ca cakṣurbhyāñca kapardakam // GarP_2,4.147 //
GP12garup2_u:852: sāgnike cāpi vidhinā yajñapātraṃ nyasyetkramāt // GarP_2,4.149 //
GP12garup2_u:853: striyaḥ punantu ma śira imaṃ me varuṇena ca /
GP12garup2_u:856: tilā lauhaṃ hiraṇyañca karpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā // GarP_2,4.151 //
GP12garup2_u:858: tilapātraṃ tato dadyātpadadānaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_2,4.152 //
GP12garup2_u:860: pretamokṣaṃ tataḥ kuryāddhṛdi viṣṇuṃ prakalpyaca // GarP_2,4.153 //
GP12garup2_u:862: tacchruddhaye tu saṃskartā putrādirniṣkṛtiṃ caret // GarP_2,4.154 //
GP12garup2_u:870: akṛtvā niṣkṛtiṃ yastu kurute dahanādikam // GarP_2,4.158 //
GP12garup2_u:872: kṛtvāgnimudakaṃ snānaṃ sparśanaṃ vahanaṃ kathām // GarP_2,4.159 //
GP12garup2_u:874: eṣāmanyatamaṃ pretaṃ yo vahettu dehata vā // GarP_2,4.160 //
GP12garup2_u:876: nimitte laghuni svalpaṃ mahanmahati kalpayet // GarP_2,4.161 //
GP12garup2_u:879: lakṣaṇaṃ brūhi me svāmiṃstrayāṇāmapi suvrata // GarP_2,4.162 //
GP12garup2_u:885: gomūtraṃ gomayaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhi sarpiḥ kuśodakam /
GP12garup2_u:887: mayā te 'yaṃ samākhyāto durmṛtasya vidhiḥ khaga /
GP12garup2_u:891: evaṃ vidhiṃ tataḥ kuryāttataḥ pretaśca muktibhāk /
GP12garup2_u:892: mṛtabhrāntyā pratikṛteḥ kṛte dāhe sa vai yadi // GarP_2,4.168 //
GP12garup2_u:896: varṣe pañcadaśe pakṣin dvādaśe vā gate sati // GarP_2,4.170 //
GP12garup2_u:900: kumbhe salilamādāya pañcagavyaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_2,4.172 //
GP12garup2_u:904: pañcabhiḥ snāpayitvā tu gavyaiḥ pretāṃ rajasvalām // GarP_2,4.174 //
GP12garup2_u:906: mṛtasya pañcake dāhavidhiṃ vacmi śṛṇuṣva me // GarP_2,4.175 //
GP12garup2_u:908: revatyantaṃ sadā dūṣyamaśubhaṃ sarvadā bhavet // GarP_2,4.176 //
GP12garup2_u:910: na jalaṃ dīyate teṣu aśubhaṃ sarvadā bhavet // GarP_2,4.177 //
GP12garup2_u:914: atha vā ṛkṣamadye ca dāhastu vidhipūrvakaḥ // GarP_2,4.179 //
GP12garup2_u:920: sūtakānte tadā puttraiḥ kāryaṃ śāntikapauṣṭikam // GarP_2,4.182 //
GP12garup2_u:921: pañcakeṣu mṛto yo 'sau na satiṃ labhate naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:922: tilān gāñca suvarṇañca tamuddiśya ghṛtaṃ dadet // GarP_2,4.183 //
GP12garup2_u:928: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde dahanavidhikṛcchralakṣaṇadagdhāgamanarajasvalāmaraṇavidhipañcakamaraṇaprāyaścittanirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturtho 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:931: evaṃ dagdhvā naraṃ pretaṃ snātvā kṛtvā tilodakam /
GP12garup2_u:932: agrataḥ strījano gacchedvrajeyuḥ pṛṣṭhato narāḥ // GarP_2,5.1 //
GP12garup2_u:935: te praviśya gṛhaṃ sarve sutādyāśca sapiṇḍakāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:936: bhaveyurdaśarātraṃ vai yata āśaucakaṃ khaga // GarP_2,5.3 //
GP12garup2_u:943: mṛnmaye patraje vāpi bhuñjīraṃste ca bhājane /
GP12garup2_u:944: uvāsantu te kuryurekāhamatha vā tryaham // GarP_2,5.7 //
GP12garup2_u:946: āśaucina iti proktamāśaucasya ca vai prabho /
GP12garup2_u:947: lakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ kiyatkālaṃ bhāvyaṃ vā tadyutairnaraiḥ // GarP_2,5.8 //
GP12garup2_u:958: jalaṃ tridivamākāśe sthāpyaṃ kṣīrañca mṛnmaye // GarP_2,5.13 //
GP12garup2_u:960: kāṣṭhatraye guṇairbaddhe prītyai rātrau catuṣpathe // GarP_2,5.14 //
GP12garup2_u:961: prathame 'hni tṛtīye vā saptame navame tathā /
GP12garup2_u:962: asthisaṃcayanaṃ kāryaṃ dine tadgotrajaiḥ saha // GarP_2,5.15 //
GP12garup2_u:966: prāgudīcyāṃ caruṃ kṛtvā snātvā prayatamānasaḥ // GarP_2,5.17 //
GP12garup2_u:970: asagotraḥ sagotro vā yadi strī yati vā pumān // GarP_2,5.19 //
GP12garup2_u:978: yadāhi tryahamāśaucaṃ tadā vāñjalayo daśa // GarP_2,5.23 //
GP12garup2_u:988: vipraḥ śudhyatyapaḥ spṛṣṭvā kṣattriyo vāhanaṃ tathā // GarP_2,5.28 //
GP12garup2_u:989: vaiśyaḥ pratodaṃ raśmīnvā śūdro yaṣṭiṃ kṛtakriyaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:994: pratyahaṃ te vibhajyante caturbhāgaiḥ khagottama // GarP_2,5.31 //
GP12garup2_u:998: śirastvādyena piṇḍena pretasya kriyate tathā // GarP_2,5.33 //
GP12garup2_u:1002: jānujaṅghaṃ tathā pādau pañcamena tu sarvadā // GarP_2,5.35 //
GP12garup2_u:1006: madhyamāṃ ṣoḍaśīṃ vacmi vainateya śṛṇuṣva me // GarP_2,5.37 //
GP12garup2_u:1009: nimittaṃ durmatiṃ kṛtvā yadi nārāyaṇo baliḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1010: ekādaśāhe kartavyo vṛṣotsargo 'pi tatra vai // GarP_2,5.39 //
GP12garup2_u:1012: pretatvaṃ susthiraṃ tasya dattaiḥ śrāddhaśatairapi // GarP_2,5.40 //
GP12garup2_u:1014: niṣphalaṃ sakalaṃ vidyātpramītāya na tadbhavet // GarP_2,5.41 //
GP12garup2_u:1016: putraḥ patnyatha dauhitraḥ pitā vā duhitātha vā // GarP_2,5.42 //
GP12garup2_u:1019: alaṅkṛto vidhānena pretatvaṃ tasya no bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:1021: darbhaiḥ piṣṭaistu sampādya taṃ vṛṣaṃ mocayedvudhaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1027: tṛtīyāṃ ṣoḍaśīṃ vacmi vainateya śṛṇuṣva tām /
GP12garup2_u:1028: dvādaśa pratimāsyāni ādyaṃ ṣāṇmāsikaṃ tathā // GarP_2,5.48 //
GP12garup2_u:1030: dvādaśāhe tripakṣe ca ṣaṇmāse māsike 'bdike // GarP_2,5.49 //
GP12garup2_u:1032: yasyaitā ni na dattāni pretaśrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,5.50 //
GP12garup2_u:1034: ekādaśe dvādaśe vā dine ādyaṃ prakīrtitam // GarP_2,5.51 //
GP12garup2_u:1042: sapiṇḍīkaraṇeṣvevaṃ vidhiṃ pakṣīndra me śṛṇu // GarP_2,5.55 //
GP12garup2_u:1045: pātraṃ pretasya tatraikaṃ pitryaṃ pātratrayaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:1048: tataḥ prabhṛti vai pretaḥ pitṛsāmānyamaśnute // GarP_2,5.58 //
GP12garup2_u:1052: sāpiṇḍyantu striyā nāsti mṛte bhartuḥ striyo bhavet // GarP_2,5.60 //
GP12garup2_u:1054: śrāddhādau saha dāhe ca patipatnyorna saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,5.61 //
GP12garup2_u:1056: tāṃmṛtāhani tu samprāpte pṛthak piṇḍena yojayet // GarP_2,5.62 //
GP12garup2_u:1063: uktaṃ bhartrāpi sāpiṇḍyaṃ striyā veṣayabhedataḥ // GarP_2,5.66 //
GP12garup2_u:1064: navaśrāddhasya te kālaṃ vakṣyāmi śṛṇu kāśyapa /
GP12garup2_u:1066: dvitīyañca tato mārge viśrāmo yatra kāritaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1069: daśamaikādaśe caiva nava śrāddhāni vai khaga // GarP_2,5.69 //
GP12garup2_u:1070: śrāddhāni nava caitāni tṛtīyā ṣoḍaśī smṛtā /
GP12garup2_u:1072: prathame 'hni tṛtīye vā pañcame saptame tathā /
GP12garup2_u:1075: uktāni te mayā tāni ṛṣīṇāṃ matabhedataḥ // GarP_2,5.72 //
GP12garup2_u:1081: ekoddiṣṭaṃ me nibodha cetthamāvatsaraṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,5.75 //
GP12garup2_u:1084: pratyabdaṃ yo yathā kuryāttathā kuryātsa tānyapi /
GP12garup2_u:1085: ekādaśe dvādaśe 'hni preto bhuṅkte dinadvayam // GarP_2,5.77 //
GP12garup2_u:1087: sāpiṇḍye tu kṛte tasya pretaśabdo nivartate // GarP_2,5.78 //
GP12garup2_u:1089: annaṃ dīpo jalaṃ vastramanyadvādīyate ca yat // GarP_2,5.79 //
GP12garup2_u:1095: tasminmārge vrajatyeko gṛhīta iva markaṭaḥ // GarP_2,5.82 //
GP12garup2_u:1102: catvāriṃ śattathā sapta pratyahaṃ yāti tatra saḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1105: evaṃ krameṇa yātabye mārge pāparataistu yat // GarP_2,5.87 //
GP12garup2_u:1119: purāṇi ṣoḍaśāmuṣmanmārge tāni ca me śṛṇu // GarP_2,5.94 //
GP12garup2_u:1120: yāmyaṃ sauripuraṃ nagedvabhavanaṃ gandharvaśailāgamau krauñcaṃ krūrapuraṃ vicitrabhavanaṃ bahvāpadaṃ duḥ khadam /
GP12garup2_u:1121: nānākrandapuraṃ sutaptabhavanaṃ raudraṃ payovarṣaṇaṃ śītāḍhyaṃ bahubhītiṣoḍaśapurāṇyetānyadṛṣṭani te // GarP_2,5.95 //
GP12garup2_u:1122: tatra yāmya puraṃ gacchanputraputreti ca bruvan /
GP12garup2_u:1123: hāheti krandate nityaṃ svakṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ smaran // GarP_2,5.96 //
GP12garup2_u:1125: puṣpabhadrā nadī yatra nyagrodhaḥ priyadarśanaḥ // GarP_2,5.97 //
GP12garup2_u:1126: viśrāmecchāṃ karotyatra kārayanti na te bhaṭāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1127: kṣitau dattaṃ sutaistasya snehādvā kṛpayā tathā // GarP_2,5.98 //
GP12garup2_u:1130: jalāśayo naiva kṛto mayā tadā manuṣyatṛptyai paśupakṣitṛptaya /
GP12garup2_u:1131: gotṛptihetorna ca gocaraḥ kṛtaḥ śarīra he nistara yattvayā kṛtam //
GP12garup2_u:1132: tatra nāmnā tu rājāsau jaṅgamaḥ kāmarūpadhṛk /
GP12garup2_u:1133: bhayāt taddarśanājjātādbhuṅkte piṇḍaṃ sa śaṅkitaḥ // GarP_2,5.101 //
GP12garup2_u:1134: tripakṣe jalasaṃyuktaṃ kṣitau dattaṃ tato vrajet /
GP12garup2_u:1136: na nityadānaṃ na gavāhnikaṃ kṛtaṃ pustaṃ ca dattaṃ na hi vedaśāstrayoḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1137: purāṇadṛṣṭo na hi sevito 'dhvā śarīra he nistara yattvayā kṛtam //
GP12garup2_u:1139: māsi dvitīye yaddattaṃ bāndhavaistu tato vrajet // GarP_2,5.104 //
GP12garup2_u:1143: tṛtīye māsi samprāpte gandharvanagare śubham // GarP_2,5.106 //
GP12garup2_u:1146: mayā na dattaṃ na hutaṃ hutāśane tapo na taptaṃ himaśailagahvare /
GP12garup2_u:1147: na sevitaṃ gāṅgamaho mahājalaṃ śarīra he nistara yattvayā kṛtam //
GP12garup2_u:1152: na jñānamārgo na ca yogamārgo na karmamārgo na ca bhaktimārgaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1153: na sādhusaṅgātkimapi śrutaṃ mayā śarīra he nistara yattvayā kṛtam //
GP12garup2_u:1154: tataḥ krūrapura māsi pañcame yāti kāśyapa /
GP12garup2_u:1155: bhuvi dattaṃ piṇḍajalaṃ bhuktvā krūrapuraṃ vrajet // GarP_2,5.112 //
GP12garup2_u:1157: hā mātarhāpitarbhrātaḥ sutā hā hā mama striyaḥ // GarP_2,5.113 //
GP12garup2_u:1159: evaṃ lālapyamānaṃ te yamadūtā vadantihi // GarP_2,5.114 //
GP12garup2_u:1160: kva mātā kva pitā mūḍha kva jāyā kva sutaḥ suhṛt /
GP12garup2_u:1161: svakarmopārjite bhuṅkṣvaṃ mūrkha yātāściraṃ pathi // GarP_2,5.115 //
GP12garup2_u:1162: jānāsi śambalamalaṃ balamadhvagānāṃ no 'śambalaḥ prayatate paralokagatyai /
GP12garup2_u:1163: gantavyamasti tava niścitameva tena mārgeṇa yena na bhavet krayavikrayo
GP12garup2_u:1168: kutra yāmi na hi gāmi jīvitaṃ hā mṛtasya maraṇaṃ punarna vai /
GP12garup2_u:1169: itthameva vilapan prayātyasau yātanārhadhṛtavigrahaḥ pati // GarP_2,5.119
GP12garup2_u:1171: tatra ṣaṇmāsapiṇḍena tṛptaḥ san vrajate puraḥ // GarP_2,5.120 //
GP12garup2_u:1173: mātā bhrātā pitā putraḥ ko 'pi me vartate na vā /
GP12garup2_u:1174: yo māmuddharate pāpaṃ patantaṃ duḥ khasāgare // GarP_2,5.122 //
GP12garup2_u:1175: vrajatastatra mārge tu tatra vaitaraṇī śubhā /
GP12garup2_u:1178: te vadanti pradattā gauryadi vaitaraṇī tvayā /
GP12garup2_u:1179: nāvamenāṃ samāroha sukenottara vai nadīm // GarP_2,5.124 //
GP12garup2_u:1180: tatra yena pradattā gauḥ sa sukhenaiva tāṃ taret /
GP12garup2_u:1181: adāyī tatra ghṛṣyeta karagrāhantu nāvikaiḥ // GarP_2,5.125 //
GP12garup2_u:1183: manujānāṃ hitaṃ dānamante vaitaraṇī khaga // GarP_2,5.126 //
GP12garup2_u:1184: dattā pāpaṃ dahet sarvaṃ mama lokantu sā nayet /
GP12garup2_u:1185: maptame māsi samprāpte puraṃ bahvāpadaṃ mṛtaḥ // GarP_2,5.127 //
GP12garup2_u:1186: vrajettu sodakaṃ bhuktvā piṇḍaṃ vai saptamāsikam /
GP12garup2_u:1188: na dattaṃ na hutaṃ taptaṃ na snātaṃ na kṛtaṃ hitam /
GP12garup2_u:1189: yādṛśaṃ caritaṃ karma mūḍhātman bhuṅkṣva tādṛśam // GarP_2,5.129 //
GP12garup2_u:1190: māsyaṣṭame duḥ khade tu pare bhuktvātha sodakam /
GP12garup2_u:1191: piṇḍaṃ prayātsayau tārkṣya nānākrandapuraṃ tataḥ // GarP_2,5.130 //
GP12garup2_u:1195: navame māsi dattaṃ vai nānākrandapure tataḥ // GarP_2,5.132 //
GP12garup2_u:1197: daśame māsi dattaṃ vai sutaptabhavanaṃ tataḥ // GarP_2,5.133 //
GP12garup2_u:1201: daśame māsi piṇḍādi tatra bhuktvā prasarpati // GarP_2,5.135 //
GP12garup2_u:1202: māse caikādaśe pūrṇe puraṃ raudraṃ sa gacchati /
GP12garup2_u:1203: gacchanneva vilapate yathā pṛṣṭhe prapīḍitaḥ // GarP_2,5.136 //
GP12garup2_u:1206: kṣitau dattañca piṇḍādi bhuktvā tatra tato vrajet /
GP12garup2_u:1211: ūnābdikañca yacchrāddhaṃ tatra bhuṅkte suduḥ khitaḥ // GarP_2,5.140 //
GP12garup2_u:1212: saṃpūrṇe tu tato varṣe śītāḍhyaṃ nagaraṃ vrajet /
GP12garup2_u:1220: tato yāmyaṃ nātidūre nagaraṃ sa hi gacchati /
GP12garup2_u:1222: trayodaśa pratīhārāḥ śravaṇā nāma tatra vai /
GP12garup2_u:1225: mṛtyukālāntakādīnāṃ madhye paśyati vai yamam // GarP_2,5.147 //
GP12garup2_u:1229: tannirdiṣṭāṃ tato janturgatiṃ yāti śubhāśubhām // GarP_2,5.149 //
GP12garup2_u:1230: pāpī pāpāṃ gatiṃ yāti yathā te kathitaṃ purā /
GP12garup2_u:1232: ye tu puṇyakṛtastatra te paśyanti yamaṃ tadā /
GP12garup2_u:1234: ekādaśe dvādaśe hi ṣaṇmāse ābdike tathā /
GP12garup2_u:1235: viprān bahūn bhojayet tatra yanmahatī kṣudhā // GarP_2,5.152 //
GP12garup2_u:1237: yo na sādhayati svārthamevaṃ paścāddhikhidyate // GarP_2,5.153 //
GP12garup2_u:1240: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde varṣakṛtyayamalokamārgayātanādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:1244: akṛte tu vṛṣotsarge paralokagatirna hi // GarP_2,6.1 //
GP12garup2_u:1245: tasmāt kṛṣṇa vṛṣotsargaḥ kartavya iti me śrutam /
GP12garup2_u:1246: kiṃ phalaṃ vṛṣayajñasya purā kena kṛto hare // GarP_2,6.2 //
GP12garup2_u:1247: anaḍvān kīdṛśaḥ proktaḥ kasmin kāle viśeṣataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1248: ko vidhistasya nirdiṣṭaḥ sarvaṃ me kṛpayā vada // GarP_2,6.3 //
GP12garup2_u:1251: brahmaputreṇa yat proktaṃ rājānaṃ vīravāhanam // GarP_2,6.4 //
GP12garup2_u:1259: mune mayā kṛto dharmo yathāśakti prayatnataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1260: yamasya śāsanaṃ śrutvā bibhemi nitarāṃ hṛdi // GarP_2,6.8 //
GP12garup2_u:1262: na paśyāmi mahābhāga tathā vada dayānidhe // GarP_2,6.9 //
GP12garup2_u:1266: dānaṃ tīrthaṃ tapo yajñāḥ saṃnyāsaḥ paitṛko mahaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1268: eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ putrā yadyeko 'pi gayāṃ vrajet /
GP12garup2_u:1269: yajeta vāśvamedhena nīlaṃ vā vṛṣamutsṛjet // GarP_2,6.12 //
GP12garup2_u:1273: pretatvaṃ niścalaṃ tasya kṛtaiḥ śrāddhaistu kiṃ bhavet // GarP_2,6.14 //
GP12garup2_u:1275: vṛṣayajñaiḥ pramucyate nānyathā sādhanaiḥ khaga // GarP_2,6.15 //
GP12garup2_u:1283: lohito yastu varṇena mukhe pucche ca pāṇḍuraḥ // GarP_2,6.19 //
GP12garup2_u:1284: pītaḥ khuraviṣāṇeṣu sa nīlo vṛṣa ucyate /
GP12garup2_u:1285: śvetavarṇo bhavedvipro lohitaḥ kṣattra ucyate // GarP_2,6.20 //
GP12garup2_u:1286: pītavarṇo bhavedvaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ smṛto budhaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1294: dharmarājasya purato vācyaṃ me sukṛtaṃ vṛṣa /
GP12garup2_u:1303: pitṛparvaṇi saṃprāpte kuśāryo kānanaṃ yayau // GarP_2,6.29 //
GP12garup2_u:1309: sa tatra nagaraṃ rājan dadarśa bahuvistaram // GarP_2,6.32 //
GP12garup2_u:1317: kiṃ svapna uta māyā vai madīyo mānaso bhramaḥ // GarP_2,6.36 //
GP12garup2_u:1322: mahatyā ca śriyā yuktaṃ stūyamānaṃ suvandibhiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1323: rājāpi dṛṣṭvā taṃ vipraṃ pratyutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ // GarP_2,6.39 //
GP12garup2_u:1326: adya me saphalaṃ janma pāvitañca kulaṃ prabho /
GP12garup2_u:1327: viṣṇubhaktasya dharmasya yatte dṛggocaraṃ gataḥ // GarP_2,6.41 //
GP12garup2_u:1329: yataḥ samāgato devaḥ punastatraiva nīyatām // GarP_2,6.42 //
GP12garup2_u:1330: iti śrutvā vaco rājñaḥ papraccha dvijapuṅgavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1332: ko 'yaṃ deśa- kuto lokā uttamā madhyamādhamāḥ // GarP_2,6.43 //
GP12garup2_u:1338: virakta indriyārthebhyaḥ sa me pūjyo na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1342: anugṛhāṇa māṃ deva kṣamasva mama sāhasam /
GP12garup2_u:1343: ityuktvā darśayāmāsa mantriṇāṃ saṃjñayā bhruvaḥ // GarP_2,6.48 //
GP12garup2_u:1344: vadiṣyati samagraṃ te svayaṃ vaktuṃ na sāmpratam /
GP12garup2_u:1345: sāmantaḥ sarvavedajño jñātvā hārdaṃ nṛpasya ca // GarP_2,6.49 //
GP12garup2_u:1350: gavāṃ śuśrūṣako nityaṃ brāhmaṇānāñca pūjakaḥ // GarP_2,6.51 //
GP12garup2_u:1354: kadācidbandhubhiḥ sākaṃ kṛtvā tīrthāni bhūriśaḥ // GarP_2,6.53 //
GP12garup2_u:1360: dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ dharmanilayaṃ praklinnaṃ mānasaṃ mama /
GP12garup2_u:1362: śīryamāṇaṃ śarīraṃ hi jñātvā mṛtyuṃ puraḥ sthitam // GarP_2,6.56 //
GP12garup2_u:1364: kṛtvā tīrthāni vidhivadviśrāṇya vipulaṃ vasu // GarP_2,6.57 //
GP12garup2_u:1367: tīrthāni santi bhūrīṇi varṣai'smin bhārate śubhe // GarP_2,6.58 //
GP12garup2_u:1368: yattvayā hyupacīrṇāni tāni sarvāṇi me vada /
GP12garup2_u:1370: gaṅgā ca sūrya tanayā mahāpuṇyā sarasvatī // GarP_2,6.59 //
GP12garup2_u:1373: mṛtānāṃ yatra jantūnāṃ karṇe japati tārakam /
GP12garup2_u:1378: āgneyaṃ vāyukauberaṃ kaumāraṃ bhūruhāṃ punaḥ // GarP_2,6.63 //
GP12garup2_u:1379: saukaraṃ mathurā yatra nityaṃ sannihato hariḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1382: tāpī payoṣṇī nirvindhyā malayaḥ kṛṣṇaveṇikā // GarP_2,6.65 //
GP12garup2_u:1386: veṅkaṭādrau mahātejāḥ śrīraṅgākhyaḥ svayaṃ hariḥ // GarP_2,6.67 //
GP12garup2_u:1393: avāpa girijā devī tapasā yatra śaṅkaram /
GP12garup2_u:1404: anyānyapi ca tīrthāni kṛtāni kṛpayā tava // GarP_2,6.76 //
GP12garup2_u:1408: tvaṃ guruḥ sarvarṇānāṃ vidyayā vayasādhikaḥ // GarP_2,6.78 //
GP12garup2_u:1410: kiṃ kuryāṃ kaṃ nu pṛcche 'haṃ mano me 'ticalaṃ mune // GarP_2,6.79 //
GP12garup2_u:1412: manāgapi na sahate virahaṃ timiraṃ bruvat // GarP_2,6.80 //
GP12garup2_u:1414: śāntiṃ yathā samāyāti sampannamiva bhūsura // GarP_2,6.81 //
GP12garup2_u:1417: manastu prabalaṃ nityaṃ savikāraṃ svabhāvataḥ // GarP_2,6.82 //
GP12garup2_u:1428: śuśrūṣaṇānuvṛttyā ca praśrayeṇa damena ca // GarP_2,6.87 //
GP12garup2_u:1430: manīṣā nirmalā yena jātā mama śubhārthinī // GarP_2,6.88 //
GP12garup2_u:1433: śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyā mo hitāya tava bālaka // GarP_2,6.89 //
GP12garup2_u:1434: yena vai dhriyamāṇena ihāmutra sukhaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:1437: devatvaṃ yāti sattvena rajasā ca manuṣyatām // GarP_2,6.91 //
GP12garup2_u:1439: māturlabdhvā punarjanma mriyate ca punaḥ punaḥ // GarP_2,6.92 //
GP12garup2_u:1445: navanīyaṃ yathā dadhno jyotiḥ kāṣṭhādapi kvacit // GarP_2,6.95 //
GP12garup2_u:1446: manthanaiḥ sādhanairevaṃ paraṃ jñātvā sukhī bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:1447: ātmā nityo 'vyayaḥ satyaḥ sarvagaḥ sarvabhṛnmahān // GarP_2,6.96 //
GP12garup2_u:1453: bhaktānukampī bhagavān sādhūnāṃ rakṣaṇāya ca // GarP_2,6.99 //
GP12garup2_u:1457: tataḥ kṛtārtho bhavati sadā sarvatra niḥ spṛhaḥ // GarP_2,6.101 //
GP12garup2_u:1460: kva svapne niyataṃ dhairyamindrajāle kva satyatā /
GP12garup2_u:1461: kva nityatā śaranmeghe kva vā satyaṃ kalevare // GarP_2,6.103 //
GP12garup2_u:1464: ityuktvā te gatāḥ sarve sādhavo dīnavatsalāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1469: antarhitaṃ mahatejo yathā saudāminī divi // GarP_2,6.107 //
GP12garup2_u:1471: kāle kalevaraṃ tyaktvā gatavān harimavyayam // GarP_2,6.108 //
GP12garup2_u:1475: ityuktvā me svānubhavaṃ yayau yādṛcchiko muniḥ // GarP_2,6.110 //
GP12garup2_u:1477: ataste sādhusaṅgatyā bhaktyā ca paramātmanaḥ // GarP_2,6.111 //
GP12garup2_u:1480: kṣipraṃ naśyati dharmajña jalānāṃ śarado yathā /
GP12garup2_u:1482: pītvā te vākyapīyūṣaṃ svāntaṃ me śāntimāgamat // GarP_2,6.113 //
GP12garup2_u:1484: iti śrutvā vacastasya provāca ṛpisattamaḥ // GarP_2,6.114 //
GP12garup2_u:1487: yattvayā sukṛtaṃ bhūrivṛṣotsargaṃ vinā kṛtam // GarP_2,6.115 //
GP12garup2_u:1489: vṛṣotsargasamaṃ kiñcit sādhanaṃ na mahītale // GarP_2,6.116 //
GP12garup2_u:1491: vṛṣotsargaḥ kṛto yena aśvamedhasya yājakaḥ // GarP_2,6.117 //
GP12garup2_u:1492: ubhau samau mayā dṛṣṭau divyau tau śakrasannidhau /
GP12garup2_u:1493: atastvaṃ puṣkaraṃ gatvā vṛṣotsargaṃ vidhāya ca // GarP_2,6.118 //
GP12garup2_u:1494: tato yāhi gṛhaṃ sādho yena sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:1496: tataḥ sa punarāgatya kārtikyāṃ puṣkare vare // GarP_2,6.119 //
GP12garup2_u:1502: tena rājakule janma vīrasenasya dharmataḥ // GarP_2,6.122 //
GP12garup2_u:1504: prakurvato vṛṣotsargaṃ tatra ye paricārakāḥ // GarP_2,6.123 //
GP12garup2_u:1507: tato dūratarā ye ca dṛśyante malinā janāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1508: durbhagā malinā rūkṣāḥ kṛśā vigatavāsasaḥ // GarP_2,6.125 //
GP12garup2_u:1511: dharmyaṃ vicitramākhyānaṃ śrutaṃ me yat parāśarāt /
GP12garup2_u:1512: atastvaṃ svagṛhaṃ gaccha kṛpāṃ kṛtvā mamopari // GarP_2,6.127 //
GP12garup2_u:1513: śrutvā vipaścidvākyaṃ sa vismayaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1514: gṛhaṃ jagāma vipro 'sau prāpito rājasevakaiḥ // GarP_2,6.128 //
GP12garup2_u:1517: samācara vidhānena yadi bhīto yamādapi // GarP_2,6.129 //
GP12garup2_u:1519: mayā dharmarahasyaṃ te kathitaṃ rājasattama // GarP_2,6.130 //
GP12garup2_u:1521: vṛṣotsargaṃ na kurvīta gāṃ dadyācca payasviḥ nīm // GarP_2,6.131 //
GP12garup2_u:1523: śrutvā vākyaṃ vasiṣṭhasya rājā madhupurīṃ gataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1524: cakāra vidhivat sarvaṃ vṛṣotsargamahaṃ khaga // GarP_2,6.132 //
GP12garup2_u:1526: kālena nidhanaṃ prāpto nīto vaivasvatānugaiḥ // GarP_2,6.133 //
GP12garup2_u:1527: sa kālanagaraṃ hitvā gato dūrataraṃ pathi /
GP12garup2_u:1531: gataṃ pāpapuraṃ tattu na draṣṭavyaṃ bhavādṛśaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1534: ātmānaṃ darśayā māsa tasya rājño mahātmanaḥ // GarP_2,6.137 //
GP12garup2_u:1538: nīyatāṃ devalokāya yatra bhogāḥ supuṣkalāḥ // GarP_2,6.139 //
GP12garup2_u:1540: na jāne kena puṇyena svargaṃ nayasi māṃ vibho // GarP_2,6.140 //
GP12garup2_u:1542: tvayā kṛtāni puṇyāni dānaṃ yajñāḥ savistarāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1547: vīrabāhurdivaṃ gatvā devaiḥ saha mumoda ha // GarP_2,6.143 //
GP12garup2_u:1549: mayā te kathitaṃ pakṣin vṛṣayajñaḥ suvistaraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1550: prāṇināṃ karmanirhāraṃ śrutvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate // GarP_2,6.144 //
GP12garup2_u:1551: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvidṛ dhadṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde vṛṣotsargamāhātmyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:1555: punaranyāṃ kathāṃ brūhi yatra te mahimādbhutaḥ // GarP_2,7.1 //
GP12garup2_u:1566: jalasyonmīlya nayane diśaḥ sarvā nyabhīlayat // GarP_2,7.6 //
GP12garup2_u:1573: ete cānye ca bahavo vṛkṣāsteṣu na dṛśyate /
GP12garup2_u:1574: pakṣiṇāmapi vai panthā manuṣyasya kutaḥ punaḥ // GarP_2,7.10 //
GP12garup2_u:1578: śvāpadaiśca tathā cānyaiḥ piśācai rākṣasairvṛte // GarP_2,7.12 //
GP12garup2_u:1580: kāndiśīkaḥ samabhavaḍh yadbhaviṣyo yayau punaḥ // GarP_2,7.13 //
GP12garup2_u:1583: sa tatra vaṭavṛkṣāgre snāyuvaddhaṃ śavaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:1584: dadarśa tadbhujaścaiva pañca pretān sudāruṇām // GarP_2,7.15 //
GP12garup2_u:1592: ahaṃ pūrvamahaṃ pūrvaṃ yāmītyāktvā pradudruvuḥ // GarP_2,7.19 //
GP12garup2_u:1600: avatīrya tato vyomno gṛhītvā caraṇaiḥ // GarP_2,7.23 //
GP12garup2_u:1602: sa nīyamānamātmānaṃ vilokya viyati dvijaḥ // GarP_2,7.24 //
GP12garup2_u:1603: jagāma manasā māṃ sa śaraṇaṃ bhayavihvalaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1604: namaścakre cakradharaṃ cetasā cinmayaṃ samam // GarP_2,7.25 //
GP12garup2_u:1605: vakraṃ nakraṃ cakrapātena dūre kṛtvā hṛtvā tasya duḥ khaṃ mukundaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1608: nirbaddhānyo bhargayajñāya muktaścakro me 'sau karmapāśaṃ lunātu //
GP12garup2_u:1610: agacchaṃ sahasā tatra yatra pretaiḥ sa nīyate // GarP_2,7.28 //
GP12garup2_u:1612: papraccha na kiyantaṃ vai kālaṃ tānpṛṣṭhato 'nvagām // GarP_2,7.29 //
GP12garup2_u:1616: nikocyākṣi svapārśvaṃ sa nīto vai yakṣarāṇmayā // GarP_2,7.31 //
GP12garup2_u:1617: tamavocaṃ mahāyakṣaṃ tvaṃ hi pratibhaṭo bhava /
GP12garup2_u:1618: pretānnāśaya tadbhūyaḥ śavañca hara tadgatam // GarP_2,7.32 //
GP12garup2_u:1619: ityuktaḥ sa mahāghoraṃ kṛtvā roṣaṃ suduḥ saham /
GP12garup2_u:1620: jagrāha pretarūpaṃ tatpretānāmapi duḥ khadam // GarP_2,7.33 //
GP12garup2_u:1621: sa vivṛtya svakau bāhū sṛkkiṇī parilelihan /
GP12garup2_u:1623: bāhubhyāṃ dvau dvau ca padbhyāṃ mūrdhnaikaṃ ca samāharat /
GP12garup2_u:1625: te vivarṇamukhāḥ sarve taṃ dvijañca śavaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:1628: daṃṣṭrāghātaiśca sarve tamekaṃ pretaṃ vyadārayan // GarP_2,7.37 //
GP12garup2_u:1630: jīvaṃ na tu śavaṃ teṣāṃ jahre prāṇamivāntakaḥ // GarP_2,7.38 //
GP12garup2_u:1631: hṛtamātre śave te tu pāriyātre girau dvijam /
GP12garup2_u:1632: muktvādhamātre pramuditā ekaṃ pretaṃ sudāruṇāḥ // GarP_2,7.39 //
GP12garup2_u:1634: adṛśyatāṃ yayau te 'tha hatāśā vipramāgaman // GarP_2,7.40 //
GP12garup2_u:1636: mama sthānasya viprasya mahimneva ca tatkṣaṇe // GarP_2,7.41 //
GP12garup2_u:1637: sadyaḥ smṛtiḥ samutpannā teṣāṃ pūrvasya janmanaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1642: kiṃ māyā kimu vā svapna utāho cittavibhramaḥ // GarP_2,7.44 //
GP12garup2_u:1646: kiṃnāmānaḥ kimācārāḥ kathañcemāṃ daśāṃ gatāḥ // GarP_2,7.45 //
GP12garup2_u:1647: avinītāḥ kathaṃ pūrvaṃ vinītāḥ sāmprataṃ katham /
GP12garup2_u:1651: ahaṃ paryuṣito nāmnā eṣa sūcīmukhaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,7.47 //
GP12garup2_u:1654: pretānāṃ karmajātānāṃ kuto nāma nirarthakam // GarP_2,7.48 //
GP12garup2_u:1655: niruktimeṣāṃ nāmnāṃ vai pretā vadata mā ciram /
GP12garup2_u:1659: kadācicchrāddhakāle vai mayā vipro nimantritaḥ // GarP_2,7.50 //
GP12garup2_u:1660: sa ca kṛtvā vilambena vṛddho madgṛhamāgataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1661: akṛtaśrāddhakarmāhaṃ taṃ pākaṃ bhuktavān kṣudhā // GarP_2,7.51 //
GP12garup2_u:1663: tasmāt pāpānmṛtaḥ pāpo yoniṃ vai kutsitāṃ gataḥ // GarP_2,7.52 //
GP12garup2_u:1664: yataḥ paryuṣitaṃ dattaṃ tataḥ paryuṣitaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1669: vane tu vijane tatra pāpādhvagagatiṃ gataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1670: tasyāḥ savastraṃ pātheyaṃ tatsūnorvasanāni ca // GarP_2,7.55 //
GP12garup2_u:1674: mayātha sakalaṃ pītaṃ jalaṃ pātrāttṛṣāvatā // GarP_2,7.57 //
GP12garup2_u:1676: putraśokānmṛtā mātā kūpe prāsya nijaṃ vapuḥ // GarP_2,7.58 //
GP12garup2_u:1679: yadyapi prāpnuyāṃ bhakṣyaṃ bhakṣituntu na śakyate /
GP12garup2_u:1681: ata āsye tu vivaraṃ sūcyagreṇa samaṃmama /
GP12garup2_u:1684: purāhaṃ vaiśyajātīyaḥ sākaṃ sakhyā ca kenacit /
GP12garup2_u:1686: mitraṃ ca me bahudhanaṃ tasya lobho mahāṃstataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1691: abhūttadāti pāpasya krūrā matiratīva me // GarP_2,7.65 //
GP12garup2_u:1693: katkṛtyaṃ kurvato nāvi lokaistu jñātameva na // GarP_2,7.66 //
GP12garup2_u:1696: tatsarvaṃ svagṛhe muktvā tasya patnyai nyavedayam /
GP12garup2_u:1697: dasyubhirme hato bhrātā dhanamācchidya vai pathi // GarP_2,7.68 //
GP12garup2_u:1699: śokārtā sāpi tatkālaṃ mamatvaṃ gṛhabandhuṣu // GarP_2,7.69 //
GP12garup2_u:1701: tato niṣkaṇṭakaṃ taddhi vīkṣya hṛṣṭo gato gṛham // GarP_2,7.70 //
GP12garup2_u:1703: mitraṃ pūre hi niḥ kṣipya yadahaṃ śīghramāgataḥ // GarP_2,7.71 //
GP12garup2_u:1708: vṛddhau me pitarāvāstāṃ laghurekaḥ sahodaraḥ // GarP_2,7.73 //
GP12garup2_u:1709: śīghraṃ sa ca mayā bhrātā lubdhenaikaḥ pṛthakkṛtaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1711: adattāṃ pitarau cchannaṃ kiñcitkiñcittu tasya ca /
GP12garup2_u:1716: sosau bālo 'pi babhrāma pitṛbhyāṃ rahito dvija // GarP_2,7.77 //
GP12garup2_u:1725: tāsāṃ me kurvataḥ pūjāṃ pāpā matirajāyata // GarP_2,7.81 //
GP12garup2_u:1727: ullekhanañca ratnānāṃ netrādibhyaḥ kṛtaṃ mayā // GarP_2,7.82 //
GP12garup2_u:1729: netrāṇi ca viratnāni nṛpaścukrodha vahnivat // GarP_2,7.83 //
GP12garup2_u:1731: ābhyo ratnaṃ suvarṇañca hṛtaṃ yena bhaviṣyati // GarP_2,7.84 //
GP12garup2_u:1732: jñātaśca sa hi me vadhyo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1733: ahaṃ tatsakalaṃ jñātvā rātrāvasidharo gṛham // GarP_2,7.85 //
GP12garup2_u:1735: gṛhītvātha maṇīn svarṇaṃ niśīthe 'haṃ gato 'nyataḥ // GarP_2,7.86 //
GP12garup2_u:1745: dhṛtirjñānaṃ naiva yatra vayaṃ tatra vasāmahe // GarP_2,7.90 //
GP12garup2_u:1746: tasya pīḍāṃ vapaṃ kurmo naiva śrāddhaṃ na tarpaṇam /
GP12garup2_u:1747: yasya gehe tadaṅgāttu māṃsañca rudhiraṃ kramāt // GarP_2,7.91 //
GP12garup2_u:1748: jakṣāmaśca pibāmaśca ukta ācāra eṣa naḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1751: vamanaṃ viḍū dūṣikā ca śleṣmā mūtrāśruṇī tathā // GarP_2,7.93 //
GP12garup2_u:1752: etadbhakṣyañca pānañca mā pṛcchātaḥ paraṃ dvija /
GP12garup2_u:1753: lajjā no jāyate svāminnāhāraṃ vadatāṃ svakam // GarP_2,7.94 //
GP12garup2_u:1755: akasmājjanmanāṃ vipra smṛtiḥ prāptā tu paurvikī // GarP_2,7.95 //
GP12garup2_u:1758: evaṃ vadatsu preteṣu tathā śrutavati dvije // GarP_2,7.96 //
GP12garup2_u:1760: sa tu dṛṣṭvā dvijaśreṣṭho hṛdgataṃ puruṣaṃ puraḥ // GarP_2,7.97 //
GP12garup2_u:1765: kṛpayā yaḥ samuddhāraṃ kuruṣe vai namo 'sta te // GarP_2,7.99 //
GP12garup2_u:1766: evaṃ dvijātau bruvati prabhū taprabhaiśca mukhyāṃbaracāriyuktaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1767: tadā madicchāprabhavairvimānaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ samantādruruce giriḥ saḥ //
GP12garup2_u:1768: itthaṃ vimānena madīyalokaṃ gato dvijaraso 'pyatha pañcamistaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1770: pretāḥ saṃgavaśena nākamavansantaptako brāhmaṇo viṣvaksana iti prasiddhavibhavo nāmnā gaṇe me 'bhavat /
GP12garup2_u:1771: etatte sakalaṃ mayā nigāditaṃ yaścaitadutkīrtayedyaścedaṃ śṛṇuyānna so 'pi
GP12garup2_u:1773: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretakalpe pañcapretopākhyānaṃ nāma saptamo 'dyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:1777: kriyāḥ katividhāḥ proktā vadaitatsarvameva me // GarP_2,8.1 //
GP12garup2_u:1779: putraḥ pautraḥ prapautro vā tadbhrātā bhrātṛsantatiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1782: kuladvaye 'pi cocchinne strībhiḥ kāryāḥ kriyāḥ khaga // GarP_2,8.3 //
GP12garup2_u:1784: pūrvāḥ kriyā madhyamāśca tathā caivottarāḥ kriyāḥ // GarP_2,8.4 //
GP12garup2_u:1786: śrāddhaṃ tatra prakartavyaṃ phalaṃ tasya śṛṇuṣva me // GarP_2,8.5 //
GP12garup2_u:1795: kartavyaṃ kiṃ tadā viṣṇo puruṣeṇa vijānatā // GarP_2,8.9 //
GP12garup2_u:1797: adhikāro yadā nāsti yadi nāsti ca niścayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1798: jīvite sati jīvāya dadyācchrāddhaṃsvayaṃ naraḥ // GarP_2,8.10 //
GP12garup2_u:1800: kartāramatha bhoktāraṃ viṣṇuṃ sarveśvaraṃ yajet // GarP_2,8.11 //
GP12garup2_u:1803: agnaye kavyavāhanāya svadhā nama iti smaran /
GP12garup2_u:1804: somāyatvā pitṛmate svadhā nama iti smaran // GarP_2,8.13 //
GP12garup2_u:1806: yamāyāṅgirase cātha svadhā nama iti smaran // GarP_2,8.14 //
GP12garup2_u:1807: tayormadhye tu niḥ kṣipya viprānsaṃmantrya bho jayet /
GP12garup2_u:1808: prathamāmuttare nyasya dvitīyāṃ dakṣiṇe nyaset // GarP_2,8.15 //
GP12garup2_u:1814: sāmyāṃ dhenuṃ tato dadyādvasūddeśaṃ dvijāya tu // GarP_2,8.18 //
GP12garup2_u:1815: āgneyyāṃ cātha raudrāya yāmyāṃ sūryadvijāya tu /
GP12garup2_u:1819: tataḥ kāmaṃ kuleśānīṃ śivaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ smaret /
GP12garup2_u:1821: vastrāṇi lohakhaṇḍāni jitaṃ ta iti saṃjapan /
GP12garup2_u:1822: dakṣiṇābhimukho vahniṃ jvālayettatra ca svayam // GarP_2,8.22 //
GP12garup2_u:1824: hutvā śmāśānikaṃ homaṃ pūrṇāhutyantameva hi // GarP_2,8.23 //
GP12garup2_u:1825: niragrimatha vā bhūmiṃ yamaṃ rudrañca saṃsmaret /
GP12garup2_u:1826: hutvā prādhānike sthāne paścādāvāhayecca tam // GarP_2,8.24 //
GP12garup2_u:1830: oṃ yamāya namaśceti dvitīyaṃ tadanantaram // GarP_2,8.26 //
GP12garup2_u:1832: tato dīpte samiddhe 'gnau bhūmau prakṛtidāruṇe // GarP_2,8.27 //
GP12garup2_u:1834: yamāya dharmarājāya mṛtyave cāntakāya ca // GarP_2,8.28 //
GP12garup2_u:1840: daśa piṇḍāṃstu dāndattvā viṣṇoḥ saumyaṃ mukhaṃ smaret // GarP_2,8.31 //
GP12garup2_u:1842: āśaucānte tataḥ kuryādātmano vā marasya tu // GarP_2,8.32 //
GP12garup2_u:1844: etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ jīvacchrāddhaṃ mayā khaga // GarP_2,8.33 //
GP12garup2_u:1845: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇa garuḍasaṃvāde śrāddhakartrātmaśrāddhayornirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:1849: kasyacitkenacidrājñā kimādyā sā kṛtā purā // GarP_2,9.1 //
GP12garup2_u:1851: suparṇa śṛṇu vakṣyāmi yathā rājñā kriyā kṛtā /
GP12garup2_u:1852: āsīt kṛtayuge rājā vāṅgo vai babhruvāhanaḥ // GarP_2,9.2 //
GP12garup2_u:1854: caturbhāgāṃ bhuvaṃ kṛtsnāṃ sa bhuṅke vasudhādhipaḥ // GarP_2,9.3 //
