GP12garup2_u:2281: ko 'pi mṛtyuṃ na jayati bālo vṛddho yuvāpi vā /
GP12garup2_u:2282: sukhaduḥ khādiko vāpi punarāyāti yāti ca // GarP_2,12.22 //
GP12garup2_u:2284: ekaḥ prajāyate jantureka eva pralīyate // GarP_2,12.23 //
GP12garup2_u:2285: eko 'pi bhuṅkte sukṛtameka eva ca duṣkṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:2290: śarīraṃ vahninā dagdhaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ saha sthitam // GarP_2,12.26 //
GP12garup2_u:2291: śubhaṃ vā yadi vā pāpaṃ bhuṅkte sarvatra mānavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2292: yadanastamite sūrye na dattaṃ dhanamarthinām // GarP_2,12.27 //
GP12garup2_u:2293: na jāne tasya tadvittaṃ prātaḥ kasya bhaviṣyati /
GP12garup2_u:2294: rāraṭīti dhanaṃ tasya ko me bhartā bhaviṣyati // GarP_2,12.28 //
GP12garup2_u:2298: dhanena dhāryate dharmaḥ śraddhāpūtena cetasā // GarP_2,12.30 //
GP12garup2_u:2300: dharmācca jāyate hyartho dharmātkāmo 'pi jāyate // GarP_2,12.31 //
GP12garup2_u:2303: akiñcanā hi munayaḥ śraddhāvanto divaṃ gatāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2304: aśraddhayā hutaṃ dattaṃ tapastaptaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat /
GP12garup2_u:2305: asadityucyate pakṣinpretya ceha na tatphalam // GarP_2,12.33 //
GP12garup2_u:2306: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakādṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde mṛtasya dharmamātrānuyāyitvanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:2309: karmaṇā kena deveśa pretatvaṃ naiva jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:2310: pṛthivyāṃ sarvajantūnāṃ tad brūhi parameśvara // GarP_2,13.1 //
GP12garup2_u:2317: jīvanvāpi mṛto vāpi vṛṣotsargaṃ karoti yaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2318: pretatvaṃ na bhavettasya vinā dānamakhavrataiḥ // GarP_2,13.4 //
GP12garup2_u:2322: kiṃ phalaṃ tu bhavedante kṛtaiḥ śrāddhaistu ṣoḍaśaiḥ // GarP_2,13.6 //
GP12garup2_u:2325: nopatiṣṭhati tacchreyo dātuḥ pretasya niṣphalam // GarP_2,13.7 //
GP12garup2_u:2327: pretatvaṃ susthiraṃ tasya dattaiḥ śrāddhaśatairapi // GarP_2,13.8 //
GP12garup2_u:2330: jalena śṛṅgiṇā vāpi śastrādyairmriyate yadi // GarP_2,13.9 //
GP12garup2_u:2335: sārdhamāsena vaiśyastu śūdro māsena śudhyati // GarP_2,13.11 //
GP12garup2_u:2337: brahmacārī śucirbhūtvā na sa yātīha durgatim // GarP_2,13.12 //
GP12garup2_u:2342: puttro vā sodaro vāpi pautro bandhujanastathā /
GP12garup2_u:2343: gotriṇaścārthabhāgī ca mṛte kuryād vṛṣotsavam // GarP_2,13.15 //
GP12garup2_u:2344: putrābhāve tu patnī syāddauhittro duhītāpi vā /
GP12garup2_u:2345: puttreṣu vidyamāneṣu vṛṣaṃ nānyena kārayet // GarP_2,13.16 //
GP12garup2_u:2347: puttrā yasya na vidyante narā nāryaḥ sureśvara /
GP12garup2_u:2350: aputtrasya gatirnāsti svargo naiva ca naiva ca /
GP12garup2_u:2352: yāni kāni ca dānāni svayaṃ dattāni mānavaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2353: tānitāni ca sarvāṇi tūpatiṣṭhanti cāgrataḥ // GarP_2,13.19 //
GP12garup2_u:2355: svahastena pradattāni dehānte cākṣayaṃ phalam // GarP_2,13.20 //
GP12garup2_u:2361: vāyubhūtaḥ kṣudhāviṣṭo bhramate ca divāniśam // GarP_2,13.23 //
GP12garup2_u:2362: kṛmiḥ kīṭaḥ pataṅgo vā jāyate mriyate punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2363: asadgarbhe bhavetso 'pi jātaḥ sadyo vinaśyati // GarP_2,13.24 //
GP12garup2_u:2364: yāvatsvasthamidaṃ śarīramarujaṃ yāvajjarā dūrato yāvaccendriyaśaktirapratihatā yāvatkṣayo nāyuṣaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2365: ātmaśreyasi tāvadeva viduṣā kāryaḥ prayatno mahānsandīpte bhavane tu kūpakhananaṃ pratyudyamaḥ kīdṛśaḥ // GarP_2,13.25 //
GP12garup2_u:2366: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde vṛṣotsargadānadharmaputrādipraśaṃsanaṃ nāma trayodaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:2370: svasthāvasthena dattena vidhihīnena vā vibho // GarP_2,14.1 //
GP12garup2_u:2372: ekā gauḥ svasthacittasya hyāturasya ca gośatam /
GP12garup2_u:2379: dātavyaṃ pratyahaṃ pātre nimitteṣu viśeṣataḥ // GarP_2,14.5 //
GP12garup2_u:2381: apātre jātu gaurdattā dātāraṃ narakaṃ nayet // GarP_2,14.6 //
GP12garup2_u:2383: dehāntaraṃ pariprāpya svahastena kṛtaṃ ca yat // GarP_2,14.7 //
GP12garup2_u:2388: svalpenāpi hi vittena svayaṃ hastena yatkṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:2389: akṣayaṃ yāti tatsarvaṃ yathājyaṃ ca hutāśane // GarP_2,14.10 //
GP12garup2_u:2390: ekā caikasya dātavyā śayyā kanyā payasvinī /
GP12garup2_u:2391: sā vikrītā vā dahatyāsaptamaṃ kulam // GarP_2,14.11 //
GP12garup2_u:2395: evaṃ jñātvā khagaśreṣṭha vṛṣayajñaṃ samācaret // GarP_2,14.13 //
GP12garup2_u:2396: akṛtvā mriyate yastu aputro naiva muktibhāk /
GP12garup2_u:2397: aputro 'pi hi yaḥ kuryātsukhaṃ yāti mahāpathe // GarP_2,14.14 //
GP12garup2_u:2399: na tāṃ gatimavāpnoti vṛṣotsargeṇa yā gatiḥ // GarP_2,14.15 //
GP12garup2_u:2404: kasminkāle tithau kasyāṃ vidhinā kena tadbhavet // GarP_2,14.17 //
GP12garup2_u:2405: kṛtvā kiṃ phalamāpnoti etanme vada sāmpratam /
GP12garup2_u:2406: tvatprasādena govinda mukte bhavati mānavaḥ // GarP_2,14.18 //
GP12garup2_u:2410: śubhe lagne muhūrte vā śucau deśe samāhitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2411: brāhmaṇaṃ tu samāhūya vidhijñaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam // GarP_2,14.20 //
GP12garup2_u:2415: grahāṇāṃ sthāpanaṃ kuryātpūrvaṃ caiva khageśvara // GarP_2,14.22 //
GP12garup2_u:2416: mātṝṇāṃ pūjanaṃ kāryaṃ vasordhārāṃ ca pātayet /
GP12garup2_u:2417: vahniṃ saṃsthāpya tatraiva pūrṇaṃ homaṃ tu kārayet // GarP_2,14.23 //
GP12garup2_u:2421: pradakṣiṇaṃ tataḥ kuryāddhomānte ca visarjanam // GarP_2,14.25 //
GP12garup2_u:2423: dharma tvaṃ vṛṣarūpeṇa brahmaṇā nirmitaḥ purā // GarP_2,14.26 //
GP12garup2_u:2427: abhiṣiñcettato nīlaṃ rudrakumbho dakena tu // GarP_2,14.28 //
GP12garup2_u:2429: anna (ātma) śrāddhaṃ tataḥ kuryāddadyāddānaṃ dvijottame // GarP_2,14.29 //
GP12garup2_u:2432: nyūnaṃ saṃpūrṇatāṃ yāti vṛṣotsarge kṛte sati /
GP12garup2_u:2433: sutṛpto dustare mārge mṛto yāti na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,14.31 //
GP12garup2_u:2434: yamalokaṃ na paśyanti sadā dānaratā narāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2435: yāvanna dīyate jantoḥ śrāddhaṃ caikādaśāhikam // GarP_2,14.32 //
GP12garup2_u:2437: trayodaśā tathā sapta pañca trīṇī krameṇa tu // GarP_2,14.33 //
GP12garup2_u:2439: tilapātrāṇi kurvīta sapta pañca yathākramam // GarP_2,14.34 //
GP12garup2_u:2441: vṛṣaṃ hi śannodevīti vedoktavidhinā tataḥ // GarP_2,14.35 //
GP12garup2_u:2443: vāme cakraṃ pradātavyaṃ triśūlaṃ dakṣiṇe tathā // GarP_2,14.36 //
GP12garup2_u:2444: mūlyaṃ dadyād vṛṣasyāpi taṃ vṛṣaṃ ca visarjayet /
GP12garup2_u:2457: tilā lohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca kārpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā // GarP_2,14.43 //
GP12garup2_u:2459: tilapātrāṇi kurvīta śayyādānaṃ ca dāpayet // GarP_2,14.44 //
GP12garup2_u:2461: evaṃ yaḥ kurute tārkṣya putravānapyaputravān // GarP_2,14.45 //
GP12garup2_u:2462: sa siddhiṃ samavāpnoti yathā te brahmacāriṇaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2467: puṇyaṃ deyaṃ prayatnena pratyahaṃ vardhate khaga // GarP_2,14.48 //
GP12garup2_u:2469: tattasya cākṣayaṃ sarvaṃ vedikāyāṃ yathā kila // GarP_2,14.49 //
GP12garup2_u:2471: tathaiva pratipūjyante loke sarve ca nityaśaḥ // GarP_2,14.50 //
GP12garup2_u:2473: te yānti paramāṃllokāniti satyaṃ vaco mama // GarP_2,14.51 //
GP12garup2_u:2475: śṛṅgeṇālikhate vāpi bhūmiṃ nityaṃ praharṣitaḥ // GarP_2,14.52 //
GP12garup2_u:2484: ye namasyanti govindaṃ na teṣāṃ vidyate bhayam /
GP12garup2_u:2486: yāsyanti te parāṃllokāniti satyaṃ vaco mama /
GP12garup2_u:2491: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde godānavṛṣotsargadaśadānabhūridānādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturdaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:2498: prayāṇakāni sarvāṇi nagarāṇi ca ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,15.2 //
GP12garup2_u:2500: yamalokasya cordhvaṃ vai antarā mānuṣasya ca // GarP_2,15.3 //
GP12garup2_u:2501: kukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vāpi bhuktvā loke yathārjitam /
GP12garup2_u:2504: yasya yo vihito mṛtyuḥ sa taṃ dhruvamavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,15.5 //
GP12garup2_u:2511: ekā vaktre tu dātavyā ghrāṇayugme tathā punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2512: akṣṇośca karṇayoścaiva dvedve deye yathākramam // GarP_2,15.9 //
GP12garup2_u:2513: atha liṅge tathā caikā tvekāṃ brahmāṇḍakekṣipet /
GP12garup2_u:2514: karayugme ca kaṇṭhe ca tulasīṃ ca pradāpayet // GarP_2,15.10 //
GP12garup2_u:2518: pituḥ pretaṃ svayaṃ putraḥ skandhamāropya bāndhavaiḥ // GarP_2,15.12 //
GP12garup2_u:2520: adagdhapūrvā yā bhūmiścitāṃ tatraiva kārayet // GarP_2,15.13 //
GP12garup2_u:2525: bībhatsaṃ dāruṇaṃ rūpaṃ praṇaiḥ kaṇṭhaṃ samāśritaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2526: phenamudgirate kopi mukhaṃ lālākulaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,15.16 //
GP12garup2_u:2529: duḥ khena pāpino yānti yamamārge ca durgame /
GP12garup2_u:2532: āhūya pāpinaḥ sarvānyamo daṇḍena rajjayet // GarP_2,15.19 //
GP12garup2_u:2538: aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo hāhā kurvan kalevarāt // GarP_2,15.22 //
GP12garup2_u:2540: nirviceṣṭaṃ śarīraṃ tu prāṇairmuktaṃ jugupsitam // GarP_2,15.23 //
GP12garup2_u:2544: dānaṃ vittādṛtā vācaḥ kīrtidharmau tathāyuṣaḥ // GarP_2,15.25 //
GP12garup2_u:2546: tasyaivaṃ nīyamānasya dūtāḥ santarjayanti hi // GarP_2,15.26 //
GP12garup2_u:2547: darśayanto bhayaṃ tīvraṃ narakāya punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2548: śīghraṃ pracala duṣṭātman gato 'sitvaṃ yamālaye // GarP_2,15.27 //
GP12garup2_u:2550: evaṃ vācastadā śṛṇvanbandhūnāṃ ruditaṃ tathā // GarP_2,15.28 //
GP12garup2_u:2552: sthāne śrāddhaṃ prakurvīta tathā cekādaśe 'hani // GarP_2,15.29 //
GP12garup2_u:2554: mṛtasthāne tathā dvāre catvare tārkṣya kāraṇāt // GarP_2,15.30 //
GP12garup2_u:2555: viśrāme kāṣṭhacayane tathā sañcayane ca ṣaṭ /
GP12garup2_u:2556: śṛṇu tatkāraṇaṃ tārkṣya ṣaṭ piṇḍaparikalpane // GarP_2,15.31 //
GP12garup2_u:2557: mṛtasthāne śavo nāma tena nāmnā pradīyate /
GP12garup2_u:2560: dvāre tu piṇḍaṃ deyaṃ ca pānthamityabhidhāya tu // GarP_2,15.33 //
GP12garup2_u:2562: catvare khecaro nāma tamuddiśya pradāpayet // GarP_2,15.34 //
GP12garup2_u:2564: viśrāme bhūtasaṃjño 'yaṃ tena tatra pradāpayet // GarP_2,15.35 //
GP12garup2_u:2565: piśācā rākṣasā yakṣā ye cānye diśi vāsinaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2568: citāyāṃ sādhakaṃ nāma vadantyeke khageśvara // GarP_2,15.37 //
GP12garup2_u:2572: anyathā copaghātāya pūrvoktāste bhavanti hi // GarP_2,15.39 //
GP12garup2_u:2573: utkrāme prathamaṃ piṇḍaṃ tathā cārdhapayepi ca /
GP12garup2_u:2574: citāyāṃ tu tṛtīyaṃ syāttrayaḥ piṇḍāśca kalpitāḥ // GarP_2,15.40 //
GP12garup2_u:2588: yamāya cāntakāyeti mṛtyave brahmaṇe tathā // GarP_2,15.47 //
GP12garup2_u:2590: ūrdhvaṃ tu jvālayedvahniṃ pūrvabhāge citāṃ punaḥ // GarP_2,15.48 //
GP12garup2_u:2592: asau svargāya lokāya svāhā jvalati pāvakaḥ // GarP_2,15.49 //
GP12garup2_u:2594: tato dāhaḥ prakartavyaḥ putreṇa kila niścitam // GarP_2,15.50 //
GP12garup2_u:2595: roditavyaṃ tato gāḍhamevaṃ tasya sukhaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:2598: tāvadbhūtāḥ pratīkṣante taṃ pretaṃ bāndhavārthinam // GarP_2,15.52 //
GP12garup2_u:2604: dvārasya dakṣiṇe bhāge gomayaṃ gaurasarṣapān // GarP_2,15.55 //
GP12garup2_u:2606: bhakṣayennimbapatrāṇi ghṛtaṃ prāśya gṛhaṃ vrajet // GarP_2,15.56 //
GP12garup2_u:2608: aśrupātaṃ na kurvīta dadyādasmai jalāñjalīn // GarP_2,15.57 //
GP12garup2_u:2610: ato na roditavyaṃ hi kriyāḥ kāryāḥ svaśaktitaḥ // GarP_2,15.58 //
GP12garup2_u:2611: dugdhaṃ ca mṛnmaye pātre toyaṃ dadyāddinatrayam /
GP12garup2_u:2612: sūrye cāstaṃ gate tārkṣya valabhyāṃ catvare 'pi vā // GarP_2,15.59 //
GP12garup2_u:2614: śmaśānaṃ catvaraṃ gehaṃ vīkṣanyāmyaiḥ sa nīyate // GarP_2,15.60 //
GP12garup2_u:2615: garte piṇḍā daśāhaṃ ca dātavyāśca dinedine /
GP12garup2_u:2618: puttreṇa hi kriyā kāryā bhāryayā tadabhāvataḥ // GarP_2,15.62 //
GP12garup2_u:2620: śmaśāne cānyatīrthe vā jalaṃ piṇḍaṃ ca dāpayet // GarP_2,15.63 //
GP12garup2_u:2624: pratyahaṃ te vibhajyante caturbhāgāḥ khageśvara // GarP_2,15.65 //
GP12garup2_u:2630: nāma gotraṃ samuccārya yaddattaṃ taddaśāhikam // GarP_2,15.68 //
GP12garup2_u:2632: prathame 'hani yaḥ piṇḍastena mūrdhā prajāyate // GarP_2,15.69 //
GP12garup2_u:2633: grīvā skandhau dvitīye ca tṛtīye hṛdayaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:2634: caturthena bhavetpṛṣṭhaṃ pañcame nābhireva ca // GarP_2,15.70 //
GP12garup2_u:2635: ṣaṭ saptame kaṭī guhyamṛrū cāpyaṣṭame tathā /
GP12garup2_u:2636: tālū pādau ca navame daśame 'hni kṣudhā bhavet // GarP_2,15.71 //
GP12garup2_u:2637: dehaṃ prāptaḥ kṣudhāviṣṭo gṛhe dvāre ca tiṣṭhati /
GP12garup2_u:2638: daśame 'hani yaḥ piṇḍastaṃ dadyādāmiṣeṇa tu // GarP_2,15.72 //
GP12garup2_u:2640: atastvāmiṣabāhyena kṣudhā tasya na naśyati // GarP_2,15.73 //
GP12garup2_u:2645: trayodaśe 'hni sa preto nīyate ca mahāpathe /
GP12garup2_u:2646: piṇḍajaṃ dehamāśritya divā naktaṃ bubhukṣitaḥ // GarP_2,15.76 //
GP12garup2_u:2648: kṣudhā tṛṣṇātmikā caiva savva saumyaṃ kṛtātmanām // GarP_2,15.77 //
GP12garup2_u:2653: gṛhīto yamapāśaiśca hāheti rudite tu saḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2654: svagṛhaṃ tu parityajya yāmyaṃ puramanuvrajet // GarP_2,15.80 //
GP12garup2_u:2655: krameṇa yāti sa pretaḥ puraṃ yāmyaṃ śubhāśubham /
GP12garup2_u:2656: atītya tānitānyeva mārge puravarāṇi ca // GarP_2,15.81 //
GP12garup2_u:2658: kroñcaṃ krūrapuraṃ vicitrabhavanaṃ bahvāpadaṃ duḥ khadam // GarP_2,15.82
GP12garup2_u:2659: nānākrandapuraṃ sutaprabhavanaṃ raudraṃ payovarṣaṇaṃ śītāḍhyaṃ bahudharmabhītabhavanaṃ yāmyaṃ puraṃ cāgrataḥ // GarP_2,15.83 //
GP12garup2_u:2661: tasminmārge brajatyeko gṛhīta iva markaṭaḥ // GarP_2,15.84 //
GP12garup2_u:2662: tathava sa vrajanmārge putraputreti ca bruvan /
GP12garup2_u:2663: hāheti krandate nityaṃ kīdṛśaṃ tu mayā kṛtam // GarP_2,15.85 //
GP12garup2_u:2665: mahatā puṇyayogena mānuṣyaṃ janma labhyate // GarP_2,15.86 //
GP12garup2_u:2666: na tatprāpya pradattaṃ hi yācakebhyaḥ svakaṃ dhanam /
GP12garup2_u:2669: sukhasya duḥ khasya na kopi dātā paro dadātīti kubuddhireṣā /
GP12garup2_u:2670: purā kṛtaṃ karma sadaiva bhujyate dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam //
GP12garup2_u:2671: mayā na dattaṃ na hutaṃ hutāśane tapo na taptaṃ himaśailagahvare /
GP12garup2_u:2672: na sevitaṃ gāṅgamaho mahājalaṃ dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam //
GP12garup2_u:2673: na nityadānaṃ na gāvāhnikaṃ kṛtaṃ na vedadānaṃ na ca śāstrapustakam /
GP12garup2_u:2674: purā nadṛṣṭaṃ na ca sevito 'dhvā dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam //
GP12garup2_u:2675: jalāśayo naiva kṛto hi nirjale manuṣyahetoḥ paśupakṣihetave /
GP12garup2_u:2676: gotṛptihetorna kṛtaṃ hi gocaraṃ dehinkvacinnastara yattvayā kṛtam //
GP12garup2_u:2677: mayā na bhuktaṃ patisaṅgasaukhyaṃ vahnipraveśo na kṛto mṛte sati /
GP12garup2_u:2678: tasminmṛte tadvratapālanaṃ vā dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam //
GP12garup2_u:2680: nārīśarīraṃ bahuduḥ khabhājanaṃ labdhaṃ mayā pūrvakṛtairvikarmabhiḥ //
GP12garup2_u:2681: uktāni vācyāni mayā narāṇāmataḥ śṛṇuṣvāvahito 'pi pakṣin /
GP12garup2_u:2682: strīṇāṃ śarīraṃ pratilabhya dehī bravīti karmāṇi kṛtāni pūrvam //
GP12garup2_u:2683: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmadṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde yamalokavistāratanmāhātmyatadyānanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:2687: krandamānasya nitarāṃ pīḍitasya ca kiṅkaraiḥ // GarP_2,16.1 //
GP12garup2_u:2689: aṣṭādaśe tvahorātre pūrvaṃ yāmyapuraṃ vrajet // GarP_2,16.2 //
GP12garup2_u:2690: tasminpuravare ramye pretānāṃ ca gaṇo mahān /
GP12garup2_u:2692: pure sa tatra viśrāmaṃ prāpyate yamakiṅkaraiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2693: jāyāputrādikaṃ saukhyaṃ smarettatra suduḥ khitaḥ // GarP_2,16.4 //
GP12garup2_u:2695: svadhanaṃ svakalatrāṇi gṛhaṃ putrāḥ sukhāni ca // GarP_2,16.5 //
GP12garup2_u:2696: bhṛtyamitrāṇi cānyacca sarvaṃ śocati vai tadā /
GP12garup2_u:2699: kva dhanaṃ kva sutā jāyā kva gṛhaṃ kva tvamīdṛśaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2700: svakarmopārjitaṃ bhuṅkṣva ciraṃ gaccha mahāpathe // GarP_2,16.7 //
GP12garup2_u:2701: jānāsi śaṃbalavaśaṃ balamadhvagānāṃ no śaṃbalaḥ prayatate paralokapāntha /
GP12garup2_u:2702: gantavyamasti tava niścitameva tena mārgeṇa yatra bhavataḥ krayavikrayau na // GarP_2,16.8
GP12garup2_u:2705: atra dattaṃ sutaiḥ pātre (traiḥ) snehādvā kṛpayātha vā /
GP12garup2_u:2706: māsikaṃ piṇḍamaśrāti tataḥ sauripuraṃ vrajet // GarP_2,16.10 //
GP12garup2_u:2707: tatra nāmnā tu rājā vai jaṅgamaḥ kālarūpadhṛk /
GP12garup2_u:2708: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhayabhītastu viśrāme kurute matim // GarP_2,16.11 //
GP12garup2_u:2710: traipakṣike tu yaddattaṃ tatpuraṃ sa vyatikramet // GarP_2,16.12 //
GP12garup2_u:2712: gacchanvanāni raudrāṇi dṛṣṭvā krandati tatra saḥ // GarP_2,16.13 //
GP12garup2_u:2713: bhīṣaṇaiḥ kliśyamānastu rudate ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2715: bhuktvā cānnaṃ jalaṃ pītvā yaddattaṃ vāndhavairiha /
GP12garup2_u:2718: tṛtīyaṃ māsikaṃ bhuktvā tatra gacchatyasau puraḥ // GarP_2,16.16 //
GP12garup2_u:2719: śailāgamaṃ caturthe sa māse prāpnoti vai puram /
GP12garup2_u:2721: caturthamāsike śrāddhaṃ bhukte tatra sukhī bhavet // GarP_2,16.18 //
GP12garup2_u:2722: tato yāti puraṃ pretaḥ krūraṃ māse tu pañcame /
GP12garup2_u:2723: iha dattaṃ sutairbhuṅkte preto vai tatpure sthitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2724: ṣaṣṭhe māsi tataḥ preto yāti krauñcābidhaṃ puram // GarP_2,16.19 //
GP12garup2_u:2726: muhūrtārdhaṃ tu viśramya kampamānaḥ suduḥ khitaḥ // GarP_2,16.20 //
GP12garup2_u:2728: prayāti citranagaraṃ vicitro yatra pārthivaḥ // GarP_2,16.21 //
GP12garup2_u:2732: mārge punaḥ punastasya bubhukṣā pīḍayatyalam // GarP_2,16.23 //
GP12garup2_u:2734: saukhyaṃ yo me janayati patataḥ śokasāgare // GarP_2,16.24 //
GP12garup2_u:2740: vayaṃ tvāṃ tārayiṣyāmaḥ sukheneti vadanti te // GarP_2,16.27 //
GP12garup2_u:2741: antaraṃ dehi bho pāntha bahulā cedrucistava /
GP12garup2_u:2742: tena tatra pradattā gaustayā nāvā prasarpati /
GP12garup2_u:2743: manujānāṃ hitaṃ dānamante vaitaraṇī smṛtā // GarP_2,16.28 //
GP12garup2_u:2744: parāpāpaṃ dahetsarvaṃ viṣṇulokaṃ ca sā nayet /
GP12garup2_u:2745: na dattā cetkhagaśreṣṭha tāṃ sametya samajjati // GarP_2,16.29 //
GP12garup2_u:2747: deyā ca viduṣe dhenustāṃ nadīṃ tartumicchatā // GarP_2,16.30 //
GP12garup2_u:2749: pātheyārthaṃ mayā kiñcinna pradattaṃ dvijāyaca // GarP_2,16.31 //
GP12garup2_u:2750: na dattaṃ na hutaṃ japtaṃ na snātaṃ na kṛtaṃ stutam /
GP12garup2_u:2751: yādṛśaṃ karma caritaṃ mūḍha bhuṅkṣveti tādṛśam // GarP_2,16.32 //
GP12garup2_u:2753: vaitaraṇyāḥ parataṭe bhuṅkte dattaṃ ghaṭādikam // GarP_2,16.33 //
GP12garup2_u:2755: tārkṣya tatra viśeṣeṇa bhojayīta dvijāñchubhān // GarP_2,16.34 //
GP12garup2_u:2757: prayāti pratyahaṃ tārkṣya ahorātreṇa karśitaḥ // GarP_2,16.35 //
GP12garup2_u:2758: saptame māsi samprāpte puraṃ bahvāpadaṃ vrajet /
GP12garup2_u:2759: tatra bhuktva pradattaṃ yacchrāddhaṃ saptamamāsikam // GarP_2,16.36 //
GP12garup2_u:2762: svayaṃ ca śūnyahṛdayaḥ samākrandati duḥ khitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2763: tanmāsikaṃ ca yacchrāddhaṃ bhuktvā tatra sukhī bhavet // GarP_2,16.38 //
GP12garup2_u:2764: vihāya tatpuraṃ preto yāti taptapuraṃ prati /
GP12garup2_u:2766: dvijabhojyaṃ piṇḍadānaṃ kṛtaṃ śrāddhaṃ sutena yat // GarP_2,16.39 //
GP12garup2_u:2767: māsi vai daśame prāpte raudraṃ sthānaṃ sa gacchati /
GP12garup2_u:2768: daśame māsi yaddattaṃ tadbhuktvā ca prayāti saḥ // GarP_2,16.40 //
GP12garup2_u:2770: meghāstatra pravarṣanti pretānāṃ duḥ khadāyakāḥ // GarP_2,16.41 //
GP12garup2_u:2772: dvādaśe māsi yacchrāddhaṃ tatra bhuṅkte suduḥ śitaḥ // GarP_2,16.42 //
GP12garup2_u:2773: kiñcinnyūne tato varṣe sārdhe caikādaśe 'tha vā /
GP12garup2_u:2774: yāti śītapuraṃ tatra śītaṃ yatrātiduḥ khadam // GarP_2,16.43 //
GP12garup2_u:2775: śītārtaḥ kṣudhitaḥ so 'tha vīkṣate hi diśo daśa /
GP12garup2_u:2776: tiṣṭhettu bāndhavaḥ ko 'pi yo me duḥkhaṃ vyapohati // GarP_2,16.44 //
GP12garup2_u:2777: kiṅkarāstaṃ vadantyevaṃ kva te puṇyaṃ hi tādṛśam /
GP12garup2_u:2778: śrutvā teṣāṃ tu tadvākyaṃ hā daiva iti bhāṣate // GarP_2,16.45 //
GP12garup2_u:2779: daivaṃ hi pūrvasukṛtaṃ tanmayā naiva sañcitam /
GP12garup2_u:2780: evaṃ sañcintya bahuśo dhairyamālambate punaḥ // GarP_2,16.46 //
GP12garup2_u:2785: śubhāśubhaṃ tu yatkarma te vicārya punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2786: śravaṇā brahmaṇaḥ putrā manuṣyāṇāṃ ca ceṣṭitam /
GP12garup2_u:2787: kathayanti tadā loke pūjitāḥ pūjitāḥ svayam // GarP_2,16.49 //
GP12garup2_u:2788: naraistuṣṭaiśca puṣṭaiśca yatproktaṃ ca kṛtaṃ ca yat /
GP12garup2_u:2789: sarvamāvedayanti sma citragupte yame ca tat // GarP_2,16.50 //
GP12garup2_u:2793: evaṃ teṣāṃ śaktirasti yartye martyādhikāriṇaḥ // GarP_2,16.52 //
GP12garup2_u:2795: jāyante tasya te saumyāḥ sukhamṛtyupradāyinaḥ // GarP_2,16.53 //
GP12garup2_u:2796: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretayātrādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:2799: eko me saṃśayo deva hṛdaye samprabādhate /
GP12garup2_u:2800: śramaṇāḥ kasya putrāśca kathaṃ yamapure sthitāḥ // GarP_2,17.1 //
GP12garup2_u:2801: mānuṣaiśca kṛtaṃ karma kasmājjānanti te prabho /
GP12garup2_u:2802: kathaṃ śṛṇvanti te sarve kasmājjñānaṃ samāgatam // GarP_2,17.2 //
GP12garup2_u:2809: kṣīrodasāgare pūrvaṃ mayi supte jagatpatau // GarP_2,17.5 //
GP12garup2_u:2812: brahmaṇā nirmitaṃ pūrvaṃ viṣṇunā pālitaṃ tadā /
GP12garup2_u:2813: rudraḥ saṃhāramūrtiśca nirmito brahmaṇā tataḥ // GarP_2,17.7 //
GP12garup2_u:2818: yoyo hi nirmitaḥ pūrvaṃ tattatkarma samācaret /
GP12garup2_u:2823: saṃcintya brahmaṇo mantraṃ vibudhaiḥ preritastadā // GarP_2,17.12 //
GP12garup2_u:2826: yoyaṃ vadati lokesmiñchubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham /
GP12garup2_u:2827: prāpayanti tataḥ śīghraṃ brahmaṇaḥ karṇagocaram // GarP_2,17.14 //
GP12garup2_u:2829: sarve śṛṇvanti yatpakṣiṃstenaiva śravaṇā matāḥ // GarP_2,17.15 //
GP12garup2_u:2830: sthitvā caiva tathākāśe jantūnāṃ ceṣṭitaṃ ca yat /
GP12garup2_u:2831: tajjñātvā dharmarājāgre mṛtyukāle vadanti ca // GarP_2,17.16 //
GP12garup2_u:2832: dharmaṃ cārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca kathayanti te /
GP12garup2_u:2835: uttamā dhamamārgeṇa vainateya prayānti hi // GarP_2,17.18 //
GP12garup2_u:2839: pāṣāṇaiḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ kliṣṭaḥ pāśabaddho 'tha yāti vai // GarP_2,17.20 //
GP12garup2_u:2845: dvādaśaṃ sakalatraṃ ca mama prītyai prapūjayet // GarP_2,17.23 //
GP12garup2_u:2846: devaiḥ sarvaiśca saṃpūjya svargaṃ yānti sukhepsayā /
GP12garup2_u:2849: śravaṇānāṃ ca māhātmyamutpattiṃ ceṣṭitaṃ śubham // GarP_2,17.25 //
GP12garup2_u:2850: śṛṇoti pakṣiśārdūla sa ca pāpairna lipyate /
GP12garup2_u:2851: iha loke sukhaṃ bhuktvā svargaloke mahīyate // GarP_2,17.26 //
GP12garup2_u:2852: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretaklape śravaṇamahātmyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptadaso 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:2855: śravaṇānāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā kṣaṇaṃ dhyātvā punastataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2858: citraguptastataḥ sarvaṃ karma tasmai vadatyatha // GarP_2,18.2 //
GP12garup2_u:2859: vācaiva yatkṛtaṃ karma kṛtaṃ caiva tu kāyikam /
GP12garup2_u:2860: mānasaṃ ca tathā karma kṛtaṃ bhuṅkte śubhāśubham // GarP_2,18.3 //
GP12garup2_u:2862: viśrānti dāni sarvāṇi sthānāni kathitāni te // GarP_2,18.4 //
GP12garup2_u:2864: divā rātrau tamuddiśya sthāne dīpaprado bhavet // GarP_2,18.5 //
GP12garup2_u:2866: dīpte 'dhvani ca te yānti dīpo dattaśca yairnaraiḥ // GarP_2,18.6 //
GP12garup2_u:2867: kārtike ca caturdaśyāṃ dīpadānaṃ sukhāya vai /
GP12garup2_u:2873: tadahni dīyate sarvaṃ dvādaśāhe viśeṣataḥ // GarP_2,18.10 //
GP12garup2_u:2877: eka evāsti sarvatre vyavahāraḥ khagādhipa // GarP_2,18.12 //
GP12garup2_u:2881: mṛte yadbāndhavairdattaṃ tadāśritya sukhī bhavet // GarP_2,18.14 //
GP12garup2_u:2884: dīyate kasya deveśa tadvadasva yathātatham // GarP_2,18.15 //
GP12garup2_u:2887: āsanaṃ bhājanaṃ caiva padaṃ saptavidhaṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,18.16 //
GP12garup2_u:2888: ātapastatra yo raudro dahyate yena mānavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2891: aśvārūḍhāśca gacchanti dadate ya upānahau // GarP_2,18.18 //
GP12garup2_u:2892: āsane svāgate (bhojane) caiva dattaṃ tasmai dvijāyate /
GP12garup2_u:2893: sukhena bhuṅkte sa pretaḥ pathi gacchañchanaiḥ śanaiḥ // GarP_2,18.19 //
GP12garup2_u:2905: mahiṣīratha (dugdha) dānācca sukhī bhavati niścitam // GarP_2,18.25 //
GP12garup2_u:2908: sa gacchati mahāmārge taddattaṃ kena gṛhyate // GarP_2,18.26 //
GP12garup2_u:2910: gṛhṇāti varuṇo dānaṃ mama haste prayacchati /
GP12garup2_u:2911: ahaṃ ca bhāskare deve bhāskarātso 'śnute sukham // GarP_2,18.27 //
GP12garup2_u:2913: sarve te narakaṃ yānti yāvatpāpasya saṃkṣayaḥ // GarP_2,18.28 //
GP12garup2_u:2917: teṣāṃ madhye śreṣṭhatamā ghorā yā ekaviṃśatiḥ // GarP_2,18.30 //
GP12garup2_u:2924: yeṣāṃ tu narake ghore bahvabdāni gatāni vai /
GP12garup2_u:2925: santātarnaiva vidyate dūtatvaṃ te tu (pretya) yānti hi // GarP_2,18.34 //
GP12garup2_u:2926: yamena preṣitāste vai mānuṣasya mṛtasya tu /
GP12garup2_u:2929: māsānte bhojanaṃ piṇḍameke yacchanti tatra vai // GarP_2,18.36 //
GP12garup2_u:2930: tṛptiṃ prayānti te sarve pratyahaṃ caiva vatsaram /
GP12garup2_u:2935: jāmadagnyasyeva rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā tejaḥ prasarpati // GarP_2,18.39 //
GP12garup2_u:2940: vāsāṃsi jīrṇāni yathā vihāya navāni gṛhṇāti naro 'parāṇi /
GP12garup2_u:2941: tathā śarīrāṇi vihāya jīrṇānyanyāni saṃyāti navāni dehī // GarP_2,18.42 //
GP12garup2_u:2942: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmadṛpretadṛśrīkṛṣṇagaruḍa saṃvāde vṛṣotsarganānādānaphalayamalokagamanakarmajadehaprāptinirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:2946: te dehaṃ sa samāsādya yamena saha gacchati // GarP_2,19.1 //
GP12garup2_u:2952: dattaṃ tenaiva tṛpyanti yamasya puracāriṇaḥ // GarP_2,19.4 //
GP12garup2_u:2953: gatvā ca tatra te sarve pratīhāraṃ vadanti hi /
GP12garup2_u:2956: tatra gatvā pratīhāro brūte tasya śubhāśubham // GarP_2,19.6 //
GP12garup2_u:2958: paśyanti ca durātmāno yamarūpaṃ subhīṣaṇam // GarP_2,19.7 //
GP12garup2_u:2959: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhayabhītastu hāheti vadate janaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2960: kṛtaṃ dānaṃ ca yairmartyaisteṣāṃ nāsti bhayaṃ kvacit // GarP_2,19.8 //
GP12garup2_u:2961: prāptaṃ sukṛtinaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthānācca lati sūryajaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2962: eṣa me maṇḍalaṃ bhittvā brahmalokaṃ prayāsyati // GarP_2,19.9 //
GP12garup2_u:2964: eṣa mārgo viśālo 'tra na kenāpya nugamyate /
GP12garup2_u:2965: dānapuṇyaṃ vinā vatsa na gaccheddharmamandiram // GarP_2,19.10 //
GP12garup2_u:2966: tasminmārge tu raudre vai bhīṣaṇā yamakiṅkarāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2969: gṛhṇanti māsamāsānte pādaśeṣaṃ tu tadbhavet // GarP_2,19.12 //
GP12garup2_u:2974: daivikīṃ paitṛkīṃ yoniṃ mānuṣīṃ vātha nārakīm // GarP_2,19.14 //
GP12garup2_u:2976: mānuṣyaṃ tattvataḥ prāpya sa puttraḥ puttratāṃ vrajet // GarP_2,19.15 //
GP12garup2_u:2977: yathāyathā kṛtaṃ karma tāntāṃ yoniṃ vrajennaraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2980: yadā bhavati mānuṣyaṃ tadā dharmaṃ samācaret // GarP_2,19.17 //
GP12garup2_u:2981: kṛmayo bhasma viṣṭhā vā dehānāṃ prakṛtiḥ sadā /
GP12garup2_u:2982: andhakūpe mahāraudre dīpahastaḥ pātettu vai // GarP_2,19.18 //
GP12garup2_u:2984: yastatprāpya careddharmaṃ sa gacchetparamāṃ gatim // GarP_2,19.19 //
GP12garup2_u:2985: api jānanvṛthā dharmaṃ duḥ khamāyāti yāti ca // GarP_2,19.20 //
GP12garup2_u:2986: jātīśatena labhate kila mānuṣatvaṃ tatrāpi durlabhataraṃ khaga bho dvijatvam /
GP12garup2_u:2987: yastatra pālayati lālayati vratāni tasyāmṛtaṃ bhavati hastagataṃ prasādāt // GarP_2,19.21
GP12garup2_u:2988: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde yamamandirapraveśatadājñālabdhamanuṣyādi dehāṃntaraprāptinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:2991: ye kecitpretarūpeṇa kutra vāsaṃ labhanti te /
GP12garup2_u:2992: pretalokādvinirmuktāḥ kathaṃ kutra vrajanti te // GarP_2,20.1 //
GP12garup2_u:2998: pakṣirāja śṛṇuṣva tvaṃ yatra pretāścaranti vai /
GP12garup2_u:3003: te vyavasyanti ca pretā vadhopāyaṃ ca bandhuṣu // GarP_2,20.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3006: svaṃ veśma punarāgatya mitrasthāne viśanti te /
GP12garup2_u:3013: pibanti te ca pānīyaṃ bhojanocchiṣṭayojitam // GarP_2,20.11 //
GP12garup2_u:3016: kathaṃ kurvanti te pretāḥ kena rūpeṇa kasya kim /
GP12garup2_u:3017: jñāyate kena vidhinā jalpanti na vadanti vā // GarP_2,20.13 //
GP12garup2_u:3018: enaṃ chindhi manomohaṃ mama cedicchasi priyam /
GP12garup2_u:3019: kalikāle hṛṣīkeśa pretatvaṃ jāyate bahu // GarP_2,20.14 //
GP12garup2_u:3022: jīvansa dṛśyate snehī mṛto duṣṭatvamāpnuyāt // GarP_2,20.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3024: satyavāk priyavādī ca na pretaiḥ sa hi pīḍyate // GarP_2,20.16 //
GP12garup2_u:3028: kṛtādau dvāparānte ca na preto naiva pīḍanam /
GP12garup2_u:3033: virodho bandhubhiḥ sārdhaṃ pretadoṣeṇa kāśyapa // GarP_2,20.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3039: syāddhantakalaho nityaṃ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3043: paradravyāṇāṃ ca hartā sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.25 //
GP12garup2_u:3045: loke kalahakārī ca sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.26 //
GP12garup2_u:3047: pretapīḍā tu sā jñeyā satyaṃsatyaṃ khageśvara // GarP_2,20.27 //
GP12garup2_u:3048: hīnajātyā ca sambandho hīnakarma karoti yaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3049: adharme ramate nityaṃ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.28 //
GP12garup2_u:3053: jāyā saṃpīḍhyate yacca sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3055: abhāvo jāyate dharme sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3057: pratyakṣaṃ vā parokṣaṃ vā sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3060: strīṇāṃ garbhavināśaḥ syānna puṣpaṃ dṛśyate tathā /
GP12garup2_u:3061: bālānāṃ maraṇaṃ yatra sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3063: svayameva na kurvīta sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.35 //
GP12garup2_u:3064: tīrthe gattvā parāsaktaḥ svakṛtyaṃ ca parityajet /
GP12garup2_u:3065: dharmakārye na sampattiḥ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.36 //
GP12garup2_u:3067: paradrohe matiścaiva sā pīḍā pretasaṃbhavā // GarP_2,20.37 //
GP12garup2_u:3068: puṣpaṃ yatra na dṛśyena phalaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:3069: viraho bhāryayā yatra sā pīḍā pretasagbhavā // GarP_2,20.38 //
GP12garup2_u:3070: yeṣāṃ vai jāyate cihnaṃ sadoccāṭaparaṃ nṛṇām /
GP12garup2_u:3071: svakṣetre niṣphalaṃ tejaḥ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.39 //
GP12garup2_u:3073: na prītirnāpi saukhyaṃ ca sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.40 //
GP12garup2_u:3074: pitṛvākyaṃ na kurute svapatnīṃ ca na sevate /
GP12garup2_u:3075: sadā krūramatirvyagraḥ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.41 //
GP12garup2_u:3079: pretatvaṃ jāyate tārkṣya pīḍyante yena jantavaḥ // GarP_2,20.43 //
GP12garup2_u:3081: yo vai na manyate pretānmṛtaḥ pretatvamāpnuyāt // GarP_2,20.44 //
GP12garup2_u:3082: pretadoṣaḥ kule yasya sukhaṃ tasya na vidyate /
GP12garup2_u:3084: tṛtīye pañcame puṃsi vaṃśacchedo hi jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:3086: ye kecitpetarūpā vikṛtamukhadṛśo raudrarūpāḥ karālā manyante naiva gotraṃ sutaduhitṛpitṝn bhrātṛjāyāṃ vadhūṃ vā /
GP12garup2_u:3087: kṛtvā kāmyaṃ ca rūpaṃ sukhagatirahitā bhāṣamāṇā yatheṣṭaṃ hā kaṣṭaṃ bhoktukāmā vidhivaśapatitāḥ saṃsmaranti svapākam // GarP_2,20.47 //
GP12garup2_u:3088: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pratakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretāvāsatadbādhāprakāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma viṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3092: yanmuktau ca manuṣyāṇāṃ na pīḍā jāyate punaḥ // GarP_2,21.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3094: teṣāṃ kadā bhavenmuktiḥ pretatvaṃ na kathaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,21.2 //
GP12garup2_u:3095: pretatve hi pramāṇaṃ ca kati varṣāṇi saṃkhyayā /
GP12garup2_u:3098: muktiṃ prāyanti te pretāstadahaṃ kathayāmi te /
GP12garup2_u:3099: yadaiva manujo 'vaiti mama pīḍā kṛtā tviyam // GarP_2,21.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3101: svapne dṛṣṭaḥ śubho vṛkṣaḥ phalitaścūtacampakaḥ // GarP_2,21.5 //
GP12garup2_u:3102: vipro vā vṛṣabho devo bhramate tīrthago yadi /
GP12garup2_u:3103: evaṃ dṛṣṭo yadā svapno mṛtaḥ ko 'pisvagotrajaḥ // GarP_2,21.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3107: dharmāpāyaṃ prakurute pretapīḍā tadā vrajet // GarP_2,21.8 //
GP12garup2_u:3108: tadā tatra vināśāya cittabhaṅgaṃ karoti sā /
GP12garup2_u:3110: aśreyasi pravṛtti ca prerayanti punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3111: uccāṭanaṃ ca krūratvaṃ sarvaṃ pretakṛtaṃ khaga // GarP_2,21.10 //
GP12garup2_u:3113: tasya karmaphalaṃ sādhu pretavṛttiśca śāśvatī // GarP_2,21.11 //
GP12garup2_u:3114: sa bhavettena muktastu dattaṃ śreyaskaraṃ param /
GP12garup2_u:3115: svayaṃ tṛpyati bhoḥ pakṣinyasyoddeśena dīyate // GarP_2,21.12 //
GP12garup2_u:3116: śṛṇu satyamidaṃ tārkṣya yaddadāti bhunakti saḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3117: ātmānaṃ śreyasā yuñjyātpretastṛptiṃ ciraṃ vrajet // GarP_2,21.13 //
GP12garup2_u:3119: ajñātayastu ye duṣṭāḥ pīḍayanti svavaṃśajān // GarP_2,21.14 //
GP12garup2_u:3122: sadā bandhuṣu yacchanti vṛddhimṛddhiṃ khagādhipa // GarP_2,21.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3124: na prāpayati mūḍhātmā pretaśāpaiḥ sa lipyate // GarP_2,21.16 //
GP12garup2_u:3127: evaṃ bruvanti te pretāḥ punaryābhyaṃ samāśritāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3130: nāma gotraṃ na dṛśyeta pratītirnaiva jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:3132: na svapnaścaiṣṭitaṃ naiva darśanaṃ na kadācana /
GP12garup2_u:3133: kiṃ kartavyaṃ suraśreṣṭha tatra me brūhi niścitam // GarP_2,21.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3138: kṛtvā kṛṣṇabaliṃ caiva puraścaraṇa pūrvakam // GarP_2,21.22 //
GP12garup2_u:3140: kṛtena tena vighnāni vinaśyanti khageśvara // GarP_2,21.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3143: vimuktaḥ sarvapīḍābhya iti satyaṃ vaco mama // GarP_2,21.24 //
GP12garup2_u:3146: navame daśame varṣe pikṣuddeśena vai pumān /
GP12garup2_u:3147: gāyattrīmayutaṃ japtvā daśāṃśena ca homayet // GarP_2,21.26 //
GP12garup2_u:3154: anyā yā devatā loke na dehaprabhavo hi tāḥ // GarP_2,21.29 //
GP12garup2_u:3156: deho datto hi yenaivaṃ ko 'nyaḥ pūjyatamastataḥ // GarP_2,21.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3158: tatsarvamātmanā bhuṅkte dānaṃ vedavido viduḥ // GarP_2,21.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3160: tasmātputtra iti prokta iha cāpi paratra ca // GarP_2,21.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3164: yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi pretacihnaṃ na paśyati // GarP_2,21.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3165: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakādṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde svapnādhyāyo nāmaikaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3168: sambhavanti kathaṃ pretāḥ kena teṣāṃ gatirbhavet /
GP12garup2_u:3169: kīdṛkteṣāṃ bhavedrūpaṃ bhojanaṃ kiṃ bhavetprabho // GarP_2,22.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3170: suprītāste kathaṃ pretāḥ kva tiṣṭhanti sureśvara /
GP12garup2_u:3171: prasannaḥ kṛpayā deva praśramenaṃ vadasva me // GarP_2,22.2 //
GP12garup2_u:3174: jāyante te mṛtāḥ pretāstāñchṛṇuṣva vadāmyaham // GarP_2,22.3 //
GP12garup2_u:3176: prapāṃ sadma suvṛkṣāṃśca tathā bhojanaśālikāḥ // GarP_2,22.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3180: karṣayanti ca ye lobhātpretāste vai bhavanti hi // GarP_2,22.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3190: rajasvalādidoṣaiśca na ca bhūmau matāśca ye // GarP_2,22.11 //
GP12garup2_u:3192: sūtakaiḥ śvādisaṃparkaiḥ pretabhāvā iha kṣitau // GarP_2,22.12 //
GP12garup2_u:3194: te sarve pretayonisthā vicaranti marusthale // GarP_2,22.13 //
GP12garup2_u:3195: mātaraṃ bhaginīṃ bhāryāṃ snuṣāṃ duhitaraṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:3196: adṛṣṭadoṣāṃ tyajati sa preto jāyatedhruvam // GarP_2,22.14 //
GP12garup2_u:3200: viśvāsaghātī krūrastu sa preto jāyate dhruvam // GarP_2,22.16 //
GP12garup2_u:3208: kena vā mucyate kasmāttanme brūhi pitāmaha /
GP12garup2_u:3209: yacchrutvā na punarmohamevaṃ yāsyā mi suvrata // GarP_2,22.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3211: yenaiva jāyate preto yenaiva sa vimucyate /
GP12garup2_u:3212: prāpnoti narakaṃ ghoraṃ dustaraṃ daivatairapi // GarP_2,22.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3215: śrūyate hi purā vatsa brāhmaṇaḥ śaṃsitavrataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3216: nāmnā santaptakaḥ khyāta stapor'the vanamāśritaḥ // GarP_2,22.22 //
GP12garup2_u:3218: yajansa sakalānyajñānyuktyā kālaṃ ca vikṣipan // GarP_2,22.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3225: bahūnyabdāni vijane vane tasya gatāni vai /
GP12garup2_u:3226: tasya buddhistato jātā tīrthānugamanaṃ prati // GarP_2,22.27 //
GP12garup2_u:3231: dadarśādhvani gacchansa pañca pretān sudāruṇān // GarP_2,22.29 //
GP12garup2_u:3236: papraccha madhurābhāṣī ke yūyaṃ vikṛtānanāḥ // GarP_2,22.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3237: kiñcāśubhaṃ kṛtaṃ karma yena prāptāḥ stha vaikṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:3238: kathaṃ vā caikataḥ karma prasthitāḥ kutra niścitam // GarP_2,22.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3240: svaiḥ svaistu karmabhiḥ prāptaṃ pretatvaṃ hi dvijottama /
GP12garup2_u:3243: hatavākyā hataśrīkā hata saṃjñā vicetasaḥ // GarP_2,22.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3244: na jānīmo diśaṃ tāta vidiśaṃ cātiduḥ khitāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3245: kva nu gacchāmahe mūḍhāḥ piśācāḥ karmajā vayam // GarP_2,22.35 //
GP12garup2_u:3246: na mātā na pitāsmākaṃ pretatvaṃ karmabhiḥ svakaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3247: prāptāḥ sma sahasā jātaduḥ khodvegasamākulam // GarP_2,22.36 //
GP12garup2_u:3251: śīghrago rogha (ha) kaścaiva pañcamo lekhakaḥ smatṛtaḥ // GarP_2,22.38 //
GP12garup2_u:3252: evaṃ nāmnā ca sarve vai saṃprāptāḥ pretatāṃ vayam /
GP12garup2_u:3257: mayā svādu sadā bhuktaṃ dattaṃ paryuṣitaṃ dvija // GarP_2,22.40 //
GP12garup2_u:3258: śīghraṃ gacchati vipreṇa yācitaḥ kṣudhitena vai /
GP12garup2_u:3260: śīghraṃ gacchati vipreṇa yācitaḥ kṣudhitena vai /
GP12garup2_u:3267: tena karmavipākena lekhako nāma cocyate // GarP_2,22.45 //
GP12garup2_u:3268: pretatvaṃ karmabhāvena prāptaṃ nāmāni ca dvija /
GP12garup2_u:3269: meṣānano lekhako 'yaṃ rodha (ha) kaḥ parvatānanaḥ // GarP_2,22.46 //
GP12garup2_u:3273: sarve ca vikṛtākārā lamboṣṭhā vikṛtānanāḥ // GarP_2,22.48 //
GP12garup2_u:3275: etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ pretatve kāraṇaṃ mayā // GarP_2,22.49 //
GP12garup2_u:3276: jñānino 'pi vayaṃ sarve jātāḥ sma tava darśanāt /
GP12garup2_u:3277: yatra te śravaṇe śraddhā tatpṛccha kathayāmi te // GarP_2,22.50 //
GP12garup2_u:3282: yadi te śravaṇe śraddhā āhārāṇāṃ dvijottama /
GP12garup2_u:3283: asmākaṃ tu mahībhāga śṛṇutvaṃ susamāhitaḥ // GarP_2,22.52 //
GP12garup2_u:3289: yacchrutvā garhase brahman bhūyobhūyaśca garhitam // GarP_2,22.54 //
GP12garup2_u:3291: ucchiṣṭaiścaiva cānyaiśca pretānāṃ bhojanaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,22.55 //
GP12garup2_u:3293: malināni prasūtāni pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai // GarP_2,22.56 //
GP12garup2_u:3294: nāsti satyaṃ gṛhe yatra na śaucaṃ na ca saṃyamaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3295: patitairdasyubhiḥ saṅgaḥ pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai // GarP_2,22.57 //
GP12garup2_u:3297: svādhyāya vratahīnāni pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai // GarP_2,22.58 //
GP12garup2_u:3298: na lajjā na ca maryādā yadātra strījito gṛhī /
GP12garup2_u:3299: guravo yatra pūjyā na pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai // GarP_2,22.59 //
GP12garup2_u:3300: yatra lobhastathā krodho nidrā śoko bhayaṃ madaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3301: ālasyaṃ kalaho nityaṃ pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai // GarP_2,22.60 //
GP12garup2_u:3302: bhartṛhīnā ca yā nārī paravīryaṃ niṣevate /
GP12garup2_u:3303: bījaṃ mūtrasamāyurkta pretā bhuñjanti tattu vai // GarP_2,22.61 //
GP12garup2_u:3304: lajjā me jāyate tāta vadato bhojanaṃ svakam /
GP12garup2_u:3305: yatstrīrajo yonigataṃ pretā bhuñjanti tattu vai // GarP_2,22.62 //
GP12garup2_u:3307: yathā na bhavitā pretastanme vada tapodhana /
GP12garup2_u:3308: nityaṃ mṛtyurvaraṃ jantoḥ pretatvaṃ mā bhavetkvacit // GarP_2,22.63 //
GP12garup2_u:3311: vrataiśca vividhaiḥ pūto na preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.64 //
GP12garup2_u:3313: aparaiḥ sukṛtaiḥ pūto na preto na preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.65 //
GP12garup2_u:3317: vidyādo 'bhayadaścaiva na preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.67 //
GP12garup2_u:3318: śūdrānnena tu bhuktena jaṭharasthena yo mṛtaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3319: durmṛtyunā mṛto yaśca sa preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.68 //
GP12garup2_u:3321: kārubhiśca rato nityaṃ sa preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.69 //
GP12garup2_u:3323: ajñānādbhakṣayanmāṃsaṃ sa preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.70 //
GP12garup2_u:3324: devadravyaṃ ca brahmasvaṃ gurudravyaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12garup2_u:3325: kanyāṃ dadāti śulkena sa preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.71 //
GP12garup2_u:3326: mātaraṃ bhaginīṃ bhāryāṃ snuṣāṃ duhitaraṃ tathāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3332: hartā hemnaśca bhūmeśca sa predṛ // GarP_2,22.74 //
GP12garup2_u:3334: evaṃ bruvati vai vipre ākāśe dundubhisvanaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3337: svargaṃ gatā vimānaiste divyaiḥ saṃpṛcchya taṃ munim // GarP_2,22.76 //
GP12garup2_u:3343: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe bhīṣma yudhiṣṭhirasaṃvāde pretatvotpattitanmuktipeñcapretopākhyāna nirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3347: vadanti vā kadācitkiṃ tadvadasva sureśvara // GarP_2,23.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3349: teṣāṃ svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi cihnaṃ svapnaṃ yathātatham /
GP12garup2_u:3352: tatra yacchanti liṅgāni darśayanti khageśvara // GarP_2,23.3 //
GP12garup2_u:3354: hayo gajo vṛṣo martyodṛśyate vikṛtānanaḥ // GarP_2,23.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3355: śayānaṃ viparītaṃ tu ātmānaṃ ca viparyayam /
GP12garup2_u:3357: svapne narau hi nigaḍairbadhyate bahudhā yadi /
GP12garup2_u:3358: annaṃ ca yācate svapne kuveṣaḥ pūrvajo mṛtaḥ // GarP_2,23.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3360: ātmanastu paro vāpi tṛṣārtastu jalaṃ pibet // GarP_2,23.7 //
GP12garup2_u:3362: utpatya gaganaṃ yāti tīrthe yāti kṣudhāturaḥ // GarP_2,23.8 //
GP12garup2_u:3364: liṅge gaje tathā deve bhūte prete niśācare // GarP_2,23.9 //
GP12garup2_u:3366: svakalatraṃ svabandhuṃ vā svasutaṃ svapatiṃ vibhum /
GP12garup2_u:3368: yācate yaḥ paraṃ svapne kṣuttṛḍbhyāṃ ca pariplutaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3371: pitā bhrātā kalatraṃ ca pretadoṣaistu paśyati // GarP_2,23.12 //
GP12garup2_u:3373: kṛtvā snānaṃ gṛhe tīrthe śrīvṛkṣe tarpaṇaṃ jalaiḥ // GarP_2,23.13 //
GP12garup2_u:3377: paṭhate śṛṇute vāpi pretacihnaṃ vinaśyati // GarP_2,23.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3378: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretakṛtitaduktitaccihnatadvimuktyupāyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma trayoviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3382: kasmānmṛtyumavāpnoti rājā vā śrotriyopi vā // GarP_2,24.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3384: vedairuktaṃ tu yadvākyaṃ śataṃ jīvati mānuṣe // GarP_2,24.2 //
GP12garup2_u:3385: jīvanti mānuṣe loke sarve varṇā dvijātayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3387: na dṛśyate kalau tacca kasmāddeva samādiśa /
GP12garup2_u:3391: taporato yogaśīlo mahājñānī ca yo naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3394: kasmānmṛtyumavāpnoti rājā vā śrotriyo 'pi vā // GarP_2,24.7 //
GP12garup2_u:3396: sādhusādhu mahāprājña yastvaṃ bhakto 'si me priyaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3399: tato vakṣyāmi pakṣīndra kāśyapeya mahādyute // GarP_2,24.9 //
GP12garup2_u:3401: vikarmaṇaḥ prabhāveṇa śīghraṃ cāpi vinaśyati // GarP_2,24.10 //
GP12garup2_u:3411: prāpayanti vaśaṃ mṛtyostato yāti ca yātanām /
GP12garup2_u:3412: svakarmāṇi parityajya mukhyavṛttāni yāni ca // GarP_2,24.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3416: snānaṃ dānaṃ japo homo svādhyāyo davartāccanam // GarP_2,24.17 //
GP12garup2_u:3417: yasmindine na sevyante sa vṛthā divaso nṛṇām /
GP12garup2_u:3420: yatprātaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ sāyaṃ nūnamannaṃ vinaśyati // GarP_2,24.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3422: gataṃ jñātvā tu pakṣīndra vapurardhaṃ svakarmabhiḥ // GarP_2,24.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3428: anekabhavasambhūtaṃ pātakaṃ tu tridhā kṛtam // GarP_2,24.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3429: yadā prāpnoti mānuṣyaṃ tadā sarvaṃ tapatyapi /
GP12garup2_u:3436: na jānātiḥ khagaśreṣṭha bālabhāvaṃ samāśritaḥ // GarP_2,24.27 //
GP12garup2_u:3437: yauvane timirāndhaśca yaḥ paśyati sa muktibhāk /
GP12garup2_u:3438: ādhānānmṛtyumāpnoti bālo vā sthaviro yuvā // GarP_2,24.28 //
GP12garup2_u:3441: taporato yogaśīlo mahājñānī ca yo naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3443: vinā mānupadehaṃ tu sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ na vindati // GarP_2,24.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3447: yoniṃ pūrayate yasmānmṛto 'pyāyāti yāti ca // GarP_2,24.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3450: iti kṛṣṇavacaḥ śrutvā garuḍo vākyamabravīt // GarP_2,24.33 //
GP12garup2_u:3454: kathaṃ kiṃ kena dātavyaṃ mṛtānte ko vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3457: yadi garbho vipadyate stravate vāpi yoṣitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3460: tato jāte vipanne tu ā cūḍākaraṇācchiśoḥ // GarP_2,24.37 //
GP12garup2_u:3461: dugdhaṃ bhojyaṃ tāśakti bālānāṃ ca pradīyate /
GP12garup2_u:3462: ā cūḍātpañcavarṣe tu dehadāho vidhīyate // GarP_2,24.38 //
GP12garup2_u:3463: dugdhaṃ tasya pradeyaṃ syādbālānāṃ bhojanaṃ śubham /
GP12garup2_u:3466: dātavyaṃ tu khagaśreṣṭha ṛṇasambandhakastu saḥ // GarP_2,24.40 //
GP12garup2_u:3467: jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyurdhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca /
GP12garup2_u:3472: purāṇe gīyate gāthā sarvathā pratibhāti me // GarP_2,24.43 //
GP12garup2_u:3473: miṣṭānnaṃ bhojanaṃ deyaṃ dāne śaktistu durlabhā /
GP12garup2_u:3479: pāpaprabhāvānnarakaṃ prayāti punardaridraḥ punareva pāpī // GarP_2,24.46
GP12garup2_u:3480: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśākhye dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde 'lpāyurmaraṇahe tubālāntyeṣṭyornirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturviśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3484: jīvanvāpi mṛto vāpi pañcavarṣādhiko 'pi vā // GarP_2,25.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3485: pūrṇe tu pañcame varṣe pumāṃścaiva pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3489: garbhe naṣṭe kriyā nāsti dugdhaṃ deyaṃ mṛte śiśau /
GP12garup2_u:3490: paraṃ ca pāyasaṃ kṣīraṃ dadyādvalavipattitaḥ // GarP_2,25.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3494: bāle vā taruṇe vṛddhe ghaṭo bhavati vai mṛte // GarP_2,25.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3496: tataḥ paraṃ khagaśreṣṭha dehadāho vidhoyate // GarP_2,25.7 //
GP12garup2_u:3502: ā pañca varṣātkaumāraḥ paugaṇḍo navahāṃyanaḥ // GarP_2,25.10 //
GP12garup2_u:3504: mṛto 'pi pañcame varṣe avṛtaḥ savṛto 'pi vā // GarP_2,25.11 //
GP12garup2_u:3510: brahmabījodbhavāḥ putrā devarṣoṇāṃ ca vallabhāḥ // GarP_2,25.14 //
GP12garup2_u:3512: bālo vṛddho yubā vāpi ghaṭamicchanti dehinaḥ // GarP_2,25.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3513: sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ sadā vetti dehī vai sarvagastviha /
GP12garup2_u:3516: tasmāddeyāni dānāni mṛte bāle suniścitam // GarP_2,25.17 //
GP12garup2_u:3520: dvādaśe hani samprāpte kuryācchrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,25.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3522: udakumbhapradānaṃ ca pada (upa) dānāni yāni ca // GarP_2,25.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3526: yadā nakriyate sarvaṃ mudgalatvaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_2,25.22 //
GP12garup2_u:3527: vratātprāṅgeva deyaṃ tu tataḥ pitṛgaṇasya ca /
GP12garup2_u:3530: apasavyaṃ ca kartavyaṃ kṛte yānti parāṃ gatim // GarP_2,25.24 //
GP12garup2_u:3534: ghaṭādiṣu pṛthak sarvaṃ paśya rūpaṃ ca tatsamam // GarP_2,25.26 //
GP12garup2_u:3536: yā yasya prakṛtiḥ pūrvaṃ śukraśoṇitasaṅgame // GarP_2,25.27 //
GP12garup2_u:3540: sadṛśaḥ ko 'pi loke 'sminna bhūto na bhaviṣyati // GarP_2,25.29 //
GP12garup2_u:3541: andhādandho na bhavati mūkānmūko na jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:3543: anurūpā na dṛśyante madīyaṃ vacanaṃ śṛṇu // GarP_2,25.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3546: saṃgṛhītaḥ suto yastu dāsīputtraśca tena kim // GarP_2,25.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3548: bhavenna duhitā yasya na dauhitro na vā sutaḥ // GarP_2,25.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3549: śrāddhaṃ tasya kathaṃ kāryaṃ vidhinā kena tadbhavet /
GP12garup2_u:3551: mukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu putrasya mucyate paitṛkādṛṇāt // GarP_2,25.33 //
GP12garup2_u:3553: lokānantyaṃ divaḥ prāptiḥ puttrapauttra prapauttrakaiḥ // GarP_2,25.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3556: kurvantyanye sutāḥ śrāddhame koddiṣṭaṃ na pārvaṇam /
GP12garup2_u:3558: śrāddhaṃ sāṃvatsaraṃ kurvañjāyate narakāya vai // GarP_2,25.36 //
GP12garup2_u:3560: saṃgṛhītaḥ sutaḥ kuryādekoddiṣṭaṃ na pārvaṇam // GarP_2,25.37 //
GP12garup2_u:3561: pratyabdaṃ pitṛmātṛbhyāṃ śrāddhaṃ dattvā na lipyate /
GP12garup2_u:3562: ekoddiṣṭaṃ parityajya pārvaṇaṃ kurute yadi // GarP_2,25.38 //
GP12garup2_u:3566: saṃgṛhītasuto bhūtvā pākaṃ vā yaḥ prayacchati // GarP_2,25.40 //
GP12garup2_u:3571: yastu pravrajitājjāto brāhmaṇyāṃ śūdrataśca yaḥ // GarP_2,25.42 //
GP12garup2_u:3574: taiḥ suvṛttaiḥ sukhaṃ prāpyaṃ kuvṛttairnarakaṃ vrajet /
GP12garup2_u:3579: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dhamakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasavāde mṛtabālāntyeṣṭibhinnābhinnasutakṛtāntyeṣṭyorvarṇanaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3582: satyaṃ brūhi suraśreṣṭha kṛpāṃ kṛtvā mayi prabho /
GP12garup2_u:3583: mṛtānāṃ caiva jantūnāṃ kadā kuryātsapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,26.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3584: sapiṇḍatve kuto yānti asapiṇḍe kuto gatiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3589: agnyārohe kathaṃ śrāddhaṃ vṛṣotsargaḥ kathaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,26.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3591: kathayasva prasādena hītāya jagatāṃ prabho // GarP_2,26.5 //
GP12garup2_u:3595: sapiṇḍane tato vṛtte pitṛlokaṃ sa gacchati /
GP12garup2_u:3600: sahapiṇḍe kṛte pretastato yāti parāṃ gatim /
GP12garup2_u:3601: tannāma samparityajya tataḥ pitṛgaṇo bhavet // GarP_2,26.9 //
GP12garup2_u:3604: vivāhaṃ naiva kurvīta mṛte ca gṛhamedhini /
GP12garup2_u:3610: niragnikaḥ sāgniko vā dvādaśāhe sapiṇḍayet // GarP_2,26.14 //
GP12garup2_u:3611: dvādaśāhe tripakṣe vā ṣaṇmāse vatsare 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:3620: etaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ śrāddhaiḥ preto muktastu jāyate // GarP_2,26.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3622: yāvajjīva ca sadbhatryā na kuryātsahapiṇḍatām // GarP_2,26.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3625: āsurādivivā heṣu yā vyūḍhā kanyakā bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:3628: puttrābhāve tu patnī syātpatnyabhāve sahodaraḥ // GarP_2,26.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3629: bhrātā vā bhrātṛputtro vā sapiṇḍaḥ śiṣya eva vā /
GP12garup2_u:3632: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryaṃ putrahīne nare khaga // GarP_2,26.25 //
GP12garup2_u:3634: sarvete tena putreṇa putriṇo manurabravīt // GarP_2,26.26 //
GP12garup2_u:3642: ye sapiṇḍīkṛtāḥ pretāsteṣāṃ na syātpṛthak kriyā // GarP_2,26.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3643: sapiṇḍane kṛte vatsa pṛthaktvaṃ tu vigarhitam /
GP12garup2_u:3644: yastu kuryātpṛthak piṇḍaṃ pitṛhā so 'bhijāyate // GarP_2,26.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3646: pṛthak piṇḍe kṛte paścātpunaḥ kuryātsapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,26.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3648: ātmānaṃ ca tathā pretaṃ sa nayeddamaśāsanam // GarP_2,26.33 //
GP12garup2_u:3650: ghaṭādi bhojanaṃ nityaṃ padadānāni yāni ca /
GP12garup2_u:3651: sapiṇḍīkaraṇe vṛtte ekasyaiva tu dāpayet // GarP_2,26.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3655: divyadeho vimānasthaḥ sukhaṃ yāti yamālayam // GarP_2,26.36 //
GP12garup2_u:3656: jīvamāne ca pitari na hi puttre sapiṇḍatā /
GP12garup2_u:3657: strīṇāṃ sapiṇḍanaṃ nāsti tathā bhartari jīvati // GarP_2,26.37 //
GP12garup2_u:3659: tasyā bhartṛdine kāryaṃ vṛṣotsargādikaṃ ca yat // GarP_2,26.38 //
GP12garup2_u:3663: putreṇaiva pṛthak śrāddhaṃ kṣayākhye tasya vāsare // GarP_2,26.40 //
GP12garup2_u:3665: pṛthak śrāddhāni kurvīta sāpiḍyaṃ patinā saha // GarP_2,26.41 //
GP12garup2_u:3666: pṛthakpṛthak ca piṇḍena dampatī patinā saha /
GP12garup2_u:3667: na lipyate mahādoṣairetatsatyaṃ vaco mama // GarP_2,26.42 //
GP12garup2_u:3673: ekagotre mṛtānāṃ tu striyā vā puruṣasya vā /
GP12garup2_u:3677: ekenaiva tu pākena śrāddhāni kurute sutaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3679: tīrthe cāparapakṣe vā candrasūryagrahe 'pi vā // GarP_2,26.47 //
GP12garup2_u:3681: agnirdahati gātrāṇi ātmānaṃ naiva pīḍayet // GarP_2,26.48 //
GP12garup2_u:3682: dahyate dhmāyamānānāṃ dhātūnāṃ hi yathā malam /
GP12garup2_u:3683: tathā nārī daheddehaṃ hutāśe hyamṛtopame // GarP_2,26.49 //
GP12garup2_u:3685: taptatailena lohena vahninā naiva dahyate // GarP_2,26.50 //
GP12garup2_u:3686: tathā sā patisaṃyuktā dahyate na kadācana /
GP12garup2_u:3689: bhartṛlokaṃ na sā yāti yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam // GarP_2,26.52 //
GP12garup2_u:3691: mṛtaṃ patimanuvrajya sā ciraṃ sukhamedhate // GarP_2,26.53 //
GP12garup2_u:3693: tāvatkālaṃ vasetsvarge nakṣatraiḥ saha sarvadā // GarP_2,26.54 //
GP12garup2_u:3694: tadante carate loke kule bhavati bhoginām /
GP12garup2_u:3695: sā hi labdhamahāprītirbhartrā saha pativratā // GarP_2,26.55 //
GP12garup2_u:3696: evaṃ na kurute nārī dharmoḍhā patisaṃgamam /
GP12garup2_u:3698: valgulī gṛhasodhā vā godhā vā dvimukhī bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:3701: manasā karmaṇā vācā mṛtaṃ jīvantameva vā // GarP_2,26.58 //
GP12garup2_u:3702: jīvamāne mṛte vāpi kilbiṣaṃ kurute tu yā /
GP12garup2_u:3703: sa ca vaidhavyamāpnoti janmajanmani durbhagā // GarP_2,26.59 //
GP12garup2_u:3706: evaṃ kṛte khagaśreṣṭha pitṛloke ciraṃ vaset /
GP12garup2_u:3709: pativratā yathā nārī bhartṛduḥkhaṃ na vindati // GarP_2,26.62 //
GP12garup2_u:3713: punaḥ kuryātsadā nityaṃ ghaṭānnaṃ pratimāsikam // GarP_2,26.64 //
GP12garup2_u:3715: yaḥ karoti naraḥ kaścitkṛt pūrvaṃ vinaśyati // GarP_2,26.65 //
GP12garup2_u:3717: pratimāsaṃ ghaṭā deyā sodanā jalapūritāḥ // GarP_2,26.66 //
GP12garup2_u:3718: arvākca vṛddheḥ karaṇācca tārkṣya sapiṇḍanaṃ yaḥ kurute hi putraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3719: tathāpi māsaṃ pratipiṇḍamekamannaṃ ca kumbhaṃ sajalaṃ ca dadyāt //
GP12garup2_u:3720: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍedvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretakalpe sapiṇḍananirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3723: kathaṃ pretā vasantyatra kīdṛgrūpā bhavanti te /
GP12garup2_u:3726: pretatvānmucyate yena dānena ca śubhe na ca /
GP12garup2_u:3727: tanme kathaya deveśa mama cedicchasi priyam // GarP_2,27.2 //
GP12garup2_u:3729: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā tārkṣya mānuṣāṇāṃ hitāya vai /
GP12garup2_u:3732: bhaktastvaṃ hi mahābāho tena te kathayāmyaham // GarP_2,27.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3742: vanamadhye tadā rājā mṛgaṃ dūrādapaśyata // GarP_2,27.9 //
GP12garup2_u:3743: tena viddho mṛgo 'tīva bāṇena sudṛḍhena ca /
GP12garup2_u:3744: bāṇamādāya taṃ tasya sa vane 'darśanaṃ yayau // GarP_2,27.10 //
GP12garup2_u:3756: utkacaṃ malinaṃ kubjaṃ (rūkṣaṃ) nirmāṃsaṃ bhīmadarśanam // GarP_2,27.16 //
GP12garup2_u:3759: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vikṛtaṃ ghoraṃ vismito babhruvāhanaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3760: preto 'pi dṛṣṭvā tāṃ ghorāmaṭavīmāgataṃ nṛpam // GarP_2,27.18 //
GP12garup2_u:3762: abravītsa tadā tārkṣya pretarājo nṛpaṃ vacaḥ // GarP_2,27.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3763: pretabhāvo mayā tyaktaḥ prāpto 'smi paramāṃ gatim /
GP12garup2_u:3767: kathayasva mama prītyā yathaivaṃ cāsi tattvataḥ // GarP_2,27.21 //
GP12garup2_u:3768: tathā pṛṣṭaḥ sa vai rājñā provāca sakalaṃ svakam // GarP_2,27.22 //
GP12garup2_u:3771: pretatve kāraṇaṃ śrutvā dayāṃ kartuṃ mamārhasi // GarP_2,27.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3776: vaiśyo jātyā sudevo 'haṃ nāmnā viditamastu te // GarP_2,27.25 //
GP12garup2_u:3782: yathā me niṣphalaṃ jātaṃ sukṛtaṃ tadvadāmi te // GarP_2,27.28 //
GP12garup2_u:3783: na me 'sti santatistāta na suhṛnna ca bāndhavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3784: na ca mitraṃ hi me tādṛgyaḥ kuryādaurdhvadaihikam // GarP_2,27.29 //
GP12garup2_u:3785: pretatvaṃ susthiraṃ tena mama jātaṃ nṛpottama /
GP12garup2_u:3787: pratimāsyāni cānyāni evaṃ śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,27.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3789: pretatvaṃ susthiraṃ tasya dattaiḥ śrāddhaśatairapi // GarP_2,27.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3791: varṇānāṃ cāpi sarveṣāṃ rājā bandhurihocyate // GarP_2,27.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3792: tanmāṃ tāraya rājendra maṇiratnaṃ dadāmi te /
GP12garup2_u:3794: tathā kāryaṃ mahābāho kṛpā yadi mayīṣyate /
GP12garup2_u:3798: piśācāśca bhavantīha karmabhiḥ kaiśca tadvada // GarP_2,27.35 //
GP12garup2_u:3801: ye haranti nṛpaśreṣṭha pretayoniṃ vrajanti te // GarP_2,27.36 //
GP12garup2_u:3802: tāpasīṃ ca sagotrāṃ ca agamyāṃ ye bhajanti hi /
GP12garup2_u:3803: bhavanti te mahāpretā ambujāni haranti ye // GarP_2,27.37 //
GP12garup2_u:3812: kathaṃ muktā bhavantīha pretatvāttvaṃ ca te 'pi ca /
GP12garup2_u:3814: vidhinā kena tatkāryaṃ sarvametadvadasva me // GarP_2,27.41 //
GP12garup2_u:3819: ato vakṣyāmi te viṣṇupūjāṃ pretatvanāśinīm // GarP_2,27.43 //
GP12garup2_u:3824: pūrve tu śrīdharaṃ devaṃ dakṣiṇe madhusūdanam /
GP12garup2_u:3825: paścime vānamaṃ devamuttare ca gadādharam // GarP_2,27.46 //
GP12garup2_u:3826: madhye pitāmahaṃ pūjya tathā devaṃ maheśvaram /
GP12garup2_u:3829: ghṛtena dadhnā kṣīreṇa viśvāndevāṃstathā nṛpa // GarP_2,27.48 //
GP12garup2_u:3836: sānnāśca sodakā deyā ghaṭāḥ pretahitāya vai /
GP12garup2_u:3837: śayyādānamatho dattvā ghaṭaṃ pretasya nirvapet // GarP_2,27.52 //
GP12garup2_u:3844: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ mahārāja kathayāmi nibodha te /
GP12garup2_u:3845: pretatvaṃ na bhavedyena dānena sudṛḍhena ca // GarP_2,27.55 //
GP12garup2_u:3848: santaptahāṭakamayaṃ tu ghaṭaṃ vidhāya brahmośakeśavayutaṃ saha lokapālaiḥ
GP12garup2_u:3849: kṣīrājyapūrṇavivaraṃ praṇipatya bhaktyā viprāya dehi tava dānaśataiḥ kimanyaiḥ // GarP_2,27.57
GP12garup2_u:3850: brahmā madhye tathā viṣṇuḥ śaṅkaraḥ śaṅkaro 'vyayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3851: prācyādiṣu ca tatkaṇṭhe lokapālānkrameṇa tu // GarP_2,27.58 //
GP12garup2_u:3853: tato dugdhājyasahitaṃ ghaṭaṃ deyaṃ hiraṇmayam // GarP_2,27.59 //
GP12garup2_u:3859: tato bale samāyāte dattvā rājñe mahāmaṇim /
GP12garup2_u:3862: svapuraṃ sa samāsādya sarvaṃ tatpretabhāṣitam // GarP_2,27.63 //
GP12garup2_u:3864: tasya puṇyapradānena preto mukto divaṃ yayau // GarP_2,27.64 //
GP12garup2_u:3866: kiṃ punaḥ putradattena pitā yātīti cātbhutam // GarP_2,27.65 //
GP12garup2_u:3869: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde babhruvāhanapretasaṃvāde pretatvahetutannivṛttyupāyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3873: pretatvānmucyate yena dānena sukṛtena vā // GarP_2,28.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3876: santaptahāṭakamayaṃ ghaṭakaṃ vidhāya brahmeśakeśavayutaṃ saha lokapālaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3877: kṣīrājyapūrṇaviviraṃ praṇipatya bhaktyā viprāya dehi tava dānaśataiḥ kimanyaiḥ // GarP_2,28.2
GP12garup2_u:3881: saṃsāre sādhu me nātha brūhi kṛtyaṃ janārdana /
GP12garup2_u:3882: yathā kāryā naraiḥ samyak kriyā caivaurdhvadaihikī // GarP_2,28.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3884: kambhavanti suraśreṣṭha karmabhiḥ kaiḥ śubhāśubhaiḥ // GarP_2,28.5 //
GP12garup2_u:3886: tanme kathaya deveśa ahamicchāmi veditum // GarP_2,28.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3888: adhastācca tilā darbhāḥ pādau yāmyāṃ vyavasthitāḥ // GarP_2,28.7 //
GP12garup2_u:3890: kimarthaṃ smaryate viṣṇuḥ viṣṇusūktañca paṭhyate // GarP_2,28.8 //
GP12garup2_u:3895: tilā lohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca kārpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:3896: saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāvo dīyate kena he tunā // GarP_2,28.11 //
GP12garup2_u:3897: kathaṃ ca mriyate janturmṛtasya ca kuto gatiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3898: ativāhaśarīraṃ ca kathaṃ viśramate tadā // GarP_2,28.12 //
GP12garup2_u:3899: śaṃva skandhe vahetputro vahnidātā ca pautrakaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3900: kimarthaṃ deva deveśa ājyenābhyañjanaṃ kutaḥ // GarP_2,28.13 //
GP12garup2_u:3904: vastraṃ naraśca nārī ca vidadhyādadharottaram // GarP_2,28.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3906: navakāni ca piṇḍāni kimarthaṃ vitaretsutaḥ // GarP_2,28.16 //
GP12garup2_u:3907: kimarthaṃ catvare dugdhaṃ pātre pakve ca mṛnmaye /
GP12garup2_u:3908: kāṣṭhatrayaṃ guṇe baddhvā kṛtvā rātrau catuṣpathe // GarP_2,28.17 //
GP12garup2_u:3910: dāhodakaṃ kimarthaṃ ca saṃvādaḥ svajanaiḥ saha // GarP_2,28.18 //
GP12garup2_u:3913: idaṃ ca kriyate deva kasmātpiṇḍaṃ pradāpayet // GarP_2,28.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3916: dvitīye 'hni kutaḥ snānaṃ caturthe sāgnike dvije /
GP12garup2_u:3917: daśame kiṃ malasnānaṃ kāryaṃ sarvajanaiḥ saha // GarP_2,28.21 //
GP12garup2_u:3919: taiḥ samudvartanaṃ cāpi dadyuḥ sthalajalāśraye // GarP_2,28.22 //
GP12garup2_u:3921: piṇḍaṃ caikādaśe kasmād vṛṣotsargaḥ kathaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,28.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3925: prāpte kāle ca mriyate anityo mānavaḥ prabho // GarP_2,28.25 //
GP12garup2_u:3926: chidraṃ tu naiva paśyāmi kuto jīvaḥ sa nirgataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3927: kuto gacchanti bhūtāni pṛthivyāpo manastathā // GarP_2,28.26 //
GP12garup2_u:3928: tejo vadasva me nātha vāyurākāśameva ca /
GP12garup2_u:3929: vāyavaścaiva pañcaite kathaṃ gacchanti cāptaye // GarP_2,28.27 //
GP12garup2_u:3931: tṛṣṇā kāmo 'pyahaṅkāraḥ kuto yānti janārdana // GarP_2,28.28 //
GP12garup2_u:3933: naṣṭe dehe kuto yānti dānāni vividhāni ca // GarP_2,28.29 //
GP12garup2_u:3934: sapiṇḍanaṃ kimarthaṃ ca pūrṇe saṃvatsare 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:3935: pretasya melanaṃ sārdhaṃ kaiḥ samaṃ tatra ko vidhiḥ // GarP_2,28.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3936: ye dagdhā ye tvadagdhāśca patitā ye narābhuvi /
GP12garup2_u:3937: yāni cānyāni bhūtāni teṣāmante bhavecca kim // GarP_2,28.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3938: pāpino ye durācārā mudgalatvaṃ ca ye gatāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3939: ātmaghātī brahmahā ca steyī viśvāsaghātakaḥ // GarP_2,28.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3941: dhārayedvā brahmasūtraṃ kā gatistasya mādhava // GarP_2,28.33 //
GP12garup2_u:3942: viprasya brāhmaṇī bhāryā saṃgṛhī tā yadā bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:3944: sarvametanmayā pṛṣṭo vada lokahitāya vai // GarP_2,28.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3945: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde aurdhvadahikakarmakālakriyamāṇanānādānādiphalapraśranirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3948: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā bhadra mānuṣāṇāṃ hitāya vai /
GP12garup2_u:3953: bhaktastvaṃ hi mahābhāga sarvaṃ te kathayāmyaham // GarP_2,29.3 //
GP12garup2_u:3954: aputrasya gatirnāsti svargo naiva ca naiva ca /
GP12garup2_u:3955: yena kenāpyupāyena kāryaṃ janma sutasya ca // GarP_2,29.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3957: dāhaḥ putreṇa kartavyo deyaḥ pautreṇa pāvakaḥ // GarP_2,29.5 //
GP12garup2_u:3958: tilairdarbhaiśca bhūmyāṃ vai kuṭī dhātumatī bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:3959: pañcaratnāni vaktre tu yena jīvaḥ prarohati // GarP_2,29.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3961: tasyāmevāturo muktaḥ sarvaṃ dahati pātakam // GarP_2,29.7 //
GP12garup2_u:3963: darbhāṃstatra hi ye bhūmyāṃ tilayuktāna saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,29.8 //
GP12garup2_u:3964: sarvatra vasudhā pūtā yatra lepo na vidyate /
GP12garup2_u:3965: yatra lepaḥ sthitastatra punarlepena śudhyati // GarP_2,29.9 //
GP12garup2_u:3967: alipte āturaṃ muktaṃ viśantyete na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,29.10 //
GP12garup2_u:3969: maṇḍalena vinā bhūmyāṃ kurvantyetacca niṣphalam // GarP_2,29.11 //
GP12garup2_u:3970: āturo mucyate naiva maṇḍalena vinā bhuvi /
GP12garup2_u:3971: brahmā rudraśca viṣṇuśca śrīrhutāśana eva ca /
GP12garup2_u:3973: anyathā mriyate yastu bālo vṛddho yuvāpi vā /
GP12garup2_u:3974: yonyantaraṃ sa vai gacchetkrīḍate vāyunā saha // GarP_2,29.13 //
GP12garup2_u:3975: miśritaṃ lohatāmraṃ tu tathaiva janma jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:3976: tasmaivaṃ vāyubhūtasya na śrāddhaṃ nodaka kriyā // GarP_2,29.14 //
GP12garup2_u:3980: te me dahantu pāṣāni śarīreṇa kṛtāni ca // GarP_2,29.16 //
GP12garup2_u:3982: tarpaṇe dānahome ca datto bhavati cākṣayaḥ // GarP_2,29.17 //
GP12garup2_u:3989: darbhāgre śaṅkaraṃ vidyāttrayo devāḥ kuśe sthitāḥ // GarP_2,29.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3990: viprā mantrāḥ kuśā vahnistulasī ca khageśvara /
GP12garup2_u:3991: naite nirmālyatāṃ yānti kriyamāṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ // GarP_2,29.21 //
GP12garup2_u:3995: pañca pravahaṇānyeva bhavābdhau majjatāṃ satām // GarP_2,29.23 //
GP12garup2_u:4003: viṣṇulokaṃ sa vai yāti mantrahīno 'pi mānavaḥ // GarP_2,29.27 //
GP12garup2_u:4007: tatra dattena dānena sarvaṃ pāpaṃ vyapohati // GarP_2,29.29 //
GP12garup2_u:4009: yasmādannarasāḥ sarve notkaṭā lavaṇaṃ vinā // GarP_2,29.30 //
GP12garup2_u:4010: pitṝṇāṃ ca priyaṃ bhavyaṃ tasmātsvargapradaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4013: brāhmaṇa kṣattriyaviśāṃ strīṇāṃ śūdrajanasya ca // GarP_2,29.32 //
GP12garup2_u:4015: lavaṇaṃ tu tadā deyaṃ dbārasyoddhāṭanaṃ divaḥ // GarP_2,29.33 //
GP12garup2_u:4016: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe pretakalpe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde aurdhvadehikakarmaṇi putradarbhatilatulasīgobhūlepatāmrapātradānā dīnāmāvaśyakatvanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonatriśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:4019: śṛṇu tārkṣya paraṃ guhyaṃ dānānāṃ dānamuttamam /
GP12garup2_u:4020: paramaṃ sarvadānānāṃ paraṃ gopyaṃ divaukasām // GarP_2,30.1 //
GP12garup2_u:4022: yena dattena prīyante bhūrbhuvaḥ svariti kramāt // GarP_2,30.2 //
GP12garup2_u:4027: yamalokaṃ vinirjitya svargaṃ tākṣya sa gacchati // GarP_2,30.4 //
GP12garup2_u:4028: gāṃ tilāṃśca kṣitaṃ hema yo dadāti dvijanmane /
GP12garup2_u:4031: taddvayaṃ dīyate vipre nānyavarṇe kadācana // GarP_2,30.6 //
GP12garup2_u:4033: anyeṣu naiva varṇeṣu poṣyavarge kadācana // GarP_2,30.7 //
GP12garup2_u:4035: āture voparāge ca dvayaṃ dānaṃ viśiṣyate /
GP12garup2_u:4036: āture dīyate dānaṃ tatkāle copatiṣṭhati // GarP_2,30.8 //
GP12garup2_u:4038: satyaṃsatyaṃ punaḥ satyaṃ yaddattaṃ vikalendriye // GarP_2,30.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4040: ato dadyāt sa putro vā yāvajjīvatsasau ciram /
GP12garup2_u:4041: ativāhastathā preto bhogāṃśca labhate yataḥ // GarP_2,30.10 //
GP12garup2_u:4043: dehe tathātivāhasya parataḥ prīṇanaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,30.11 //
GP12garup2_u:4046: tilā lauhaṃ hiraṇyañca kārpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:4047: saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāva ekaikaṃ pāvanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,30.13 //
GP12garup2_u:4049: lavaṇe dīyamāne tu na bhayaṃ vidyate yamāt // GarP_2,30.14 //
GP12garup2_u:4050: karpāsasya tu dānena na bhūtebhyo bhayaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4053: hemabhūmipradānācca na pīḍā narake bhavet // GarP_2,30.16 //
GP12garup2_u:4055: sarve te varadā yānti saptadhānyena prīṇitāḥ // GarP_2,30.17 //
GP12garup2_u:4060: tasmin kāle suto yastu sarvadānāni dāpayet /
GP12garup2_u:4063: putrairyatnena kartavyā pitaraṃ tārayanti te // GarP_2,30.21 //
GP12garup2_u:4065: aśvamedho mahāyajñaḥ kalāṃ nārhati ṣoḍaśīm // GarP_2,30.22 //
GP12garup2_u:4066: dharmātmā sa nu putro vaidevairapi supūjyate /
GP12garup2_u:4067: dāpayedyastu dānāni hyāturaṃ pitaraṃ bhuvi // GarP_2,30.23 //
GP12garup2_u:4069: yamaṃ bhīmañca nāpnoti na gacchet tasya veśmani // GarP_2,30.24 //
GP12garup2_u:4070: kuṭhāro musalo daṇḍaḥ khaḍgaśca cchurikā tathā /
GP12garup2_u:4074: garbhasthāḥ śiśavo ye ca yuvānaḥ sthavirāstathā /
GP12garup2_u:4077: śabalā śyāmadūtā ye lohadānena prīṇitāḥ // GarP_2,30.28 //
GP12garup2_u:4079: dadate nāture dānaṃ brahmaghnaistu samā hi te // GarP_2,30.29 //
GP12garup2_u:4080: pañcatve bhūmiyuktasya śṛṇu tasya ca yā gatiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4081: ativāhaḥ punaḥ pretovarṣordhvaṃ sukṛtaṃ labhet // GarP_2,30.30 //
GP12garup2_u:4083: kālatrayaṃ trisandhyaṃ ca trayo varṇāstriśaktayaḥ // GarP_2,30.31 //
GP12garup2_u:4085: grīvāṃ yāvaddharirnābheḥ śarīre manujasya ca // GarP_2,30.32 //
GP12garup2_u:4089: dharmādharme matiṃ dadyāt sukhaduḥkhe kṛtākṛte // GarP_2,30.34 //
GP12garup2_u:4092: svargaṃ ca narakaṃ mokṣaṃ prayānti prāṇino dhruvam // GarP_2,30.35 //
GP12garup2_u:4093: svargasthaṃ narakasthaṃ vā śrāddhe vāpyāyanaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4095: matsyaṃ karmaṃ ca vārāhaṃ nārasiṃhañca vāmanam /
GP12garup2_u:4096: rāmaṃ rāmaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ ca buddhaṃ caiva sakalkinam /
GP12garup2_u:4097: etāni daśa nāmāni smartavyāni sadā budhaiḥ // GarP_2,30.37 //
GP12garup2_u:4098: svargaṃ jīvāḥ sukhaṃ yānti cyutāḥ svargācca mānavāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4099: labdhvā sukhaṃ ca vittaṃ ca dayādākṣiṇyasaṃyutāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4102: aṣṭākṣaraṃ tathā mantraṃ japedvā dvādaśākṣaram // GarP_2,30.39 //
GP12garup2_u:4106: yatra viṣṇuṃ na paśyāmi tena vāsena kiṃ mama // GarP_2,30.41 //
GP12garup2_u:4108: jvālāmālākule viṣṇuḥ sarvaṃ viṣṇumayaṃ jagat // GarP_2,30.42 //
GP12garup2_u:4109: vayamāpo vayaṃ pṛthvī vayaṃ darbhā vayaṃ tilāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4110: vayaṃ gāvo vayaṃ rājā vayaṃ vāyurvayaṃ prajāḥ // GarP_2,30.43 //
GP12garup2_u:4111: vayaṃ hema vayaṃ dhānyaṃ vayaṃ madhu vayaṃ ghṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:4112: vayaṃ viprā vayaṃ devā vayaṃ śambhuśca bhūrbhuvaḥ // GarP_2,30.44 //
GP12garup2_u:4113: ahaṃ dātā ahaṃ grāhī ahaṃ yajvā ahaṃ kratuḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4114: ahaṃ hartā ahaṃ dharmo ahaṃ pṛthvī hyahaṃ jalam // GarP_2,30.45 //
GP12garup2_u:4116: yat karma kriyate kvāpi pūrvajanmārjitaṃ khaga // GarP_2,30.46 //
GP12garup2_u:4118: yātanāṃ kurute so 'pi dharme muktiṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_2,30.47 //
GP12garup2_u:4119: manujānāṃ hitā tārkṣya ante vaitaraṇī smṛtā /
GP12garup2_u:4120: tayāvamatya pāpaughaṃ viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_2,30.48 //
GP12garup2_u:4121: bālatve yacca kaumāre yacca pariṇatau ca yat /
GP12garup2_u:4124: sandhyayoryat kṛtaṃ karma karmaṇā manasā girā // GarP_2,30.50 //
GP12garup2_u:4128: gāvo me hṛdaye santu gavāṃ madhye vasāmyaham // GarP_2,30.52 //
GP12garup2_u:4129: yā lakṣmīḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yā ca deve vyavasthitā /
GP12garup2_u:4130: dhenurūpeṇa sā devī mama pāpaṃ vyapohatu // GarP_2,30.53 //
GP12garup2_u:4131: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde nānādānanirūpaṇaṃ nāma triṃso 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:4137: aśvārūḍhāśca te yānti dadate ye hyupānahau // GarP_2,31.2 //
GP12garup2_u:4138: ātape śramayogena na dahyante ca kutracit /
GP12garup2_u:4139: chattradānena vai pretā vicaranti sukhaṃ pathi // GarP_2,31.3 //
GP12garup2_u:4140: yamuddiśya dadātyannaṃ tena cāpyāyito bhavet // GarP_2,31.4 //
GP12garup2_u:4142: uddyotenaiva te yānti dīpadānena mānavāḥ // GarP_2,31.5 //
GP12garup2_u:4144: caturdaśyāñca dīyeta dīpadānaṃ sukhāya vai // GarP_2,31.6 //
GP12garup2_u:4146: yāvat saṃvatsaraṃ vāpi pretasya sukhalipsayā // GarP_2,31.7 //
GP12garup2_u:4147: kule dyotati śuddhātmā prakāśatvaṃ sa gacchati /
GP12garup2_u:4150: kuryādyāmyamukhaṃ pitre adbhiḥ saṅkalpya susthiram // GarP_2,31.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4155: sukhe na bhuñjamānastu dena gacchatyalaṃ pathi // GarP_2,31.11 //
GP12garup2_u:4160: dātavyāni yathāśaktyā preto 'sau prīṇito bhavet // GarP_2,31.14 //
GP12garup2_u:4162: mudrikāṃ vastrayugmañca tayā yāti parāṃ gatim // GarP_2,31.15 //
GP12garup2_u:4163: yo 'śvaṃ nāvaṃ gajaṃ vāpi brāhmaṇe pratipādayet /
GP12garup2_u:4166: yamaputtrasya yā mātā mahiṣī sugatipradā // GarP_2,31.17 //
GP12garup2_u:4168: tena samprīṇitāḥ sarve tasmin kleśaṃ na kurvate // GarP_2,31.18 //
GP12garup2_u:4173: na bhīṣayanti taṃ yāmyā vastradāne kṛte sati // GarP_2,31.21 //
GP12garup2_u:4178: tathā pretatvamukto 'sau modate saha daivataiḥ // GarP_2,31.23 //
GP12garup2_u:4181: jātasya mṛtyuloke vai prāṇino maraṇaṃ dhruvam /
GP12garup2_u:4182: mṛtiḥ kuryāt svadharmeṇa yāsyataśca parantapa // GarP_2,31.25 //
GP12garup2_u:4188: vātāhataḥ patatyeva nirādhāro yathā drumaḥ // GarP_2,31.28 //
GP12garup2_u:4189: pṛthivyāṃ līyate pṛthvī āpaścaiva tathāpsu ca /
GP12garup2_u:4191: ākāśe ca tathā kāśaḥ sarvavyāpī ca śaṅkare // GarP_2,31.29 //
GP12garup2_u:4192: tatra kāmastathā krodhaḥ kāye pañcendriyāṇi ca /
GP12garup2_u:4193: ete tārkṣya samākhyātā dehe tiṣṭhanti taskarāḥ // GarP_2,31.30 //
GP12garup2_u:4199: praviśet sa navaṃ dehaṃ gṛhe dagdhe yathā gṛhī // GarP_2,31.33 //

GP12garup2_u:4258: dharmamādāya manasi sutalpaṃ saṃviśet pumān // GarP_2,32.18 //

GP12garup2_u:4278: aṣṭame calate jīvo dhātrīgarbhe punaḥ punaḥ /

GP12garup2_u:4281: nārī vātha naro vātha napuṃstvaṃ vābhijāyate // GarP_2,32.29 //
GP12garup2_u:4285: majjāsthiśukramāṃsāni roma raktaṃ balaṃ tathā // GarP_2,32.31 //
GP12garup2_u:4287: navame daśame māsi jāyate pāñcabhautikaḥ // GarP_2,32.32 //
GP12garup2_u:4292: mūlabhūtā ime proktāḥ sapta nāḍyantare sthitāḥ /

GP12garup2_u:4295: yathā pañca guṇāścāpastathā tacchṛṇu kāśyapa // GarP_2,32.36 //
GP12garup2_u:4296: lālā mūtraṃ tathā śukraṃ majjāra raktañca pañcamam /
GP12garup2_u:4297: āpaḥ pañcaguṇāḥ proktā jñātavyāste prayatnataḥ // GarP_2,32.37 //
GP12garup2_u:4298: kṣudhā tṛṣā tathā nidrā ālasyaṃ kāntireva ca /
GP12garup2_u:4299: tejaḥ pañcaguṇaṃ proktaṃ tārkṣya sarvatrayogibhiḥ // GarP_2,32.38 //
GP12garup2_u:4300: rāgadveṣau tathā lajjā bhayaṃ mohastathaiva ca /

GP12garup2_u:4303: nirodhaḥ pañcamaḥ prokto vāyoḥ pañca guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_2,32.40 //

GP12garup2_u:4306: śrotraṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsā buddhīndriyāṇi ca /

GP12garup2_u:4308: iḍāca piṅgalā caiva suṣumṇā ca tṛtīyakā /

GP12garup2_u:4311: piṇḍa madhye sthitā hyetāḥ pradhānā daśa nāḍayaḥ // GarP_2,32.44 //

GP12garup2_u:4331: palāni daśa medaśca tvacā caiva tu tatsamā // GarP_2,32.54 //

GP12garup2_u:4371: dṛśyate nātra modante pātyamānāstu nārakaiḥ // GarP_2,32.74 //

GP12garup2_u:4387: kathayāmi kramapraśraṃ pṛṣṭaṃ vā vartate spṛhā // GarP_2,32.82 //

GP12garup2_u:4403: ādau tu praṇavaṃ kṛtvā pūjādāne tataḥ smṛte /

GP12garup2_u:4408: nivartayenmamatvaṃ ca viṣṇoḥ pādau hṛdi smaran // GarP_2,32.92 //
GP12garup2_u:4410: puttrādyāḥ prapaṭheyuste mriyamāṇe nije jane // GarP_2,32.93 //

GP12garup2_u:4461: pāyu (da) sthāne sthitaḥ ketuḥ śarīre grahamaṇḍalam /
GP12garup2_u:4463: utpannā ye hi saṃsāre mriyante te na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4464: bubhukṣā ca tṛṣā raudrā dāhodbhūtā ca mūrchanā // GarP_2,32.120 //
GP12garup2_u:4466: vināśaḥ pūrṇakāle ca jāyate sarvadehinām // GarP_2,32.121 //
GP12garup2_u:4471: yamaloke vasantyete kuṭyāṃ janma na vidyate /
GP12garup2_u:4472: evaṃ sañjāyate tārkṣya martye jantuḥ svakarmabhiḥ // GarP_2,32.124 //

GP12garup2_u:4485: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛ dharmadṛpretadṛśrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde jantūtpattitadgadhātvādivibhāgabhuvanādivibhāgavarṇanaṃ nāma dvātriṃśo

GP12garup2_u:4492: kaiśca pāpaiḥ kṛtairdeva kena vā śubhakarmaṇā /

GP12garup2_u:4501: vṛkṣacchāyā na tatrāsti yatra viśramate naraḥ /

GP12garup2_u:4504: na jalaṃ dṛśyate tatra tṛṣā yena vilīyate // GarP_2,33.7 //

GP12garup2_u:4508: sudīnāḥ kṛpaṇā mūḍhā duḥ khairvyāptāstaranti tam // GarP_2,33.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4509: rudanti dāruṇaṃ kecit keciddrohaṃ vadanti ca /
GP12garup2_u:4511: īdṛgvidhaḥ sa vai panthā vijñeyo dāruṇaḥ khaga /
GP12garup2_u:4512: vitṛṣṇā ye narā loke sukhaṃ tasmin vrajanti te // GarP_2,33.11 //
GP12garup2_u:4513: yāniyāni ca dānāni dattāni bhuvi mānavaiḥ /
