GP12garup2_u:4520: sarvaṃ vajramayaṃ divyamabhedyaṃ tat surāsuraiḥ // GarP_2,33.15 //
GP12garup2_u:4522: svayaṃ tiṣṭhati vai yasyāṃ yamo dūtaiḥ samanvitaḥ // GarP_2,33.16 //
GP12garup2_u:4531: tatrastho bhagavān dharma āsane tu same śubhe /
GP12garup2_u:4545: na muhyati kadācit sa sukṛte duṣkṛte 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4546: yadyenopārjitaṃ yāvat tāvadvai vetti tasya tat // GarP_2,33.28 //
GP12garup2_u:4552: aiśanyāṃ vai śiro 'rtiśca āgneyyāñcaiva mṛkatā // GarP_2,33.31 //
GP12garup2_u:4554: ebhiḥ parivṛto nityaṃ citraguptaḥ sa tiṣṭhati // GarP_2,33.32 //
GP12garup2_u:4555: yat karma kurute kaścittat sarvaṃ vilakhatyasau /
GP12garup2_u:4567: pīḍyante yamadūtaiśca pāpiṣṭhāḥ subhṛśaṃ narāḥ // GarP_2,33.38 //
GP12garup2_u:4569: yamaloke mayā dṛṣṭā mamasvaṃ bhakṣitaṃ tvayā // GarP_2,33.39 //
GP12garup2_u:4572: dānopakāraṃ vakṣyāmi yathā tatra sukhaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,33.40 //
GP12garup2_u:4573: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pratakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde yamalokavistṛtidṛvarṇanaṃ nāma trayastriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:4577: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ nṝṇāmagre dhāvati dhāvatām // GarP_2,34.1 //
GP12garup2_u:4579: dvāpare yajñadāne ca dānamekaṃ kalau yuge // GarP_2,34.2 //
GP12garup2_u:4581: iṣṭāpūrte svaśaktyā hi kurvatāṃ nāsti pātakam // GarP_2,34.3 //
GP12garup2_u:4583: yamamārge sukhaṃ tasya vrajato nitarāṃ bhavet // GarP_2,34.4 //
GP12garup2_u:4585: tapyamānāḥ sukhaṃ yānti sarva kāmaiḥ prapūritāḥ // GarP_2,34.5 //
GP12garup2_u:4587: tena sarvamidaṃ dattaṃ yena dattā vasundharā // GarP_2,34.6 //
GP12garup2_u:4588: yāniyāni ca bhūtāni dattāni bhuvi mānavaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4591: dadāti vidhinā putra prete tadu patiṣṭhati // GarP_2,34.8 //
GP12garup2_u:4593: tārayet pitaraṃ ghorāt tena puttraḥ pravakṣyate // GarP_2,34.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4595: ativāhastadā preto bhogān vai labhate hi saḥ // GarP_2,34.10 //
GP12garup2_u:4597: dīyate pretarūpo 'sau prīto yāti yamālaye // GarP_2,34.11 //
GP12garup2_u:4598: apakve mṛnmaye pātre dugdhaṃ dattaṃ dinatrayam /
GP12garup2_u:4599: kāṣṭhatrayaṃ guṇairbaddhvā prītyai rātrau catuṣpathe // GarP_2,34.12 //
GP12garup2_u:4600: prathame 'hni dvitīye ca tṛtīye ca tathā khaga /
GP12garup2_u:4604: na pūrvāhne na madhyāhne nāparāhne na sandhiṣu /
GP12garup2_u:4606: puttreṇa datte te sarve gotriṇo hitabāndhavāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4607: svajātyaiḥ parajātyaiśca deyo nadyāṃ jalāñjaliḥ // GarP_2,34.16 //
GP12garup2_u:4608: gantavyaṃ naiva vipreṇa dātuṃ śīghraṃ jalāñjalim /
GP12garup2_u:4609: nivṛttāśca yadā nāryo lokācāraḥ sadābhavet // GarP_2,34.17 //
GP12garup2_u:4610: pañcatvañca gate śūdre yaḥ kāṣṭhaṃ nayate citām /
GP12garup2_u:4612: trirātre ca tataḥ pūrṇe nadīṃ gacchet samudragām /
GP12garup2_u:4613: prāṇāyāmaśataṃ kṛtvā ghṛtaṃ prāśya viśudhyati // GarP_2,34.19 //
GP12garup2_u:4614: śūdro gacchati sarvatra vaiśyastriṣu dvayoḥ paraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4615: gacchati svīyavarṇeṣu dātuṃ prete jalāñjalim // GarP_2,34.20 //
GP12garup2_u:4617: tyajanti gotriṇaḥ sarve dināni nava kāśyapa // GarP_2,34.21 //
GP12garup2_u:4619: yatra sthāne mṛto yastu adhvanyapi gṛhe 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4620: viśleṣastu tataḥ sthānānna kvacidvihito budhaiḥ // GarP_2,34.22 //
GP12garup2_u:4625: gotribhirna ca kartavyaṃ gṛhānnañca na bhojayet /
GP12garup2_u:4626: bhuñjīta mṛnmaye pātre uttānañca vivarjayet // GarP_2,34.25 //
GP12garup2_u:4630: vāyurūpo bhramatyeva vāyurūrdhvaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_2,34.27 //
GP12garup2_u:4632: navakaiḥ ṣoḍaśaśrāddhaiḥ prayāti hi kuṭīṃ naraḥ // GarP_2,34.28 //
GP12garup2_u:4633: tilairdarbhaiśca bhūmyāṃ vai kuṭī dhātumayī bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4634: pañca ratnāni vaktre tu yena jīvaḥ prarohati // GarP_2,34.29 //
GP12garup2_u:4635: yadā puṣpaṃ pranaṣṭaṃ hi tadā garbhaṃ na dhārayet /
GP12garup2_u:4636: ādarācca tato bhūmau tiladarbhānviniḥ kṣipet // GarP_2,34.30 //
GP12garup2_u:4637: paśutve sthāvaratve ca yatra kvāpi sa jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:4640: yathā śrāddhaṃ yamuddiśya kṛtaṃ tasyopatiṣṭhati // GarP_2,34.32 //
GP12garup2_u:4643: piṇḍadānaṃ na yasyābhūdākāśe bhramate tu saḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4645: ākāśe vasate trīṇi dinamekantu vāsake // GarP_2,34.34 //
GP12garup2_u:4646: dagdhe dehe ca vahnau ca jalenaiva tu tarpitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4648: prathame 'hni tṛtīye ca pañcame saptame 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4650: gṛhadvāre śmaśāne vā tīrthe devālaye 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4651: yatrādyo dīyate piṇḍastatra sarvān samāpayet // GarP_2,34.37 //
GP12garup2_u:4655: dadyādviprāya yaḥ śayyāṃ yathoktaṃ pretamokṣadām // GarP_2,34.39 //
GP12garup2_u:4656: na bhavet yadā sa gotro paro 'pi vidhimācaret /
GP12garup2_u:4657: bhāryā vā puruṣaḥ kaścit tuṣṭaśca kurute striyaḥ // GarP_2,34.40 //
GP12garup2_u:4659: annādyena ca tenaiva sarvaśrāddhāni kārayet // GarP_2,34.41 //
GP12garup2_u:4661: śrāddhaṃ kṛtantu yairvastraistāni tyaktvā gṛhaṃ viśet // GarP_2,34.42 //
GP12garup2_u:4662: asagotraḥ sagotro vā yadi strī yadi vā pumān /
GP12garup2_u:4663: prathame 'hani yaḥ kuryāt sa daśāhaṃ samāpayet // GarP_2,34.43 //
GP12garup2_u:4667: caturṇāmapi varṇānāmeṣa eva vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,34.45 //
GP12garup2_u:4669: caturastu dvitīye 'hni tṛtīye trīṃśtathaiva ca // GarP_2,34.46 //
GP12garup2_u:4671: ekoddiṣṭantu vai śrāddhaṃ caturthe 'hani kārayet // GarP_2,34.47 //
GP12garup2_u:4673: cakṣuḥ śrotrañca nāsā ca dvitīye 'hni prajāyate // GarP_2,34.48 //
GP12garup2_u:4674: gaṇḍau vaktraṃ tathā grīvā tṛtīye 'hani jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:4675: hṛdayaṃ kukṣirudaraṃ caturthe tadvadeva hi // GarP_2,34.49 //
GP12garup2_u:4677: ṣaṣṭhe ūrū ca vijñeye saptame gulphasambhavaḥ // GarP_2,34.50 //
GP12garup2_u:4678: aṣṭame divase prāpte jaṅghe ca bhavato 'ṇḍaja /
GP12garup2_u:4679: pādau ca navame jñeyau daśame balavatkṣudhā // GarP_2,34.51 //
GP12garup2_u:4681: siddhānnaṃ tasya dātavyaṃ kṛśarāḥ pūpakāḥ payaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4684: tripakṣañcāpi ṣaṇmāse dve śrāddhāni ca ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,34.53 //
GP12garup2_u:4685: prati māsaṃ pradātavyaṃ mṛtāhe yā tithirbhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4686: sa māsaḥ prathamo jñeya iti vedavido viduḥ // GarP_2,34.54 //
GP12garup2_u:4688: tadeva prathamaṃ śrāddhaṃ tat syādekādaśe 'hani // GarP_2,34.55 //
GP12garup2_u:4689: sā tithirmāsike śrāddhe mṛto yasmin dine naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4690: riktayośca tripakṣe ca sā tithirnādriyeta vai // GarP_2,34.56 //
GP12garup2_u:4691: paurṇamāsyāṃ mṛto yo 'sau caturthī tasya conakā /
GP12garup2_u:4692: caturthyāntu mṛto yastu navamī tasya conakā // GarP_2,34.57 //
GP12garup2_u:4693: navamyāñca mṛto yaśca riktā tasya caturdaśī /
GP12garup2_u:4694: etā riktāśca vijñeyā antyeṣṭau kuśalena ca // GarP_2,34.58 //
GP12garup2_u:4696: catuṣpathe tyajedannaṃ punaḥ snānaṃ samācaret // GarP_2,34.59 //
GP12garup2_u:4702: etasmāddīyate kumbhaḥ prītiḥ pretasya jāyate // GarP_2,34.62 //
GP12garup2_u:4703: yasmin dine mṛto janturaṭavyāṃ viṣame 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4704: yadā tadā bhaveddāhaḥ sūtakaṃ mṛtavāsarāt // GarP_2,34.63 //
GP12garup2_u:4706: ekādaśāhe dātavyaṃ tena śūddho dvijo bhavet // GarP_2,34.64 //
GP12garup2_u:4707: kṣattriyo dvādaśāhe tu vaiśyaḥ pañcadaśe tathā /
GP12garup2_u:4708: śuddhiḥ śūdrasya māsena mṛtake jātasūtake // GarP_2,34.65 //
GP12garup2_u:4709: māsatraye trirātraṃ syāt ṣaṇmāsena tu pakṣiṇī /
GP12garup2_u:4711: anenaivā nusāreṇa śuddhiḥ syāt sārvavarṇikī // GarP_2,34.66 //
GP12garup2_u:4715: evaṃ pracchādyate sarvaṃ na preto bhavati kvacit // GarP_2,34.68 //
GP12garup2_u:4717: anityaṃ jīvanaṃ ysamāt paścāt ko nu pradāsyati // GarP_2,34.69 //
GP12garup2_u:4719: mṛte mṛta iti jñātvā kṣaṇāt sneho nivartate // GarP_2,34.70 //
GP12garup2_u:4723: evaṃ jānannidaṃ sarvaṃ svahastenaiva dāpayet // GarP_2,34.72 //
GP12garup2_u:4726: tasyāṃ saṃsthāpya haimañca hariṃ lakṣmyā samanvitam // GarP_2,34.73 //
GP12garup2_u:4728: vijñeyo garuḍa prītyai sa nidrākalaśo budhaiḥ // GarP_2,34.74 //
GP12garup2_u:4736: vastraiḥ suśobhanaiḥ pūjya cailakaṃ paridhāpayet // GarP_2,34.78 //
GP12garup2_u:4743: tathā caikādaśāhe tu vidhireṣa prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_2,34.82 //
GP12garup2_u:4744: dadāti yo hi dharmārthe bāndhavo bāndhave mṛte /
GP12garup2_u:4745: viśeṣamatra pakṣe tu kathyamānaṃ mayā śṛṇu // GarP_2,34.83 //
GP12garup2_u:4746: upayuktañca tasyāsīt yat kiñcit svagṛhe purā /
GP12garup2_u:4748: yadabhīṣṭañca tasyāsīt tat sarvaṃ parikalpayet // GarP_2,34.84 //
GP12garup2_u:4749: sthāpayet puruṣaṃ haimaṃ śayyopari śubhaṃ budhaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4753: pīḍayanti na taṃ yāmyāḥ puruṣā bhīṣaṇānanāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4754: na gharmeṇa na śītena bādhyate sa naraḥ kvacit // GarP_2,34.87 //
GP12garup2_u:4756: apiḥ pāpasamāyuktaḥ svargalokaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_2,34.88 //
GP12garup2_u:4760: bharturyā kurute nārī tasyāḥ śreyo hyanantakam // GarP_2,34.90 //
GP12garup2_u:4761: upakārāya sā bharturjīvantī na mṛtā tathā /
GP12garup2_u:4762: uddharejjīvamānā sā satī satyavatī priyam // GarP_2,34.91 //
GP12garup2_u:4764: vastrabhūṣā tathā śayyā sarvametaddhi dāpayet // GarP_2,34.92 //
GP12garup2_u:4766: bhūṣaṇaṃ gātralagnañca vastu bhogyādikañca yat // GarP_2,34.93 //
GP12garup2_u:4767: tat sarvaṃ melayitvā tu svesve sthāne niyojayet /
GP12garup2_u:4773: ātmā śambhuḥ śivā gaurī śakraḥ suragaṇaiḥ saha /
GP12garup2_u:4776: gṛhīte brāhmaṇastatra ko 'dāditi ca kīrtayet // GarP_2,34.98 //
GP12garup2_u:4778: vidhinānena vai pakṣin dānamekasya dāpayet // GarP_2,34.99 //
GP12garup2_u:4779: bahubhyo na pradeyāni gaurgṛhaṃ śayanaṃ striyaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4780: vibhaktadakṣiṇā hyete dātāraṃ pātayanti hi // GarP_2,34.100 //
GP12garup2_u:4781: evaṃ yo vitaret tārkṣya śṛṇu tasya ca yat phalam /
GP12garup2_u:4782: sāgraṃ varṣaśataṃ divyaṃ svargaloke mahīyate // GarP_2,34.101 //
GP12garup2_u:4784: dvārakāyāntu yat puṇyaṃ candrasūryagrahe tathā // GarP_2,34.102 //
GP12garup2_u:4789: yatrāsau jāyate prāṇī bhuṅkte tatraiva tat phalam /
GP12garup2_u:4790: karmakṣaye kṣitau yāti mānuṣaḥ śubhadarśanaḥ // GarP_2,34.105 //
GP12garup2_u:4792: punaḥ sa yāti vaikuṇṭhaṃ mṛto 'sau narapuṅgavaḥ // GarP_2,34.106 //
GP12garup2_u:4794: aho 'sau havyakavyeṣu pitṛbhiḥ saha modate // GarP_2,34.107 //
GP12garup2_u:4796: maghāsu pitṛparvāṇi yāniyāni ca teṣu ca // GarP_2,34.108 //
GP12garup2_u:4797: śṛṇu tārkṣya yathānyāyaṃ pretatve pitaro yadi /
GP12garup2_u:4799: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryaṃ pūrṇe varṣe na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4800: ādyantu śavaśuddhyarthaṃ kṛtvā caivākṣa ṣoḍaśīm // GarP_2,34.110 //
GP12garup2_u:4802: vṛddhiṃ prāpyāgrataḥ kuryācchūdrasya svacchayaiva hi // GarP_2,34.111 //
GP12garup2_u:4804: na cāsau kurute yāvat preta eva sa vahnimān /
GP12garup2_u:4805: dvādaśāhe tataḥ kāryaṃ sāgnikena sapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,34.112 //
GP12garup2_u:4807: abdamadhye na kurvīta sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ vinā // GarP_2,34.113 //
GP12garup2_u:4808: sapatnyo yadi bahvyaḥ syurekā putravatī bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4811: samācārādbhavet pāpī pitṛhā cāpi jāyate // GarP_2,34.115 //
GP12garup2_u:4812: mṛte bhartari yā nārī prāṇāṃścaiva parityajet /
GP12garup2_u:4813: bhartraiva hi samaṃ tasyāḥ prakurvīta sapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,34.116 //
GP12garup2_u:4814: asthānikāpi yā vyūḍhā vaiśyā vā kṣattriyāpi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4815: yāḥ patnyo vai pituḥ kaścit kuryāt putraḥ sapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,34.117 //
GP12garup2_u:4817: ekoddiṣṭantu tacchrāddha sā tu tenaiva yujyate // GarP_2,34.118 //
GP12garup2_u:4818: anye tu daśa ye putrā jātā varṇa catuṣṭaye /
GP12garup2_u:4819: te tāsutāsu yoktvayāḥ sapiṇḍīkaraṇe sadā // GarP_2,34.119 //
GP12garup2_u:4821: pituḥ pṛthak pradāvyaṃ striyāḥ piṇḍaṃ sapiṇḍane // GarP_2,34.120 //
GP12garup2_u:4823: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryamiti tārkṣya mataṃ mama // GarP_2,34.121 //
GP12garup2_u:4824: aputrāyāṃ mṛtāyāṃ tu patiḥ kuryāt sapiṇḍanam /
GP12garup2_u:4826: putro nāsti na bhartā ca strīṇāṃ tārkṣya sapiṇḍanam /
GP12garup2_u:4829: ekoddiṣṭena dātavyaṃ pareṇa saha bhrātṛbhiḥ // GarP_2,34.124 //
GP12garup2_u:4832: adāhe na ca kartavyaṃ sadāhe kārayedbudhaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4834: pituḥ putreṇa kartavyaṃ na kurbvīta pitā sute /
GP12garup2_u:4839: antyeṣṭiṃ kurute hyeko munibhaiḥ samudāhṛtam // GarP_2,34.129 //
GP12garup2_u:4841: ekaikena ca kartavyā putreṇa ca svayaṃsvayam // GarP_2,34.130 //
GP12garup2_u:4844: bhrātā vā bhrātṛputro vā sapiṇḍaḥ śiṣya eva vā /
GP12garup2_u:4849: pārvaṇaṃ na sutaiḥ kāryaṃ śrāddhaṃ nāndīmukhaṃ na ca // GarP_2,34.134 //
GP12garup2_u:4853: pitṛpiṇḍo na dātavyaḥ sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ vinā // GarP_2,34.136 //
GP12garup2_u:4855: apūrṇe 'pyabdamadhyepi kartavyamiti ke ca na // GarP_2,34.137 //
GP12garup2_u:4857: kartavyaṃ tacca vai sarvameṣa eva vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,34.138 //
GP12garup2_u:4859: ṛṣīṇāṃ pitaro devāḥ pitā jayati tena vai // GarP_2,34.139 //
GP12garup2_u:4862: mṛte pitaryabdamadhye yaḥ śrāddhaṃ kārayet sutaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4863: saptajanmakṛtā dharmāt hīyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,34.141 //
GP12garup2_u:4865: bhramanti vāyunā sarve kṣuttṛḍbhyāṃ paripīḍitāḥ // GarP_2,34.142 //
GP12garup2_u:4867: atha māturvipattiḥ syāt pitṛkāryaṃ na lupyate // GarP_2,34.143 //
GP12garup2_u:4868: mṛtā mātā pitā tiṣṭhejjīvantī ca pitāmahī /
GP12garup2_u:4869: sapiṇḍanantu kartavyaṃ pitāmahyā sahaiva tu // GarP_2,34.144 //
GP12garup2_u:4870: satyaṃsatyaṃ punaḥ satyaṃ śrūyatāṃ vacanaṃ mama /
GP12garup2_u:4871: na piṇḍo milito yeṣāṃ mṛtānāntu nṛṇāṃ bhuvi // GarP_2,34.145 //
GP12garup2_u:4874: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde aurdhvadehikādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma catustriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:4878: puruṣasya ca kasyāpi matā pañcatvamāgatā // GarP_2,35.1 //
GP12garup2_u:4879: pitāmahī jīvati ca tathā ca prapitāmahī /
GP12garup2_u:4882: kena sā melyate mātā etat kathaya me prabho // GarP_2,35.3 //
GP12garup2_u:4891: antyastu tyājako jñeyo yo vṛddhaprapitāmahaḥ // GarP_2,35.7 //
GP12garup2_u:4893: lepakastvantimo yastu sa bhavet paṅktisannidhaḥ // GarP_2,35.8 //
GP12garup2_u:4895: ityete pitaro jñeyā ekaviṃśati saṃkhyakāḥ // GarP_2,35.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4897: jāyate 'tra na sandehaḥ śṛṇu tasyāpi yat phalam // GarP_2,35.10 //
GP12garup2_u:4898: pitā dadāti puttrān vai vicchinnasantatiḥ khaga /
GP12garup2_u:4900: kṛte śrāddhe guṇā hyete pitṝṇāṃ tapeṇe smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4902: yasya puṃsaśca martye vai vicchinnā santatiḥ khaga /
GP12garup2_u:4903: sa vasennarake ghore paṅke magnaḥ karī yathā // GarP_2,35.13 //
GP12garup2_u:4905: na santatiṃ vinā so 'tra mucyate narakāddhruvam // GarP_2,35.14 //
GP12garup2_u:4906: ācāryastasya śiṣyo vā yo dūre 'pi hi gātrejaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4909: nivasennākaloke ca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_2,35.16 //
GP12garup2_u:4911: revatyantaṃ sadā dūṣyamaśubhaṃ sarvadā bhavet // GarP_2,35.17 //
GP12garup2_u:4913: dīyate na jalaṃ tatra aśubhaṃ jāyate dhruvam /
GP12garup2_u:4914: lokayātrā na kartavyā duḥ khārtaḥ svajano yadi // GarP_2,35.18 //
GP12garup2_u:4920: sadyāhutikaraṃ puṇyaṃ tīrthe taddāha uttamaḥ // GarP_2,35.21 //
GP12garup2_u:4922: śavasya ca samīpe tu kṣipyante puttalāstataḥ // GarP_2,35.22 //
GP12garup2_u:4924: tato dāhaḥ prakartavyaḥ taiśca puttalakaiḥ saha // GarP_2,35.23 //
GP12garup2_u:4926: pañcakeṣu mṛto yo 'sau na gatiṃ labhate naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4927: tilān gāśca suvarṇaṃ ca tamuddiśya ghṛtaṃ dadet // GarP_2,35.25 //
GP12garup2_u:4929: sūtakānte ca satputraiḥ sa preto labhate gatim // GarP_2,35.26 //
GP12garup2_u:4933: vidhānaṃ yo na kurvīta vighnastasya prajāyate // GarP_2,35.28 //
GP12garup2_u:4935: āśiṣo dviguṇān darbhān praṇavān naikapiṇḍatām // GarP_2,35.29 //
GP12garup2_u:4937: vikiraṃ ca svadhākāraṃ pitṛśabdaṃ na coccaret // GarP_2,35.30 //
GP12garup2_u:4940: na kuryāt tilahomañca dvijaḥ pūrṇāhutiṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:4943: sthāne dvāre cārdhamārge citāyāṃ śavahastake // GarP_2,35.33 //
GP12garup2_u:4945: ṣaṣṭhaṃ sañcayane proktaṃ daśa piṇḍā daśāhikāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4947: anyacca ṣoḍaśaṃ madhye dvitīyaṃ tārkṣya me śṛṇu /
GP12garup2_u:4950: evaṃ ṣoḍaśakaṃ prāhuretat tattvavido janāḥ // GarP_2,35.36 //
GP12garup2_u:4952: tripakṣasambhavañcaiva dve rikte khaga ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,35.37 //
GP12garup2_u:4955: śatārdhena vihīno yo militaḥ paṅktibhāṅna hi /
GP12garup2_u:4958: melanīyaḥ śatārdhena sandhiḥ śrāddhena tattvataḥ // GarP_2,35.40 //
GP12garup2_u:4961: evaṃ cenna vidhānaṃ vidhīyate tatpiśācaparibhavanam // GarP_2,35.41 //
GP12garup2_u:4963: śavaṃ na muñceta mucyate cet duḥ sparśāddurgatirbhavet // GarP_2,35.42 //
GP12garup2_u:4964: grāmamadhye sthite prete śrute bhuṅkte yadṛcchayā /
GP12garup2_u:4967: grāmamadhye sthite prete varjayet piṇḍapātanam // GarP_2,35.42 // (35.44)
GP12garup2_u:4969: grāmamadhye sthite prete śuddhyarthaṃ jñātidharmataḥ // GarP_2,35.43 //
GP12garup2_u:4972: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛ dhadṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde sapiṇḍanaśavavidhyornirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcatriṃśo
GP12garup2_u:4977: svagṛhantu parityajya tīrthe vai mriyate yadi // GarP_2,36.1 //
GP12garup2_u:4978: aprāpya tīrthaṃ mriyate gṛhe vā mṛtyu māgataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4979: būtvā kuṭīcaro yastu sa kāṃ gatimavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,36.2 //
GP12garup2_u:4980: saṃnyāsaṃ kurute yastu tīrthe vāpi gṛhe 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4982: niyame cet kṛte deva cittabhaṅgo hi jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:4983: kena tasya bhavet siddhiḥ kṛtenāpyakṛtena vā // GarP_2,36.4 //
GP12garup2_u:4985: kṛtvā niraśanaṃ yo vai mṛtyumāpnoti ko 'pi cet /
GP12garup2_u:4986: mānupīṃ tanumutsṛjya mama tulyo virājate // GarP_2,36.5 //
GP12garup2_u:4989: tīrthe gṛhe vā saṃnyāsaṃ nītvā cenmriyate yadi /
GP12garup2_u:4990: pratyahaṃ labhate so 'pi pūrvoktaṃ dviguṇaṃ phalam // GarP_2,36.7 //
GP12garup2_u:4992: punarna jāyate rogo devavaddhi virājate // GarP_2,36.8 //
GP12garup2_u:4993: ya āturaḥ san sannyāsaṃ gṛhṇāti yadi mānavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4994: punarna jāyate bhūmau saṃsāre duḥ khasāgare // GarP_2,36.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4998: mṛto muktimavāpnoti yathā sarve maharṣayaḥ // GarP_2,36.11 //
GP12garup2_u:5000: tasmāt svasthe cottare vā sādhayenmokṣalakṣaṇam // GarP_2,36.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5001: puttradravyādi santyajya tīrthaṃ vrajati yo naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5005: vrataṃ niraśana kṛtvā svagṛhe 'pi mṛto yadi /
GP12garup2_u:5007: annañcaiva tathā toyaṃ parityajya naro yadi /
GP12garup2_u:5010: yamadūtā viśeṣeṇa na yāmyāstasya pārśvagāḥ // GarP_2,36.17 //
GP12garup2_u:5013: sevite 'pi sadā tathi hyanyatra mriyate yadi /
GP12garup2_u:5014: śubhe deśe kule dhīmān sa bhavedvedaviddvijaḥ // GarP_2,36.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5016: brāhmaṇān sa samāhūya sarvasvaṃ yat parityajet // GarP_2,36.20 //
GP12garup2_u:5018: anṛtaṃ na vadet paścāddharmameva samācaret // GarP_2,36.21 //
GP12garup2_u:5019: tīrthe gatvā ca yaḥ ko 'pi punarāyāti vai gṛham /
GP12garup2_u:5020: anujñātaḥ sa vai vipraiḥ prāyaścittamathācaret // GarP_2,36.22 //
GP12garup2_u:5022: tīrthaṃ yadi labhed yastu mṛtyukāle sa bhāgyavān // GarP_2,36.23 //
GP12garup2_u:5024: padepade tu godānaṃ yadi hiṃsā na jāyate // GarP_2,36.24 //
GP12garup2_u:5025: gṛhe tu yat kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tīrthasnānena śudhyati /
GP12garup2_u:5026: kurute tatra pāpañcedvajralepasamaṃ hi tat // GarP_2,36.25 //
GP12garup2_u:5028: tatra dattāni dānāni jāyante cākṣayāṇi vai // GarP_2,36.26 //
GP12garup2_u:5031: dānavantaṃ naraṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭāḥ sarve divaukasaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5032: ṛṣibhiḥ saha dharmaṇa citraguptena sarvadā // GarP_2,36.28 //
GP12garup2_u:5034: parādhīnaṃ mṛte sarvaṃ kṛpayā kaḥ pradāsyati // GarP_2,36.29 //
GP12garup2_u:5036: ātmānaṃ sadhanaṃ tena cakre putraprapautrakaiḥ // GarP_2,36.30 //
GP12garup2_u:5040: mṛtāḥ śocanti te sarve kadaryāḥ pāpinastviti // GarP_2,36.32 //
GP12garup2_u:5045: udāse dhārmikaḥ saumyaḥ prāpyāpi vipulaṃ dhanam /
GP12garup2_u:5047: na caivopadravāstasya mohajālo na caiva hi /
GP12garup2_u:5048: mṛtyukāle na ca bhayaṃ yamadūtasamudbhavam // GarP_2,36.36 //
GP12garup2_u:5049: samāḥ sahasrāṇi ca sapta vai jale daśaikamagnau pavane ca ṣoḍaśa /
GP12garup2_u:5050: mahāhave paṣṭiraśītirgogṛhe anāśake kāśyapa cākṣayā gatiḥ // GarP_2,36.37
GP12garup2_u:5051: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde 'naśanamṛta gatinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5055: vidhinā kena kartavyā kṛtireṣā janārdana // GarP_2,37.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5056: kiṃlakṣaṇāḥ kena pūrṇāḥ kasya deyā janārdana /
GP12garup2_u:5062: dvādaśāhe ca paṇmāse traipakṣe vāpi vatsare /
GP12garup2_u:5063: udakumbhāḥ pradātavyā mārge tasya sukhāya vai // GarP_2,37.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5067: suprītastena dattena preto yāmyaiḥ sa gacchati // GarP_2,37.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5069: vidhinā tatra saṅkalpaya ghaṭān dvādaśasaṃkhyakān // GarP_2,37.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5071: viṣṇumuddiśya dātavyā saṃkalpya brāhmaṇe śubhe // GarP_2,37.8 //
GP12garup2_u:5072: eko vai dharmarājāya tena tuṣṭena muktibhāk /
GP12garup2_u:5073: citraguptāya caikaṃ tu gatastatra sukhī bhavet // GarP_2,37.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5078: pakvānnajalapūrṇo hi yāvat saṃvatsaraṃ dinam // GarP_2,37.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5080: ekā vai vardhanī tatra tasyāṃ pātrantu vaṃśajam // GarP_2,37.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5087: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dvitīyāṃśe pretakalpe dharmakāṇḍe sodakumbhaśrāddhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5090: dānatīrthārthitaṃ mokṣaṃ svargañca vada me prabho /
GP12garup2_u:5091: kena mokṣamavāpnoti kena svarge vasecciram // GarP_2,38.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5093: mānuṣyaṃ kena labhate narakeśu nimajjati // GarP_2,38.2 //
GP12garup2_u:5095: brūhi kasmin mṛte svarge punarjanma na vidyate // GarP_2,38.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5097: mānuṣyaṃ bhārate varṣe trayodaśasu jātiṣu // GarP_2,38.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5098: tat prāpya mriyate kṣetre punarjanma na vidyate /
GP12garup2_u:5099: ayodhyā mathurā māyā kāśī kāñcī avantikā // GarP_2,38.5 //
GP12garup2_u:5101: sannyastamiti yo bruyāt prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi // GarP_2,38.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5102: mṛto viṣṇupuraṃ yāti na punarjāyate kṣitau /
GP12garup2_u:5105: kṛṣṇakṛṣṇeti kṛṣṇeti yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ // GarP_2,38.8 //
GP12garup2_u:5107: śālagrāmajilā yatra yatra dvāravatī śilā // GarP_2,38.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5108: ubhayoḥ saṅgamo yatra muktistatra na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5112: tulasī dahate pāpaṃ nṛṇāṃ janmārjitaṃ khaga // GarP_2,38.11 //
GP12garup2_u:5114: yaḥ snāto mānase tīrthe na sa lipyeta pātakaiḥ // GarP_2,38.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5115: na kāṣṭhe vidyate devo na śilāyāṃ kadācana /
GP12garup2_u:5116: bhāve hi vidyate devastasmādbhāvaṃ samācaret // GarP_2,38.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5118: na te śivapurīṃ yānti cittavṛttirgarīyasī // GarP_2,38.14 //
GP12garup2_u:5119: yādṛk cittapratītiḥ syāt tādṛk karmaphalaṃ nṛṇām /
GP12garup2_u:5121: brāhmaṇārthe gavārthe ca strīṇāṃ balavadheṣu ca /
GP12garup2_u:5122: prāṇatyāgaparo yastu sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,38.16 //
GP12garup2_u:5123: anāśake mṛtau yastu sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt /
GP12garup2_u:5124: anāśake mṛto yastu sa muktaḥ sarvabandhanaiḥ // GarP_2,38.17 //
GP12garup2_u:5126: ete vai mokṣamārgāśca svargamārgāstathaiva ca // GarP_2,38.18 //
GP12garup2_u:5129: ātmānaṃ tatra santyajya svargavāsaṃ labhecciram // GarP_2,38.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5133: prabhāse śrīsthale caiva arbude ca tripuṣkare // GarP_2,38.21 //
GP12garup2_u:5134: bhūteśvare mṛto yastu svarge vasati mānavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5135: brahmaṇo divasaṃ yāvat tataḥ patati bhūtale // GarP_2,38.22 //
GP12garup2_u:5137: sarvaṃ kalaṃ sa muddhṛtya svargaloke mahīyate // GarP_2,38.23 //
GP12garup2_u:5139: indraloke vaset so 'pi svakulaiḥ pariveṣṭitaḥ // GarP_2,38.24 //
GP12garup2_u:5143: jīrṇoddhāreṇa vā teṣāṃ tat puṇyaṃ dviguṇaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,38.26 //
GP12garup2_u:5145: kṛtvā viprāya viduṣe pradadāti kuṭumbine // GarP_2,38.27 //
GP12garup2_u:5146: tisraḥ koṭyordhakoṭī ca naraḥ svarge mahīyate // GarP_2,38.28 //
GP12garup2_u:5147: yā strī savarṇā saṃśubā mṛtaṃ patimanuvrajet /
GP12garup2_u:5148: sā mṛtā svargamāpnoti varṣāṇāṃ romasaṃkhyatā // GarP_2,38.29 //
GP12garup2_u:5150: svargaṃ labhetāṃ tau cobhau divyastrībhiralaṅkṛtau // GarP_2,38.30 //
GP12garup2_u:5152: prakṣālayati sarvāṇi yā svaṃ patimanuvrajet // GarP_2,38.31 //
GP12garup2_u:5162: saro bhirdaśabhistulyā yā prapā nirjale vane // GarP_2,38.36 //
GP12garup2_u:5163: yā vāpī nirjale deśe yaddānaṃ nirdhane dvije /
GP12garup2_u:5164: prāṇināṃ yo dayāṃ dhatte sa bhavennākanāyakaḥ // GarP_2,38.37 //
GP12garup2_u:5166: sa tat sarvaṃ phalaṃ prāpya pratiṣṭhāṃ paramāṃ labhet // GarP_2,38.38 //
GP12garup2_u:5167: phalgu kāryaṃ parityajya satataṃ dharmavān bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:5168: dānaṃ damo dayā ceti sārametat trayaṃ bhuvi // GarP_2,38.39 //
GP12garup2_u:5171: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde uttamalokagatyāgatimokṣamānuṣyahetunirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭātriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5174: sūtakānāṃ vidhiṃ brūhi dayāṃ kṛtvā mayiprabho /
GP12garup2_u:5175: vivekāya hi cittasya mānavānāṃ hitāya ca // GarP_2,39.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5180: dānaṃ pratigraho homaḥ svādhyāyaśca nivartate // GarP_2,39.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5184: snānaṃ sacelaṃ kartavyaṃ sadyaḥ śaucaṃ vidhīyate // GarP_2,39.5 //
GP12garup2_u:5185: āmagarbhāśca ye jīvā ye ca garbhādviniḥ sṛtāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5188: rājānaḥ śrotiyāścaiva sadyaḥ śaucāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_2,39.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5190: eteṣāṃ sūtakaṃ nāsti yasya cecchanti pārthivāḥ // GarP_2,39.8 //
GP12garup2_u:5191: prasave ca sapiṇḍānāṃ na kuryāt saṅkaraṃ dvijaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5192: daśāhācchrudhyate mātā avagāhya pitā śuciḥ // GarP_2,39.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5198: tāvat syādaśucirvipro yāvat tat syādanirdaśam // GarP_2,39.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5199: udite niyame dāne ārte vipre nivedayet /
GP12garup2_u:5200: tathaiva ṛṣibhiḥ proktaṃ yathākālaṃ na duṣyati // GarP_2,39.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5202: mṛttikayā tathānte ca naraḥ snātvā śucirbhavet // GarP_2,39.14 //
GP12garup2_u:5203: dānaṃ pariṣade dadyāt suvarṇaṃ govṛṣaṃ dvije /
GP12garup2_u:5204: kṣattriyo dviguṇaṃ caiva vaiśyastu triguṇaṃ tathā // GarP_2,39.15 //
GP12garup2_u:5208: ahastu sūtakaṃ tasya tvabdānāṃ saṃkhyayā smṛtam // GarP_2,39.17 //
GP12garup2_u:5209: brāhmaṇārthe vipannā ye nārīṇāṃ gograheṣu ca /
GP12garup2_u:5217: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛ dhadṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde sūtakakālādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmai konacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5221: kathaṃ teṣāṃ bhavenmārgaḥ kiṃ sthānaṃ kā gatirbhavet // GarP_2,40.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5222: kiñca yuktaṃ bhavetteṣāṃ vidhānaṃ vāpi kīdṛśam /
GP12garup2_u:5223: tadahaṃ śrotumicchāmi brūhi me madhusūdana // GarP_2,40.2 //
GP12garup2_u:5227: śṛṇu tārkṣya paraṃ gopyaṃ jāte durmaraṇe sati /
GP12garup2_u:5232: yānti te narakeghore ye ca mlecchādibhirhatāḥ // GarP_2,40.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5234: ullaṅghitā mṛtā ye ca mahārogaiśca pīḍitāḥ // GarP_2,40.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5240: na teṣāṃ kārayeddāhaṃ sūtakaṃ nodakakriyām // GarP_2,40.10 //
GP12garup2_u:5241: na vidhānaṃ mṛtādyaṃ ca na kuryādaurdhvadaihikam /
GP12garup2_u:5244: ṣaṇmāsaṃ brāhmaṇe dāhastrimāsaṃ kṣattriye mataḥ // GarP_2,40.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5245: sārdha māsaṃ tu vaiśyasya sadyaḥ śūdre vidhīyate /
GP12garup2_u:5246: gaṅgāyāṃ yamunāyāñca naimiṣe puṣkare 'tha ca // GarP_2,40.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5247: taḍāge jalūpūrṇe vā hrade vā vimalodake /
GP12garup2_u:5248: vāpyāṃ kūpe gavāṃ goṣṭhe gṛhe vā pratimālaye // GarP_2,40.14 //
GP12garup2_u:5250: pretāya tarpaṇaṃ kāryaṃ mantraiḥ paurāṇavaidikaiḥ // GarP_2,40.15 //
GP12garup2_u:5258: dānadharmarataḥ śāntaḥ praṇamya vāgyataḥ śuciḥ // GarP_2,40.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5260: bhaktyā tatra prakurvīta śrāddhatyekādaśaiva tu // GarP_2,40.20 //
GP12garup2_u:5263: haviṣyānnaṃ śubhaṃ mudrāṃ chatroṣṇīṣe ca calekam /
GP12garup2_u:5268: śaṅkhapātre tathā tāmre tarpaṇañca pṛthakpṛthak // GarP_2,40.24 //
GP12garup2_u:5275: ye devāsaścaturthe tu samudraṃ gaccha pañcame /
GP12garup2_u:5276: agnirjyoti stathā ṣaṣṭhe hiraṇyagarbhaḥ saptame // GarP_2,40.28 //
GP12garup2_u:5278: taśame yāḥ phalinīti piṇḍe caikādaśe tataḥ // GarP_2,40.29 //
GP12garup2_u:5286: sīsakaṃ tu bhavetpretaṃ tvatha vā darbhakaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:5287: śannodevīti mantreṇa govindaṃ paścime nyaset // GarP_2,40.33 //
GP12garup2_u:5291: madhye maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā sthāpyo darbhamayo naraḥ // GarP_2,40.35 //
GP12garup2_u:5292: brahmā viṣṇustathā rudro yamaḥ pretaśca pañcamaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5295: japaṃ karyātpṛthaktatra brahmādau devatāsu ca // GarP_2,40.37 //
GP12garup2_u:5298: śaṅkhe vā tāmrapātre vā alābhe mṛnmaye 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:5309: palāśasya ca vṛntānāṃ vibhāgaṃ śṛṇu kāśyapa // GarP_2,40.44 //
GP12garup2_u:5311: śatatrayeṇa ṣaṣṭyā ca vṛntaiḥ prokto 'sthisañcayaḥ // GarP_2,40.45 //
GP12garup2_u:5315: bāhuyugme śataṃ dadyātkaṭi deśe ca viṃśatim // GarP_2,40.47 //
GP12garup2_u:5319: nārikelaṃ śiraḥ sthāne tumbaṃ dadyācca tāluke /
GP12garup2_u:5321: antreṣu nālakaṃ dadyādbālakaṃ prāṇa eva ca /
GP12garup2_u:5322: vasāyīṃ medakaṃ dadyādgomūtreṇa tu mūtrakam // GarP_2,40.50 //
GP12garup2_u:5323: gandhakaṃ dhātavo deyo haritālaṃ manaḥ śilā /
GP12garup2_u:5324: retaḥ sthāne pāradañca purīṣe pittalaṃ tathā // GarP_2,40.51 //
GP12garup2_u:5325: manaḥ śilāṃ tathā gātre tilakalkañca sandhiṣu /
GP12garup2_u:5326: yavapiṣṭaṃ tathā māṃse madhu vai kṣaudrameva ca // GarP_2,40.52 //
GP12garup2_u:5330: vṛntākaṃ vṛṣaṇadvandve liṅge syādgṛñjanaṃ śubham // GarP_2,40.54 //
GP12garup2_u:5331: ghṛtaṃ nābhyāṃ pradeyaṃ syātkaupīne ca trapu smṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:5334: paridhānaṃ paṭṭasūtraṃ hṛdaye rukmakaṃ nyaset // GarP_2,40.56 //
GP12garup2_u:5335: ṛddhivṛddhī bhujau dvau ca cakṣuṣośca kapardakau /
GP12garup2_u:5338: sāgnike (kaiścā) cāpi vidhinā yajñapātraṃ nyasetkramāt // GarP_2,40.58 //
GP12garup2_u:5339: śirome śrīriti ṛcā punantu varuṇeti ca /
GP12garup2_u:5342: (tilā lohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca kārpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:5343: saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāva ekaikaṃ pānaṃ samṛtam // GarP_2,40.61 //
GP12garup2_u:5344: tilapātraṃ tato dattvā padadānaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_2,40.61*1 //
GP12garup2_u:5348: pretaṃmokṣaṃ tataḥ kuryāddhṛdi viṣṇuṃ prakalpya ca // GarP_2,40.63 //
GP12garup2_u:5349: oṃ viṣṇuriti saṃsmṛtya pretaṃ tanmṛtyumeva ca /
GP12garup2_u:5352: sarvaṃ varṣavidhiṃ kuryādevaṃ pretaśca muktibhāk // GarP_2,40.65 //
GP12garup2_u:5353: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde 'pamṛtyau sukhaduḥ khalābhālābhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma
GP12garup2_u:5358: kārtikādiṣu māseṣu paurṇamāsyāṃ śubhe dine // GarP_2,41.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5361: vāpyāṃ kūpe gavāṃ goṣṭhe sthāpyāgniṃ vidhivattataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5364: puryukṣaṇānte homaṃ ca karyā dvai brāhmaṇena tu // GarP_2,41.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5365: āghārāvājyabhāgau ca cakṣuṣī ca pradā payet /
GP12garup2_u:5368: agnaye rudrāya śarvāya paśupataye ugrāya śivāya /
GP12garup2_u:5384: evaṃ vidhiḥ samāyuktaḥ pretamokṣe karoti hi // GarP_2,41.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5385: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde vṛṣotsarganirūpaṇaṃ nāmai kacatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5392: nāsti bhamisamaṃ dānaṃ nāsti bhamisamo nidhiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5393: nāsti satyasamo dharmo nānṛtātpātakaṃ param // GarP_2,42.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5394: agnerapatyaṃ prathamaṃ suvarṇaṃ bhūrvaiṣṇavī sūryasutāśca gāvaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5395: lokatrayaṃ tena bhavetpradattaṃ yaḥ kāñcanaṃ gāṃ ca mahīṃ ca dadyāt //
GP12garup2_u:5398: kṛtvā bahūni pāpāni raudrāṇi vipulāni ca /
GP12garup2_u:5401: sa yāti narake ghore yastaṃ na parirakṣati // GarP_2,42.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5405: vṛtticchede tathā vṛtteḥ karaṇaṃ lakṣadhenukam // GarP_2,42.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5406: varamekāpyapahṛtā na tu dattaṃ gavāṃ śatam /
GP12garup2_u:5407: ekāṃ hṛtvā śataṃ dattvā na tena samatā bhavet // GarP_2,42.10 //
GP12garup2_u:5408: svayameva tu yo dattvā svayameva prabādhate /
GP12garup2_u:5409: sa pāpī narakaṃ yāti yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam // GarP_2,42.11 //
GP12garup2_u:5411: avṛttikarśite dīne brāhmaṇe gakṣite yathā // GarP_2,42.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5413: yatpuṇyaṃ durbale traste brāhmaṇe parirakṣite // GarP_2,42.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5415: yuddhakāle viśīryante saikatāḥ setavo yathā // GarP_2,42.14 //
GP12garup2_u:5416: svadattāṃ paradattāṃ vā yo harecca vasundharām /
GP12garup2_u:5425: jvalantamagnimutsṛjya na hi bhasmani hūyate // GarP_2,42.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5426: saṃkrāntau yāni dānāni havyakavyāni yāni ca /
GP12garup2_u:5429: pratigrahācchrudhyati jāpyahomaṃ na yājanaṃ karma punanti vedāḥ //
GP12garup2_u:5432: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde bhūdānādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvicatvāriṃśatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5436: aindavābhyāṃ viśudhyanti dattvā dhenuṃ tathā vṛṣam // GarP_2,43.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5438: prāyaścittaṃ carenmātā pitā vānyo 'pi bāndhavaḥ // GarP_2,43.2 //
GP12garup2_u:5440: rājadaṇḍo na tasyāsti prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate // GarP_2,43.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5441: raktasya darśane daṣṭe āturā strī bhaved yadi /
GP12garup2_u:5442: caturthe 'hni padādīṃśca tyaktvā snātvā viśudhyati // GarP_2,43.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5444: snātvāsnātvāspṛśedenaṃ tataḥ śudhyet sa āturaḥ // GarP_2,43.5 //
GP12garup2_u:5445: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde śuddhinirūpaṇaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5454: na teṣāṃ syānnava śrāddhaṃ na saṃskāraḥ sapiṇḍanam /
GP12garup2_u:5455: śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśoktāni na bhavanti ca tānyapi // GarP_2,44.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5459: ekādaśīṃ samāsādya śuklapakṣe ca kāśyapa // GarP_2,44.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5461: daśa piṇḍān ghṛtāktāṃśca darbheṣu madhusaṃyutān // GarP_2,44.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5462: yajñopavīti satilān dhyāyan viṣṇuṃ yamaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:5464: uddhṛtya miśritān paścāt tīrthe 'bhmaḥ su viniḥ kṣipet /
GP12garup2_u:5465: kṣipan saṃkīrtayennāma gotraṃ ca mṛtakasya ca // GarP_2,44.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5471: apare 'hani madhyāhne yamaṃ viṣṇuṃ tathārcayet // GarP_2,44.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5475: pretaṃ yamaṃ ca viṣṇuṃ ca smaran śrāddhaṃ samāpayet // GarP_2,44.14 //
GP12garup2_u:5477: pṛthagvā daśa piṇḍāṃśca pañca dadyāt krameṇa tu // GarP_2,44.15 //
GP12garup2_u:5478: prathamaṃ viṣṇave dadyādbrahmaṇe ca śivāya ca /
GP12garup2_u:5479: sabhṛtyāya śivāyātha pretāyāpi ca pañcamam // GarP_2,44.16 //
GP12garup2_u:5480: nāma gotraṃ smaret tasya viṣṇuśabdaṃ prakīrtayet /
GP12garup2_u:5484: dadyādannaṃ dvijānāṃ ca tāmbūlaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:5485: evaṃ śiṣṭatamaṃ vipraṃ hariṇyena prapūjayet // GarP_2,44.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5487: anuvrajya dvijān paścāt tyaktāmbho dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ // GarP_2,44.20 //
GP12garup2_u:5498: arcayet tāṃ sitaiḥ puṣpaiḥ sugandhaiścandanenaca // GarP_2,44.25 //
GP12garup2_u:5504: dhenuṃ dattvā tato brūyāt prīyatāṃ nāgarāḍiti // GarP_2,44.28 //
GP12garup2_u:5507: pretatvānmocayet tāṃstu svargamārgaṃ nayet ca // GarP_2,44.29 //
GP12garup2_u:5508: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśākhye dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde durmaraṇe kāryākāryakriyādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuścatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5515: ekoddiṣṭaṃ na kuryātāṃ pratyabdaṃ tau tu pārvaṇam // GarP_2,45.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5516: yadā tvanyataraḥ sāgniḥ putro vāpyathavā pitā /
GP12garup2_u:5517: pratyabdaṃ pārvaṇaṃ tatra kuryātāṃ kṣetrajaurasau // GarP_2,45.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5518: anagnayaḥ sāgnayo vā putrā vā pitaro 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:5519: ekoddiṣṭaṃ sutaiḥ kāryaṃ kṣayāha iti kecana // GarP_2,45.5 //
GP12garup2_u:5520: darśakāle kṣayo yasya pretapakṣe 'tha vā punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5521: pratyabdaṃ pārvaṇaṃ kāryaṃ tasya sarvaiḥ sutairapi // GarP_2,45.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5524: bahirlūnāḥ sakṛllanāḥ śrāddhaṃ vṛddhimṛte sadā // GarP_2,45.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5525: kartavye pārvaṇe śrāddhe āśaucaṃ yadi jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:5527: ekoddiṣṭe tu samprāpte yadi vighnaḥ prajāyate /
GP12garup2_u:5528: māsenyasmin tithau tasyāṃ kuryācchrāddhaṃ tadaiva hi // GarP_2,45.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5531: ekakāle gatā sūnāṃ bahūnāmatha vā dvayoḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5532: tantreṇa śrapaṇaṃ kuryācchrāddhaṃ kuryāt pṛthakpṛthak // GarP_2,45.11 //
GP12garup2_u:5533: dadyāt pūrvaṃ mṛtasyādau dvitīyasya tataḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5534: tṛtīyasya tataḥ kuryāt saṃnipāte tvayaṃ vidhiḥ (kramaḥ) // GarP_2,45.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5536: tārayitvā pitṝn sarvān prāpnoti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_2,45.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5539: yadā māso na vijñāto vijñātaṃ dinameva ca /
GP12garup2_u:5540: tadā mārgaśire māsi māghe vā taddinaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,45.15 //
GP12garup2_u:5542: prasthānadinamāsau tu grāhyau śrāddhe mayoditau // GarP_2,45.16 //
GP12garup2_u:5543: prasthānasyāpi na jñātau dinamāsau yadā punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5546: tadānīmapi tau grāhyau pūrvavat tu mṛtāhike // GarP_2,45.18 //
GP12garup2_u:5547: gṛhasthe proṣite yacca kaścittu mriyate gṛhe /
GP12garup2_u:5550: āśaucaṃ gṛhiṇasteṣāṃ na dravyādestadā bhavet // GarP_2,45.20 //
GP12garup2_u:5552: samāpanīyaṃ tatrāpi śrāddhaṃ gṛhītu dūrataḥ // GarP_2,45.21 //
GP12garup2_u:5553: dātrā boktrā ca na jñātaṃ sūtakaṃ mṛtakaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:5556: bhoktureva tadā doṣo nānyo dātā praduṣyati // GarP_2,45.23 //
GP12garup2_u:5560: sarvān pitṛgaṇān samyak sahaivoddiśya yojayet // GarP_2,45.25 //
GP12garup2_u:5564: dattvā tu dakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā namaskārairvisarjayet // GarP_2,45.27 //
GP12garup2_u:5571: mātāmahebhyaśca tathā dadyāditthaṃ krameṇa tu // GarP_2,45.31 //
GP12garup2_u:5573: patiputrānvitāḥ sādhvyo yoṣito 'ṣṭau ca bhāvayet // GarP_2,45.32 //
GP12garup2_u:5576: nityaṃ daivañca vṛddhiñca kāmyaṃ naimittikaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:5578: iti te kathitaṃ tārkṣya kimanyatparipṛcchasi // GarP_2,45.34 //
GP12garup2_u:5579: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pratyābdikādiśrāddhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5583: bhogāḥ saukhyāti rūpañca balaṃ buddhaiḥ parākramaḥ // GarP_2,46.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5584: satyaṃ puṇyavatāṃ deva jāyate 'tra paratra ca /
GP12garup2_u:5585: satyaṃsatyaṃ punaḥ satyaṃ vedavākyaṃ na cānyathā // GarP_2,46.2 //
GP12garup2_u:5586: dharmo jayati nādharmaḥ satyaṃ jayāte nānṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:5587: kṣamā jayati na krodho viṣṇurjayati nāsuraḥ // GarP_2,46.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5593: tanme vada suraśreṣṭha samāsenāpi kāṅkṣitam // GarP_2,46.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5596: jāyante lakṣaṇairyaistutāni me śṛṇu kāśyapa // GarP_2,46.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5598: iha pracchannapāpānāṃ śāstā vaivasvato yamaḥ // GarP_2,46.8 //
GP12garup2_u:5600: yātanābhirvimuktā ye yānti te jīvasantatīm // GarP_2,46.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5601: gatvā mānuṣabhāve tu pāpacihnā bhavanti te /
GP12garup2_u:5602: tānyahaṃ tava cihnāni kathayiṣye khagottama // GarP_2,46.10 //
GP12garup2_u:5603: soḍhvā vai yātanāḥ sarvā gatvā vaivasvatakṣayam /
GP12garup2_u:5606: brahmahā jāyate kuṣṭhī śyāvadantaśca madyapaḥ // GarP_2,46.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5610: kharo vai bahuyājī syātkāko nirmantrabhojanāt // GarP_2,46.14 //
GP12garup2_u:5614: annaṃ paryuṣitaṃ vipre pradadatkukkaro bhavet // GarP_2,46.16 //
GP12garup2_u:5617: mṛto vānaratāṃ yāti tanmukho gaṇḍavān bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:5618: adattvā bhakṣyamaśrāti anapatyo bhavettu saḥ // GarP_2,46.18 //
GP12garup2_u:5622: aprāptayauvanāṃ sevan bhavetsarpa iti śrutiḥ // GarP_2,46.20 //
GP12garup2_u:5626: ayonigo vṛko hi syādulūkaḥ krayavañcanāt // GarP_2,46.22 //
GP12garup2_u:5633: yadvā tadvāpi pārakyaṃ svalpaṃ vā harate bahu /
GP12garup2_u:5634: hṛtvā vai yonimāpnoti tiraścāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,46.26 //
GP12garup2_u:5637: evaṃ duṣkṛtakarmā hi bhuktvā ca narakānkramāt /
GP12garup2_u:5640: jāyate nātra sandehaḥ samībhūte śubhāśubhe // GarP_2,46.29 //
GP12garup2_u:5643: indriyāṇi manaḥ prāṇā jñānamāyuḥ sukhaṃ dhṛtiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5644: dhāraṇā preraṇaṃ duḥ khaṃ mithyāhaṅkāra eva ca // GarP_2,46.31 //
GP12garup2_u:5648: purā yathā mayā proktaṃ tava jantorhi lakṣaṇam // GarP_2,46.33 //
GP12garup2_u:5654: yā dṛśyante vainateya tatsarvaṃ karmajaṃ phalam // GarP_2,46.36 //
GP12garup2_u:5656: patedvai narake bhūyo tasyottāro na vidyate // GarP_2,46.37 //
GP12garup2_u:5657: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe jīvasya śubhāśubhagatinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5661: dānaṃ dānasya māhātmyaṃ vaitaraṇyāḥ pramāṇakam // GarP_2,47.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5663: yā sā vaitaraṇī nāma yamamārge mahāsarit /
GP12garup2_u:5667: kvāthyate satvaraṃ toyaṃ pātramadhye ghṛtaṃ yathā /
GP12garup2_u:5668: krimibhiḥ saṅkulaṃ pūyaṃ vajratuṇḍaiḥ samāvṛtam // GarP_2,47.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5671: udyānti dvādaśādityāḥ pralayānte tathā hi te /
GP12garup2_u:5672: tapanti tatra vai martyāḥ kranda mānāstu pāpinaḥ // GarP_2,47.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5673: hā bhrātaḥ putra tāteti pralapanti muhurmuhuḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5674: vicaranti nimajjanti glāniṃ gacchanti jantavaḥ // GarP_2,47.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5676: taranti gopradānena tvanyathā ca patanti te // GarP_2,47.8 //
GP12garup2_u:5677: māṃ narā ye 'vamanyante cācāryaṃ gurumeva ca /
GP12garup2_u:5678: vṛddhānanyāṃścāpi mūḍhāsteṣāṃ vāsastu tatra vai // GarP_2,47.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5680: parityajanti ye mūḍhāsteṣāṃ vāsastu santatam // GarP_2,47.10 //
GP12garup2_u:5683: pacyante tatra madhye tu krandamānāstu pāpinaḥ // GarP_2,47.11 //
GP12garup2_u:5686: brāhmaṇāya pratīśrutya yamārthaṃ na dadāti tam /
GP12garup2_u:5687: āhūya nāsti yo brūyāttasya vāsastu tatra vai // GarP_2,47.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5693: godhanasya tṛṣārtasya vāpyā bhedaṃ karoti yaḥ // GarP_2,47.16 //
GP12garup2_u:5696: ete vasanti satataṃ mā vicāraṃ kṛthāḥ kvacit /
GP12garup2_u:5697: kṛpaṇo nāstikaḥ kṣudraḥ sa tasyāṃ nivasetkhaga // GarP_2,47.18 //
GP12garup2_u:5701: kṛtaghno garbhasantāpī vaitaraṇyāṃ sa majjati // GarP_2,47.20 //
GP12garup2_u:5707: yadā tadā bhavedvāpi śrāddhā dānaṃ prati dhruvam // GarP_2,47.23 //
GP12garup2_u:5709: anityāni śarīrāṇi vibhavo naiva śāśvataḥ // GarP_2,47.24 //
GP12garup2_u:5711: kṛṣṇāṃ vā pāṭalāṃ vāpi kuryādvaitaraṇīṃ śubhām // GarP_2,47.25 //
GP12garup2_u:5722: tartukāmo dadāmyenāṃ tubhyaṃ vaitaraṇīṃ namaḥ // GarP_2,47.30 //
GP12garup2_u:5723: gāvo me agrataḥ santu gāvo me santu pārśvataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5724: gāvo me hṛdaye santu gavāṃ madhye vasāmyaham // GarP_2,47.31 //
GP12garup2_u:5726: sadakṣiṇā mayā dattā tubhyaṃ vaitaraṇīnamaḥ // GarP_2,47.32 //
GP12garup2_u:5729: pucchaṃ saṃgṛhya dhenvāśca agre kṛtvā tu vai vdijam /
GP12garup2_u:5730: dhenuke tvaṃ pratīkṣasva yamadvāre mahābhaye // GarP_2,47.34 //
GP12garup2_u:5732: anuvrajettu gacchantaṃ sarvaṃ tasya gṛhaṃ nayet // GarP_2,47.35 //
GP12garup2_u:5733: evaṃ kṛte vainateya sā saritsutarā bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:5737: mṛtasyaiva tu yaddānaṃ parokṣe tatsamaṃ smṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:5738: svahastena tato deyaṃ mṛte kaḥ kasya dāsyatī // GarP_2,47.38 //
GP12garup2_u:5740: asthireṇa śarīreṇa sthiraṃ karma samācaret // GarP_2,47.39 //
GP12garup2_u:5741: avaśyameva yāsyanti prāṇāḥ prāghuṇi (ghūrṇi) kā iva // GarP_2,47.40 //
GP12garup2_u:5742: itīdamuktaṃ tava pakṣirāja viḍambanaṃ jantugaṇasya sarvam /
GP12garup2_u:5743: pretasya mokṣāya tadauddhvandaihikaṃ hitāya lokasya carecchubhāya tu //
GP12garup2_u:5750: maraṇaṃ janma ca tathā pretatvañcaurdhvadaihikam // GarP_2,47.44 //
GP12garup2_u:5751: mayā proktaṃ vai muktyai nidānaṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5754: dharmo jayati nādharmaḥ satyaṃ jayati nānṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:5755: kṣamā jayati na krodho viṣṇurjayati nāsurāḥ // GarP_2,47.46 //
GP12garup2_u:5757: yeṣāmeva sthirā buddhirna teṣāṃ durgatirbhavet // GarP_2,47.47 //
GP12garup2_u:5766: apavitraḥ pavitro vā sarvāvasthāṃ gatopi vā /
GP12garup2_u:5767: yaḥ smaretpuṇḍarīkākṣaṃ sa bāhyābhyantaraṃ śuciḥ // GarP_2,47.52 //
GP12garup2_u:5768: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpu- uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛ dharmakādṛpretadṛśrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde karmavipākādinirūpaṇaṃ
GP12garup2_u:5772: ye martyaloke nivasanti mānavāste sarvajātau nidhanaṃ prayānti /
GP12garup2_u:5773: kāle svakīye nijapuṇyasaṃkhyayā vadanti lāka kathasva tanme // GarP_2,48.1
GP12garup2_u:5775: kenaiva puṇyena mudaṃ prayānti tiṣṭhanti kenaiva kulaṃ balaṃ vayaḥ //
GP12garup2_u:5777: śrutvātha devo garuḍaṃ tvavocat smṛtvā vapuḥ karmabhayañca rūpam /
GP12garup2_u:5778: sṛṣṭā dharā yena carācaraṃ jagatsa yena śastā vihito yamo vibhuḥ //
GP12garup2_u:5781: praviśyacāṅguṣṭhasame sa tatra vai taṃ prāpya dehaṃ svamandiram? //
GP12garup2_u:5782: gṛhītapāśo rudate punaḥ punardeśe supuṇye dvija dehasaṃsthitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5783: devendrapūjā pitṛdevatṛptidaṃ mohānna ceṣṭaṃ na ca puttrasantatiḥ //
GP12garup2_u:5784: na me 'sti bandhuryamamārgagāmino mayā na kṛtyaṃ dvijadehalipsayā /
GP12garup2_u:5786: prāptaṃ suratnaṃ karasaṃsthitaṃ gataṃ dehankvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam //
GP12garup2_u:5787: yaḥ kṣattriyo bāhubalena saṃyuge lalāṭadeśādrudhiraṃ mukhe papau /
GP12garup2_u:5788: tatsomapānaṃ hi kṛtaṃ mahāmakhe jīvanmṛtaḥ so 'pi hi yāti muktik //
GP12garup2_u:5790: śastraṃ gṛhītvā samare ripūṇāṃ yaḥ saṃmukhaṃ yāti sa muktapāpaḥ //
GP12garup2_u:5791: kṣattrānvayo vāpi viśonvayo vā śūdrānvayo vāpi hi nīcavarṇaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5793: upadruteṣveṣu parāṅmukho yaḥ syustasya devāḥ sakalāḥ parāṅmukhāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5794: tilodakaṃ naiva pibanti pūrve hutaṃ na gṛhṇāti hutāśanopi tat //
GP12garup2_u:5795: dveṣādbhayādvā samare samāgate śastraṃ gṛhītvā parasainyasaṃmukhaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5796: na yāti pakṣīndra mṛśca paścātkṣāttraṃ balaṃ tasya gataṃ tathaiva /
GP12garup2_u:5797: dvijāya dattvā kanakaṃ mahīmimāṃ bhūyaḥ sa paścādbhavatīha loke //
GP12garup2_u:5798: dānaṃ pradattaṃ grahaṇe dvijendre snānaṃ kṛtaṃ tena sadā sutīrthe /
GP12garup2_u:5799: gatvā gayāyāṃ pitṛpiṇḍadānaṃ kṛtaṃ sadā yo mriyate tu yuddhe //
GP12garup2_u:5800: yaḥ kṣāttradehantu vihāya śocate raṇāṅgaṇe svāmivadhe ca gograhe /
GP12garup2_u:5801: strībālaghāte pathi sārthahetave mayā svakośaṃ na hataṃ na pātitam //
GP12garup2_u:5802: vaiśyaḥ svakarmāṇi viśocate tadā gṛhītapāśo na mayāpi sañcitam /
GP12garup2_u:5803: satyaṃ na coktaṃ kraya vikrayeṇa mohādvimūḍhena kuṭumbahetave //
GP12garup2_u:5804: śūdraṃ vapuḥ prāpya yaśaskaraṃ sadā dānaṃ dvijebhyo na kṛtaṃ dvijārcanam /
GP12garup2_u:5805: cdṛdadyatdadvaḍḍha ḍhaddhadṛthr dadṛdhḍḍhathrḍaḍḍhaddha jalāśayo naiva kṛto dharātale asaṃskṛto vipravaro na saṃskṛtaḥ //
GP12garup2_u:5806: tyaktvā svakarmāṇi madena susthitaṃ mayā sutīrthe svavapurna cojjhitam /
GP12garup2_u:5807: dharmorjito naiva na devapūjanaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā caiva vimuktihetave //
GP12garup2_u:5809: marunmayaṃ dehamime viśanti naivehamānāḥ pathi dharmasaṃkule //
GP12garup2_u:5810: parasparaṃ dharmakṛntaṃ svakīyaṃ sampādya lakṣyaṃ pathi sañcarantsvam /
GP12garup2_u:5811: pakṣīndra vākyāni śṛṇuṣva tāni manoramāṇi pravadanti yāni // GarP_2,48.18
GP12garup2_u:5812: sārā hi lokeṣu bhavettrilokī dvīpeṣu sarveṣu ca jambukākhyam /
GP12garup2_u:5813: deśeṣu sarveṣvapi devadeśaḥ jīveṣu sarveṣu manuṣya eva // GarP_2,48.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5814: varṇāśca catvāra iha praśastāḥ varṇeṣu dharmiṣṭhanarāḥ praśastāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5815: dharmeṇa saukhyaṃ samupaiti sarvaṃ jñānaṃ samāpnoti mahāpathe sthitaḥ //
GP12garup2_u:5816: dehaṃ parityajya yadā gatāyuḥ pakṣin sthito 'haṃ kṛmikīṭasaṃsthitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5818: sarvaṃ vijānāti hi garbhasaṃsthito jātaśca sadyastadidañca vismaret /
GP12garup2_u:5819: yaccintitaṃ garbhasamāgatena vai bālo yuvā vṛddhavayā babhūva //
GP12garup2_u:5820: mohādvināṣṭaṃ yadi garbhacintitaṃ smṛtaṃ punarmṛtyugate cadehe /
GP12garup2_u:5821: tasminpranaṣṭe hṛdi cintitaṃ gataṃ smṛtaṃ punargarbhagate ca dehe //
GP12garup2_u:5822: tasminpranaṣṭe hṛdi cintitaṃ punarmayā svakośe paravañcanaṃ kṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:5823: dyūtaiśchalenāpi ca cauryavṛttyā dharmaṃ vyatikramya śarīrarakṣaṇe //
GP12garup2_u:5824: kṛcchreṇa lakṣmīḥ samupārjitā svayaṃ mayā na bhuktaṃ manasepsitaṃ dhanam /
GP12garup2_u:5826: somagrahe sūryasamāgamepi vā na sevitaṃ tīrthavariṣṭhamuttamam /
GP12garup2_u:5827: kośaṃ svakīyaṃ malamūtrapūritaṃ dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam //
GP12garup2_u:5828: mayā na dṛṣṭā na natā na pūjitā traivikramī mūrtiriha sthitā bhuvi /
GP12garup2_u:5829: prabhāsanātho na ca bhaktisaṃstuto dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam //
GP12garup2_u:5830: gatvā variṣṭhe bhuvi tīrthasannidhau dhanaṃ na dattaṃ viduṣāṃ kare mayā /
GP12garup2_u:5831: āplutya dehaṃ vidhinā dvije gurau dihinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam //
GP12garup2_u:5832: na mātṛpūjā na ca viṣṇuśaṅkarau gaṇeśacaṇaḍyau na ca bhāskaro 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:5834: labdhā mayā mānavadevatopamā mohādgatā sarvamidañca pārthiva /
GP12garup2_u:5835: gatiṃ na vīkṣeta sa vai vimūḍhadhīrdehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam //
GP12garup2_u:5837: muktiṃ samāyānti manuṣyaloke vasanti ye dharmaratāḥ sudeśe // GarP_2,48.31
GP12garup2_u:5839: hā daiva hā daiva iti smaran vai dhanaṃ na dattaṃ svayamarjitaṃ yat //
GP12garup2_u:5840: na bhūmidānaṃ na ca gopradānaṃ na vāridānaṃ na ca vastradānam /
GP12garup2_u:5841: phalaṃ satāmbūlavilepanaṃ vā tvayā na dattaṃ bhuvi śocase katham //
GP12garup2_u:5842: pitā mṛtaste ca pitāmahaḥ sā yayā dhṛto vāpyudare svakīye /
GP12garup2_u:5843: mṛto 'pyasau bandhujanaḥ samasto dṛṣṭaṃ tvayā sarvamidaṃ gatāyaḥ //
GP12garup2_u:5844: kośaṃ tvadīyaṃ jvalitañca vahninā puttrairgṛhīto dhanadhānya sañcayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5845: subhāṣitaṃ dharmacayaṃ kṛtañca yattadeva gacchettava pṛṣṭhasaṃstham //
GP12garup2_u:5846: na dṛśyate ko 'pi mṛtaḥ samāgato rājā yatirvā dvijapuṅgavo 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:5847: yo vai mṛtaḥ sāhasikaḥ sa martyako nāśaṃ yo 'pi dharātale sthitaḥ //
GP12garup2_u:5848: evaṃ gaṇāste bruvate sakinnarā dhairyaṃ samālambya vipādapūritaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5849: śrutvā gaṇānāṃ vacanaṃ mahādbhutaṃ bravīti pakṣīndra manuṣyatāṃ gataḥ //
GP12garup2_u:5851: vāṇī kalatraṃ madhurārthabhāṣiṇī snānaṃ sutīrthe ca subandhavargaḥ //
GP12garup2_u:5852: karārpitaṃ yatsukṛtaṃ samastaṃ svargastadā syāttava kiṅkaropamaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5853: yo dharmavān prāpsyati so 'tisaukhyaṃ pāpī samastaṃ vividhañca duḥkham //
GP12garup2_u:5854: yo dharmaśīlo jitamānaroṣo vidyāvinīto na paropatāpī /
GP12garup2_u:5855: svadāratuṣṭaḥ paradāradūraḥsa vai naro no bhuvi vandanīyaḥ // GarP_2,48.40
GP12garup2_u:5857: māsopavāsī ca pativratā caṣaḍ jīvaloke mama vandanīyāḥ // GarP_2,48.41 //
GP12garup2_u:5858: evaṃ samācārayuto naro 'pi vāpīṃ sakūpāṃ sajalaṃ taḍāgam /
GP12garup2_u:5859: prapāśubhaṃ hṛdgṛhadevamandiraṃ kṛtaṃ nareṇaiva sa dharmauttamaḥ //
GP12garup2_u:5860: varṣāśanaṃ vedavide ca dattaṃ kanyāvivāhastvṛṇamocanaṃ dvije /
GP12garup2_u:5861: bhūmiḥ sukṛṣṭāpi tṛṣārtihetostadevametaṃ sukṛtat samastam // GarP_2,48.43
GP12garup2_u:5862: adhyāyamenaṃ sukṛtasya sāraṃ śṛṇoti gāyatyapi bhāvaśuddhyā /
GP12garup2_u:5863: sa vai kulīnaḥ sa ca dharmayukto viśvālayaṃ yāti paraṃ sa nūnam //
GP12garup2_u:5864: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde manuṣyasya sukhaduḥ khaprāpakadharmādharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭacatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5872: jāyante ca mriyante ca teṣāmanto na vidyate // GarP_2,49.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5873: sadā duḥ khāturā eva na sakhī vidyate kkacit /
GP12garup2_u:5874: kenopāyena mokṣeśa mucyante vada me prabho // GarP_2,49.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5876: śṛṇu tārkṣya pravakṣyāmi yanmāṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi /
GP12garup2_u:5879: sarvajñaḥ sarvakartā ca sarveśo nirmalo 'dvayaḥ // GarP_2,49.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5891: sukṛtānmā navo bhūtvā jñānī cenmokṣamāpnuyāt // GarP_2,49.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5893: na mānuṣaṃ vinānyatra tattvajñānantu labhyate // GarP_2,49.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5897: yastāra yati nātmānaṃ tasmātpāpataro 'tra kaḥ // GarP_2,49.15 //
GP12garup2_u:5899: na vettyātmahitaṃ yastu sa bhavedbrahmaghātakaḥ // GarP_2,49.16 //
GP12garup2_u:5900: vinā dehena kasyāpi puruṣārtho na vidyate /
GP12garup2_u:5905: punaḥ śubhāśubhaṃ karma na śarīraṃ punaḥ punaḥ // GarP_2,49.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5913: gatvā nirauṣadhaṃ deśaṃ vyādhimthaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati // GarP_2,49.23 //
GP12garup2_u:5921: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ jano hanta na vetti hitamātmanaḥ // GarP_2,49.27 //
GP12garup2_u:5923: loko mohasurāṃ pītvā na bibheti kadācana // GarP_2,49.28 //
GP12garup2_u:5929: viśvastaśca bhayasthāne hā naraḥ ko na hanyate // GarP_2,49.31 //
GP12garup2_u:5933: anarthe cārthavijñānaḥ svamarthaṃ yo na vetti saḥ // GarP_2,49.33 //
GP12garup2_u:5939: āmakuṃbha ivāṃbhaḥ stho viśīrṇo na vibhāvyate // GarP_2,49.36 //
GP12garup2_u:5943: śuṣyate sāgarajalaṃ śarīrasya ca kā kathā // GarP_2,49.38 //
GP12garup2_u:5944: apatyaṃ me kalatraṃ me dhanaṃ me bāndhavāśca me /
GP12garup2_u:5945: jalpantamiti martyājaṃ hanti kālavṛko balāt // GarP_2,49.39 //
GP12garup2_u:5949: na hi mṛtyuḥ pratīkṣeta kṛtaṃ vāpyatha vākṛtam // GarP_2,49.41 //
GP12garup2_u:5951: adhiṣṭhito mṛtyuśatruṃ trātāraṃ kiṃ na paśyati // GarP_2,49.42 //
GP12garup2_u:5958: duḥ khamūlaṃ hi saṃsāraḥ sa yasyāsti sa duḥ khitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5959: tasya tyāgaḥ kṛto yena sa sukhī nāparaḥ kvacit // GarP_2,49.46 //
GP12garup2_u:5968: māṃsalubdho yathā matsyo lohaśaṅkuṃ na paśyati /
GP12garup2_u:5969: sukhalubdhastathā dehī yamavādhāṃ na paśyati // GarP_2,49.51 //
GP12garup2_u:5971: kukṣipūraṇaniṣṭhā ye te narā nārakāḥ khaga // GarP_2,49.52 //
GP12garup2_u:5973: jñānavānmānavaḥ prokto jñānahīnaḥ paśuḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,49.53 //
GP12garup2_u:5977: jāyante ca mriyante ca hā hantājñānamohitāḥ // GarP_2,49.55 //
GP12garup2_u:5978: tasmātsaṅgaḥ sadā tyājyaḥ sacettyaktuṃ na śakyate /
GP12garup2_u:5979: mahadbhiḥ saha kartavyaḥ santaḥ saṅgasya bheṣajam // GarP_2,49.56 //
GP12garup2_u:5981: yasya nāsti naraḥ so 'ndhaḥ kathaṃ na syādamārgagaḥ // GarP_2,49.57 //
GP12garup2_u:5983: na jānanti paraṃ dharmaṃ vṛthā naśyanti dāmbhikāḥ // GarP_2,49.58 //
GP12garup2_u:5997: caranti gardabhādyāśca viraktāste bhavanti kim // GarP_2,49.65 //
GP12garup2_u:5999: mṛdbhasmavāsī nityaṃ śvā sa kiṃ mukto bhaviṣyati // GarP_2,49.66 //
GP12garup2_u:6005: na pibanti mahītoyaṃ vratinaste bhavanti kim // GarP_2,49.69 //
GP12garup2_u:6018: anyathā paramaṃ tattvaṃ janāḥ kliśyanti cānyathā /
GP12garup2_u:6019: anyathā śāstrasadbhāvo vyākhyāṃ kurvanti cānyathā // GarP_2,49.76 //
GP12garup2_u:6023: na jānanti paraṃ tattvaṃ darvī pākarasaṃ yathā // GarP_2,49.78 //
GP12garup2_u:6024: śiro vahati puṣpāṇi gandhaṃ jānāti nāsikā /
GP12garup2_u:6027: gopaḥ kakṣāgate cchāge kūpaṃ paśyati durmatiḥ // GarP_2,49.80 //
GP12garup2_u:6031: ataḥ prajñāvatāṃ śāstraṃ tattvajñānasya lakṣaṇam // GarP_2,49.82 //
GP12garup2_u:6039: tattvajñasya tathā tārkṣya na śāstreṇa prayojanam // GarP_2,49.86 //
GP12garup2_u:6041: jñānādeva hi kaivalyaṃ nānyathā vinatātmajaḥ // GarP_2,49.87 //
GP12garup2_u:6043: tathaiva sarvakarmāṇi jñānameva hi kāraṇam // GarP_2,49.88 //
GP12garup2_u:6051: samaṃ tattvaṃ na jānanti dvaitāddvaitavivarjitam // GarP_2,49.92 //
GP12garup2_u:6052: dve pade bandhamokṣāya namameti mameti ca /
GP12garup2_u:6054: tatkarma yanna bandhāya sā vidyā yā vimuktidā /
GP12garup2_u:6073: chindyādasaṃgaśastreṇa spṛhāṃ dehe 'nu yā ca tam // GarP_2,49.103 //
GP12garup2_u:6080: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma brahmāhaṃ paramaṃ padam /
GP12garup2_u:6083: yaḥ prayāti tyajandehaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_2,49.108 //
GP12garup2_u:6085: sudhiyastāṃ gatiṃ yānti tānahaṃ kathayāmi te // GarP_2,49.109 //
GP12garup2_u:6089: yaḥ snāti mānase tīrthe sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,49.111 //
GP12garup2_u:6091: pūrṇadṛṣṭiḥ prasannātmā sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,49.112 //
GP12garup2_u:6093: muktikṣetreṣu mriyate sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,49.113 //
GP12garup2_u:6094: ayodhyā mathurā māyā kāśī kāñcī avantika /
GP12garup2_u:6095: purī dvāravatī jñeyāḥ saptaitā mokṣadāyikāḥ // GarP_2,49.114 //
GP12garup2_u:6096: iti te kathitaṃ tārkṣya mokṣadharmaṃ sanātanam /
GP12garup2_u:6098: mokṣaṃ gacchanti tattvajñā dhārmikāḥ svargatiṃ narāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:6099: pāpino durgatiṃ yānti saṃsaranti khagādayaḥ // GarP_2,49.116 //
GP12garup2_u:6104: ityuktvā viṣṇumāmantrya sa gataḥ kaśyapāśramam // GarP_2,49.118 //
GP12garup2_u:6105: sadyo dehāntaraṃ yāti yathā yāti vilambataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:6108: mārīco 'pi mudaṃ lebhe śrutvā vākyaṃ ramāpateḥ // GarP_2,49.120 //
GP12garup2_u:6114: mayā tu bhavatāṃ proktaṃ paraṃ guhyaṃ hareridam // GarP_2,49.123 //
GP12garup2_u:6115: ya idaṃ śṛṇuyānmartyo yo vāpyabhidadhāti ca /
GP12garup2_u:6116: ihāmutra ca loke sa sarvatra sukhamāpnuyāt // GarP_2,49.124 //
GP12garup2_u:6118: asya śravaṇataḥ puṇyaṃ tanmukto jāyate tataḥ // GarP_2,49.125 //
GP12garup2_u:6121: bhajata jitahṛṣīkāḥ kṛṣṇamenaṃ munīśaṃ samajani bata yasmādgīḥ sudhāsāradhārā /
GP12garup2_u:6122: pṛṣatamapi yadīyaṃ varṇarūpaṃ nipīya śrutipuṭaculukena prāpnuyādātmanaikyam // GarP_2,49.127
GP12garup2_u:6129: sa munirapi niśamya śaunakendro bahutaramānayati sma cātmani svam //
GP12garup2_u:6133: śṛṇvatāṃ kāmanāpūraṃ śrotavyaṃ sarvadaiva hi // GarP_2,49.132 //
GP12garup2_u:6141: vihāya yātanāṃ ghorāṃ dhūtapāpo divaṃ vrajet // GarP_2,49.136 //
GP12garup2_u:6142: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe mokṣopāyanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:6143: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dvitīyo dharmakāṇḍaḥ samāptaḥ
